73a8(rgyud): 'jig rten khams 'dir sla la dbang brnyes shes// drang srong rig gsum rig pa'i pha rol gshegs// da ni spyod pa rgya chen rnams las byung // sen don phyir phrin las chen po'i khur// 
73b1(rgyud): bar dka' ba kun kyang khyod kyis mdzad// sa dang pha rol phyin pa bcu spyad pas// dge ba'i tshogs brtan yid bzhin la su bsgyur// zhal gyi dkyil 'khor zla ba dri mad rgyas// thugs rje'i spyar gyi
73b2(rgyud): 'gro ba'i mig 'byung po// dus ring 'jig rten kun la bde bar gzigs// de la dbang po tshangs sogs shin tu 'dud// bems shing bzod ldan snying rje bskyed pa'i ma// lha ma mchog de 'gro
73b3(rgyud): kun skyong bar dgyes// thor rmugs ri bo rtsa 'dra spobs pa 'phags/ shes rab zab cing shes pa'i rten byed kyang // rig pa'i gnas la mnga' brnyas tshig gi bdag/ 'jig rten na yang lha
73b4(rgyud): yaM ljong gyur la/ sdug bsngal bsal bar rab brtson gnyen mchog pas// mu su tog ge ba rnams kun kyang mdung // yan lag rnam par 'byes shing gsungs snyan pa/ yod dri med zamang
73b5(rgyud): nams 'bar bar bsgyings// rig pa mchog gi dngos grub sbyin mdzad pa// blo myur tshig 'chang spobs pa'i mchog stso cig/ se kun la rtag tu phan sems pa/ 
73b6(rgyud): sku mchog khong rnam grol sa la bzhugs// thugs dam brtan bcas bskul ba rnams la yang // dpal gyis dgongs shig don kun nye bar skangs// 'di ltar 'jig rten dag na
73b7(rgyud): sdang ba kun// sgra 'jobs khang bar tshig gis don mtshon // phan tshun shes shing yang dag brda spyod pa'ang // dbyangs can khyod kyi mthu ste bsam mi khyab// gzungs dang chos kyi sgom
73b8(rgyud): la dbang brjes pa/ dam tshig bdar grub drang srong shes nyid can// lus sems ngag rnams byin gyis rlob pa dang // yid 'ong sgras kyang 'jig rten tshim par ba // bang chub mchog
74a1(rgyud): gi spyod pir su dag mos// bdag dang gzhan don phu supa tshogs gyur pa'i// lus dang ngag yid rnam dag mchog 'dod la/ bcom ldan 'das pas rtag tu don pachog
74a2(rgyud): stsol bdag ni dpa' zhing bang rkub las brtson dang // lce yi dbang po dag cing tshig btsun la/ rig pa'i gter ldan sbra la thogs med dang // bde gshegs spobs pa nye bar sgrub
74a3(rgyud): gsol// rig pa'i yum gyi rang bzhin rtogs las dpa// snyan pa'i rgyal mtshan dga' ba'i shugs kyis bskyod// mekha' la sna tshogs rnam par dri 'dod ltar// mtshan nyid rtog
74a4(rgyud): dka' yor gting mtha' med// na mo b+ha ga ba te / prah+ma Ne/ na maHsa ra swa t+yaM de bi sid d+han+ta man+t+ra pA da te brah+ma du pan+d+ha sAhA/ dpal lha po sgra dbangs la bstod pa rdzogaso// @6/ rgya gar
74a5(rgyud): ska du/ Ar+ya shrI ma hA de baM byA ka ra \u0f7f/ bod skadadu/ 'phags balha po chen po dpal lung bstan pa/ sangs rgyas dang ba nga chub sems dpa' thad la phag 'tshalo// 
74a6(rgyud): 'di skad bdag gos thos pa dus gcig na/ bcom ldan 'das bde ba can nu ba brkubs de'i dge 'dun chen po 'di lta ste/ byang chub sems dpa' sede' chen po spyan ras gzigs
74a7(rgyud): dbang phyug dang / byang chub sada' sems dpa' chen po mthu chen thob pa dang / byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po sgrib pa thad rnam par sel ba dang / byang chub sems
74a8(rgyud): dpa' sada' chen po so'i snying po dang / byang chub sems dpa' sada' chen po kun tu bzang po dang / byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po nam mkha'i snying po dang / bang rkub
74b1(rgyud): sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po lag na rdo rje dang / byang chub se der sems dpa' chen po 'jigs pa thams cad sel ba dang / de bzhin du byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen
74b2(rgyud): po dag byed kyi bkra shis thang 'dzin pa dang / byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po bsod nams kyi mtshan thams cad 'dzin pa dang / byang chub sems dpa' sede' chen po nyi zla dang / 
74b3(rgyud): 'jig rten 'dzin pa dang / byang chub sems dpa'i sada' chen po mu stegs kyi bkra shis thams cad 'dzin pa dang / byang chub sems dpa' sada' chen po 'jam dpal gzhonur gyur pa dang / 
74b4(rgyud): de la sogs pa bskal pa bzang po'i byang chub sems da se de'i chen po thad dang thabs gcig tu gzhug so// de nas byang chub sems dpa' sede'i chen po spyad ras
74b5(rgyud): gzigs dbang phyu // bcom ldan 'das ga le ba der song ste phyin nas/ bcom ldan 'das kyi zhabs la mgo bos phyag 'tshal tu phyogs gcig tu 'du'o// lnga po chen mo
74b6(rgyud): dpal yang bcom ldan 'das kyi thad song ste phyin nas/ bcom ldan 'das kyi zhabs la mgo bos phag 'tshal te lan gsum bskor bu bas nas bde ba cad da gnas pa'i byang rkub seM
74b7(rgyud): sems dpa' chen po de dag la yang migo bas phyag 'tshal te phyogs gcig tu 'du'o// de nas bcom ldan 'das bsod nams brgya stong du bas rgyan cing / de ba'i dgashegs pa bya ba dag
74b8(rgyud): gis yong su bskor te/ brgya byin dang / tshangs po dang / 'jig rten skyong ba zad kyis bstod cing bsngag so// lha mo chen po dpal la gzigs nas/ tshangs pa chen po'i gsung gis byang chub
75a1(rgyud): / sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po spyan ras gzigs dbang phyug la 'di skad ces bka' stsal to// spyan ras gzigs dbang phyug rgyal po'am/ blong po 'am/ dge slong
75a2(rgyud): dge slong ma 'am/ dge bsnyen nam/ dge bsnyen ma 'am/ bram ze 'am/ rgyal rags sam/ rje'u rigs sam/ dbang rigs gang la la lha mo chen mo dpal gyi ming brgya rtsa brgyad dri ma med
75a3(rgyud): bar grags pa zhes bya ba'i bstod pa 'dri 'chang na/ rgyal rigs kyi rgyal po de'i yul dang / seMn de dag gi 'jigs pa dang / yams kyi nad gnod pa thad zhi bar 'gyur zhing chom rku dang
75a4(rgyud): g.yo can dang / mi dang mi ma yin pa'i 'jigs pa thad 'byung bar mi 'gyur te/ nor dang / 'bru dang / mdzod dang / bang pa thams cad rna ma par 'phel bar 'gyur ro// rgyal rigs kyi
75a5(rgyud): rgyal po de de khyim du yang dpa la nges par gnas par 'gyuraro// de nasabyang chub sems dpa' se 'a chen po de dag gis tshig 'di skad ces gsol to// bcom ldan 'das gsung 'di le
75a6(rgyud): bar bka' stsal pa lag so// leg so// legs te/ gang dag lha mo chen mo dpal gyi ming rnams 'dzin pa dang / thos nas kyang sgrub par bgyid pa de dag gi yon dang / phan yon ni de dag lag so// de nas
75a7(rgyud): byang chub sems dpa' seda' chen po 'phags pa spyan ras gzigs dbang phyug gis bcom ldan 'das la 'di skad ces gsol to// bcom ldan 'das lha mo dpal gyis dag pa'i rtsa ba gang du/ 
75a8(rgyud): bskrad pa lags/ bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ lha mo chen mo dpal gyis de bzhin gshegs pa gang+gA'i klung gi ba ma rnyed la dge ba'i rtsa ba bskyed/ spyan ras gzigs dbang phyug sngon/ 
75b1(rgyud): byung ba 'das pa'i dus na 'jig rten gyi khams rin po che las byung ba zhes bya ba na/ de bzhin gshegs pa rin po che'i me tog yon gyi rgya mtsho DUR+Ya dang / gser gyi ri bo mdog mdzes gser 'od
75b2(rgyud): dpal zhes bya ba 'jig rten du byung ste/ de bzhin gshegs pa mang po gzhan dag la yang lha mo chen mo dpal gyis dge ba'i rtsa ba bskye // de bzhin gshegs pa'i mtshan 'di dag kyang lnga po
75b3(rgyud): chen mo dpal de'i dge ba'i rtsa ba rnam par 'phel ba dang / 'grub par byed pa dang / rtag/ khurje su 'brang ba yin te/ de dag ni 'dir lha mo dngal yang dag par brjod pa dang / sdig pa thang sel ba dang / nyes
75b4(rgyud): sdig thams cad med par byed ba dang / lus thad dri ma med par bya da ba dang / nor dang / 'bru rnams 'dra zhing 'phel bar byed pa dang / dbul ba gcod par dad pa dang / lha dang / klu dang / 
75b5(rgyud): gnod sbyin dang / dri za dang / lha ma yin dang / nam mkha'i lding dang / mi 'am tsa dang / lto 'pho chen po thang 'dun par byed cing 'gugs par byed pa dang / yams kyi nang dang gnod pa dang / 'thab pa da
75b6(rgyud): 'khrug pa dang / 'gyed pa dang rtsod pa thang zhi bar bad pa dang / pha rol tu phyin pa drug sgrub par byed pa'o// 'di lta ste/ de bzhin gshegs pa dpal stug po la phag 'tsha'o// de bzhin gshegs pa
75b7(rgyud): ring po che'i mchog yon tan gyi rgya mtsho de DUn dong / gser gyur pa mdog mdzes gos 'do dpal lungag 'tsha'o// de bzhin gshegs pa ga b+hI mu ste gos kyi sgo thang bkra shis kyi dpal
75b8(rgyud): phag 'tsha'o// de bzhin gshegs pa tsan dan gyi me tog gzi brjid skar ra'i 'od kyi dpal la phyag 'tshalo// de bzhin gshegs pa kun tu sdang ba g.yul las rnam par rgyal ba'i dpal
76a1(rgyud): la phyag 'tshalo// de bzhin gshegs pa ston rgya mtsho sdang ba'i dkyil 'khor gyi dpal la phag 'tshalo// de bzhin gshegs pa chos kyi cho 'phrul rgyal mtshan shugs kyi dpal
76a2(rgyud): phag 'tsha'o// de bzhin gshegs pa skar 'od zhi ba'i spos snang dpal la phag 'tsha'o// de bzhin gshegs pa sen gyi bsam pazhi par mdzad pa'i sku'i dpal la phyag 'tshalo// de bzhin gshegs
76a3(rgyud): pa smon lam rgya mtshos snang ba'i dpal la phyag 'tshalo// bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa shin tu yongasu brjod pa mtshan gsol dpal la phyag 'tshalo// de bzhin gshegs pa phir mi
76a4(rgyud): ldog pa'i 'khor lo rin po che'i gnas kyi dpal la phyag 'tshalo// de bzhin gshegs pa nyi ma'i dkyil 'khor 'od 'phags dpal la phyag 'tsha'o// de bzhin gshegs pa brtson 'grus
76a5(rgyud): grangs med pa la yang dag par rdzogs pa'i dpal la phyag 'a tshalo// de bzhin gshegs pa dpag tu med pa'i gser mtsho ga sdang ba'i dpal la phyag 'tsha'o// de bzhin
76a6(rgyud): gshegs pa gsung gi yan lag thaMd kyi sgra dbyangs dpal la phyag 'tsha'o// de bzhin gshegs pa shes rab sgron ma grangs med pa'i 'od kyi tog gi dpal la phyogo 'tsha'o// de bzhin pa
76a7(rgyud): bsred med kyi bu'i brtul zhugs kyi cho ga lhun po'i dpal la phyog 'tshalo// de bzhin gshegs pa tshangs pa'i dpal la phag 'tshalo// de bzhin gshegs pa dbang phyug chen po'i dpal la
76a8(rgyud): phyag 'tsha'o// de bzhin gshegs pa nyi zla'i 'od dpa la la phyag 'tsha'o// de bzhin gshegs pa zab mo'i chos kyi 'od kyi rgyal po'i dpal la phyag 'tsha'o// de bzhin gshegs pa nam tsA/ 
76b1(rgyud): sgron ma 'ong bzang dpal la phag 'tsha'o// de bzhin gshegs pa nyi 'od tog gi dpal la phyag 'tsha'o// de bzhin gshegs pa spos kyi sgron pa'i dpal la phyag 'tsha'o// de bzhin gshegs brgya
76b2(rgyud): mtsho'i snying po las byung ba'i dpral pag 'tsha'o// de bzhin gshegs pa sprul pa'i 'drug sgra snyan pa'i dpal la phag 'tshalo// de bzhin gshegs pa chos kyi sdang ba thad bkod pa'i dpal la
76b3(rgyud): dag 'tshalo// de bzhin gshegs pa shing pi rgyal po lngar skyes pa'i dpal la ngag 'tshal/ de bzhin gshegs pa rim chen 'od 'dro bo'i dpal la phag 'tsha'o// de bzhin gshegs pas
76b4(rgyud): shas 'od 'phro rgya mtsho'i dpal la phag 'tshalo// de bzhin pa shags pa smon lam chen po'i shugs kyi dpal la phag 'a tsha'o// de bzhin gshegs pa spring chen po'i dang
76b5(rgyud): la phag 'tsha'o// de bzhin gshegs pa dran pa'i tog gi rgyal bo la phag 'tshalo// de bzhin gshegs pa dbang po tog gi rgyal mtshan gyi rgyal po'i dpal la phyag 'tshalo// de
76b6(rgyud): bzhin gshegs pa nor dang 'bru thaMd sdud pa'i dpal la phag 'tshalo// de bzhin gshegs pa zhi ba 'dren pa'i dpal la phag 'tshalo// de bzhin gshegs pa phun sum tshogs pa 'gugs
76b7(rgyud): pa'i dpal la phag 'tshalo// de bo'i na gshegs pa'i mtshan 'di dag rim gror bas te/ bcang bar bya'o// bklags par bya'o// de ltar byas na rigs kyi bu 'am/ rigs kyi bu mo de'i bsod nams
76b8(rgyud): shin tu mang du po skud par 'gyur// lnga po chen mo dpal de bzhin gshegs pa thod kyis lung bstan to lha mo chen mo dang lo khong ma 'ongs pa'i dus na 'jig rngan gyi khams dpal chen po rin po/ 
77a1(rgyud): rgyan pa zhes par de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas dpal nor bu rin po che las byung ba zhes bya bar 'gyur te/ 'jig rteran gyi khams pa
77a2(rgyud): yang lha'i rin po che sna tshogs kyis rgyan par 'gyu'o// 'jig rten gyi khams der de bzhin gshegs pa de nyid sdang bar mdzad par 'gyur la/ 'jig rter gyi khabs ngan gnas pa'i bang rkub
77a3(rgyud): sada' nga dag kyang rang las 'od 'byung zhing tshe dpag tu med par 'gyuraro// ra mkha' las kyang sangs rgyas dang / chos dang / dge 'dun gyi sgra 'byung bar 'gyur// sangs rgyas kyi zhing dang bang che ba se
77a4(rgyud): gang dag skye bar 'gyur ba de dag thams cad kyang 'ad+ma'i snying po ngag las skye bar 'gyuraro zhes lung bstan to// de la ming brgya rtsa brgyad dri ma med pa lta bu zhes pa pa'i bstod pa rgyu chags
77a5(rgyud): bcu gnyis gang zhe na/ 'jigs pa med pa spyan ras gzigasadabang phyug lnga mo chen po dpal gyi ming rnam par nyon cig 'a lnga ste/ de bzhin gshegs pa zad kyis dbang
77a6(rgyud): bskur ba/ lnga thad kyis dbang bskur ba/ de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi yum/ lha thams cad kyi ma/ de bzhin gshegs pa thad kyi dpal byang chub sems dpa' thams cad kyi dpal
77a7(rgyud): 'phags pa nyan thos dang / rang sangs rgyas tha~Md kyi dpal dang tshangs pa dang / khyab 'jug dang / dbang phyug chen po rnams kyi dpal/ lha la sogs po tha~Md kyi dpa'/ gnas thams cad yod pa'i
77a8(rgyud): dpal/ lha dang / klu dang / gnod sbyin dang / dri za dang / lha ma yin dang / na mkha' lding dang / mi 'am ci dang / lto 'phye chen po thams cad kyi dpal/ rigs sngags 'chang dang / lag na rdo rje dang rdo rje 'chang
77b1(rgyud): / thams cad kyi dpal/ 'jig rten skyong ba bzhi dang lnga'i dpal/ gza' brgyad dang rgyu skar nyi shu rtsa brgyad kyi dpa'o// oM nyi ma'i bu 'am/ yum rig byed bzhi'i dpal bkra shis mA/ sen gyi ma/ rnar
77b2(rgyud): rgyal ma/ gang ga ma/ mu stegs thams cad ma/ bkra shis thams cad ma/ dri ma med par byed pa'i dpal/ sdig pa thad 'phrog ma rgyags byed ma/ zla ba'i dpal/ nyi ma'i dpal/ gza' thams cad
77b3(rgyud): kyai dpal/ sang ge la zhan ma/ pad+ma mchog 'bum gyis bka' ma/ pad+ma/ pad+ma las byung mo// 'ad+mal gnas sa/ pad+ma 'dzin ma/ pad+ma dang ldan ma ngon po che 'od 'bar ba'i phreng bdus dang ldan man rgyun
77b4(rgyud): ma dkar mo/ dkar mo chen mo/ lag dkar ma/ bkra shis thaMd 'dzi nam/ bsod nams thams cad bsags pa'i lus can ma/ shes nyen gyi bu mo/ lag pa 'bum ldan ma/ mig 'bum
77b5(rgyud): ldan ma/ mgo 'bum ldan ma nor bu rnam pa sna tshogs kyi cod pan/ dang ldan ma/ gzugs bzang ma/ kun gyi gzugs can ma/ grags ma/ shin tu grags ma/ zhi ma/ sprin 'dra ba'i skra ga
77b6(rgyud): ma zla ba ltar mdzes ma/ dge ma/ dge byad ma/ sems can thaMd la mngon du phyogs pa'i dpal/ 'phags pa me tog gi dpal me tog gi dbang phyug ma/ ri'i rgyal po ri rab thaMd kyi dpal chu klung dang
77b7(rgyud): mtsho thams cad kyi dpal/ chu dang rgya mtsho thams cad kyi dpal/ mu stegs thad mngon du phyogs pa'i dpal/ sman dang / rtsa dang nags tshal dang / nor dang / 'bru thams cad kyi dpal/ gser skyon ma/ 
77b8(rgyud): zas dang skom sbyin ma 'od gsal ma/ snang ma/ lus gtsang ma/ de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi dbang bsgyur ma/ lha'i tshogs thams cad la mngon du phyogs ma'i dpal/ gshin rje dang uH
78a1(rgyud): / dang lus ngan dang / brgya byin la sogs pa'i dpal/ sbyin byed ma/ longs spyod pa/ gzi brjid ma gzi brjid ldan ma/ phung supa tshogs ma 'byor ba pa/ rnam par 'phel pa/ mthong
78a2(rgyud): chos kyi dpal ma/ khyab 'jug la rten ma/ ku mu da la gnas ma/ gnod sbyin ma/ bzod sbyin ma/ mthu rtsal gyi gnas ma dag byed dang dkra shis thaMd kyi log ldan ma khakra mi shis pa thams cad
78a3(rgyud): 'jig pad ma/ bsod nams thams cad sdud pa'i dpal/ sa thams cad dang rgyal po thad kyi dpal/ rigs sngags 'chang gi rgyal po thams cad kyi dpal/ 'byung po dang / gnod sbyin dang / srin
78a4(rgyud): bo dang / yi dwags dang / sha za dang / grul bum dang / lto 'phye chen po thams cad kyi dpal/ lha'i gnas dang / lha thad kyi dpal/ bzlas brjod dang / bzlas brjod bya ba dang / sbyin sreg dang / sbyin
78a5(rgyud): bsreg du bya ba dang / bkra shis tha~Md kyi dpal/ 'od ldan ma/ mchog dga' ma/ skal pas 'gyur ma/ drang srong thabs cad dga' bar brjod par dpal/ bung med thams
78a6(rgyud): kyi gnas kun gyi gtso ma dpal gyi mchog/ maM 'am ci mo thams cad dang / lha ba yin mo tha~Md kyi dpal gyi mchog kha na ma tho ba med pa'i gnas na 'dug ma/ yid 'ong ma/ sim byed ma/ lus
78a7(rgyud): ngan la sdug ma/ chos kyi rgyal po'i dpal/ oM sdug bsngal thams cad las rnam par gzigs shing sgrol cig/ thar bar mdzod cig bsod nams kyi tshogs pade bdag la mngon du gyur par
78a8(rgyud): mdzod cig swA hA/ oM gang gas dzad d+ha mu khe swA hA/ oM sarba bi tre swAhA/ sarba me ga la d+hA ra Ni swA hA/ tsa tur bad sarba na k+Sha tra/ grA hA ga nA hA ga/ Na d+hu sUH ye swA hA/ pras+thA la swAny+dza/ br-iny+tsa me swA hA ruH
78b1(rgyud): ya sAH/ bi sha mu khA ya swA hA/ oM gr-ini glen sarba kArA sA d+ha ni/ si ni si ni/ A bA h+ma/ de ba hU khai shra ma N+Da ya sAr+tha/ u badz+rad+ha n+nad+han+ya/ A kaR+Sha N+yai swA hA/ sarba pu N+ye swAny+tsa/ shrI he ba She A kaR+ShaH
78b2(rgyud): swA hA/ sarba pA paM ra sha mye swA hA/ sarba a lak+Sh+mI pra sha ma n+ya sAh+ma/ sarba ta thA ga ta a b+hi Sha ka ye swA hA/ sathaMng ba ta a b+hi mu khaM shr-i ye a yur ba la par+Na ka ra ya swA hA/ sarba bota tA me ga la hA
78b3(rgyud): ya swA hA/ si ga ba han ni swA hA/ pad+ma saM b+hu tra yai swA hA/ sarba kr-i ti ka kho dza bi nA sha ne swA hA// 'jigs pa med pa spyan ras gzigs dbang phyug/ gang la la lha mo chen mo dpal gyi ming / nyas sdig
78b4(rgyud): thang med par byed pa/ sdig pa thams cad 'joms par byed pa bsod nams thams cad sdud par byed pa/ bkra mi shis pa tha mas cad med par byed pa/ dpal dang / bde ba dang / 
78b5(rgyud): skal pa bzang po thams cad sdud par byed pa 'di dag dang / de bzhin gshegs pa'i mtshan 'di dag 'chang ba dang / klog par bad pa des nang par langs te gtsang bar byas la/ 
78b6(rgyud): sangs rgyas thang la me tog dang bdug pa gsol nas/ lha mo chen mo dpal la yang tsan dan gyi bdug pa phul te/ bklags na des dpal thams cad mthong bar 'gyur/ bde ba dang / yid bde
78b7(rgyud): thams cad thob par 'gyur/ lha tha~Md kyang srung ba dang / bskyab pa pa me smad pa bang bar 'gyur/ de'i dgos pa thams cad 'grub par 'gyuraro// bcom ldan 'das kyis de skad ces bka' stsal nas
78b8(rgyud): babadub med 'jigs pa med pa spyan ras gzigs dbang phyug dang / lha mo chen mo dpal de dang / thab dang ldan pa'i 'khor de dang lha dang mi dang / lha ma yin dang / dri zar bcas pa'i 'jig rten
79a1(rgyud): // rangs te/ bcom ldan 'das kyis gsungs pa la mngon par bstod do// 'phags pa lha mo chen mo dpal lung bstad pa rdzog so// rgya gar skadA/ Ar+ya ba hA shra yAHsU rba/ bod skad/ 
79a2(rgyud): ba dpal chen mo'i mdo/ sangs rgyas dang byang chub sade' thams cad la phag 'tshalo// 'di skad bdag gis thos pa dus gcig na/ bcom ldan 'das bde ba can na bzhug so// de nas byang chub sad
79a3(rgyud): sems dpa' chen po 'phags pa spyan ras gzigs dbang phyug bcom ldan 'das ga la der song ste phyin nas/ bcom ldan 'das kyi zhabs la mgo bos phyag 'tshal nas/ bcom ldan
79a4(rgyud): 'das la bskor ba lan gsum byas te phyogs gcig tu 'du'o/ de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis dpal chen mo la gzigs nas 'phags pa spyan ras gzigs dbang phyug la 'di skad
79a5(rgyud): bka' stsal to// dpal chen mo'i mtshan bcu gnyis po'ang dge slong ngam/ dge slong ma 'am/ dge bsnyen nam/ dge bste na ma 'am/ de ma yin pa gzhan yang rung ste/ gang
79a6(rgyud): gis shes pa dang / gang la la 'chang ba dang / klog pa dang / 'dri ba dang / 'drir 'jug pa de ni dbul 'bor te phyug por 'gyuraro// de nas 'byung po'i tshogs thad kyis de ltar gyur cig ces kun ma/ 
79a7(rgyud): gsol to// de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis dpal chen mo'i mtshan bcu gnyis po bka' stsal pa 'di lta ste/ dpal ldan ma/ bkra shis ma/ pad+ma'i phreng ba can/ nor gyi bdag mo// dkar mo/ grar
79a8(rgyud): ba chen mo// pad+ma'i spyan/ 'od chen mo// byed pa mo zas sbyin ma/ rin po che rab tu sbyin ma// dpal chen mo/ s+yAd la the dan/ dzi ni g+h+ri Ni/ sarba atra sA d+ha ni/ sha shi ni/ a lak+ShI Ni/ me nA sha ya/ sid d+hAm+b+ha
79b1(rgyud): man+da pa dA swAhA/ oM b+h+r-i ku DI pa rab su rtsa ga swA hA/ lan gsum du brjod par bya ste/ gang la la dus gsum du 'don pa por mi mthun pa'i phyogs thang 'jig par 'gyur// skal pa bzang po dang ldan
79b2(rgyud): bar 'gyur// 'byor ba zad pa shes par 'gyur// ma dang phradu 'gro ba'i tshe bklags nas phrang bu byas da po des de la bu'i 'du shes skyed par 'gyur te dga' bar 'gyur la ji skad bsgo ba bzhin bdo// rtag
79b3(rgyud): du rgyu ba 'chang bar bkrugs da tshangs pa brim zas drag shul gyi las byes kyang mi tshugaso par 'gyur la/ sangs rgyas mang po la bstan bku du bas par yang 'gyur bcom ldan 'das kyis pa
79b4(rgyud): skad ces bka' stsal nas// khang rkub sa der 'phags pa spyan ras gzigs dbang phyub yi rangs pa bcom ldan 'das kyis ga/ sungs pa la mngon par bstod do// 'phags pa dpa'
79b5(rgyud): chen mo'i mdo rdzogaso// rgya gar gyi mkhan po dzi na mi tra dang / zhu chen gyi lo ts+tsha ba ban+de ye shes sdes bsgyur cing zhus te gtan la phab pa// dpal gyi lha ro mtshan bcu gnyis pa// 
79b6(rgyud): dkon mchog gsum la phag 'tshalo// 'phags pa spyan ras gzigs dbang phyug la phag 'tsha'o// phag na rdo rdza la pag 'tsha'o// dpal lnga po chen mo la phag 'tshalo// 'di skad bdag gis
79b7(rgyud): zos pa dus gcig ma/ badres bde ba car gyi 'jig rte na bzhugs te/ de nas byang chub sadel sa der tshon po sbyar ras gzigs dbang phyug bcom ldan 'das ga la ba deng song ste phyin nas/ bcom
79b8(rgyud): ldan 'das kyi zhabs gnyis la mgo bas phyag 'tshal te phyogs gcig tu du'o/ de nas byang chub sems dpa' sede chen po dpal lha mo chen mo yang bcom ldan 'das gol bdang song ni
80a1(rgyud): // drung du phyin nas/ bcom ldan 'das kyi zhabs gnyis la mgo bos phyag 'tshal te phyogs gcig tu 'du'o// de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis dpal chen mo la gzigs nas spyan ras gzi
80a2(rgyud): dbang phyug la 'di skad ces bka' stsal to// spyan ras gzigs dbang phyug dge slong ngab/ dge slong ma 'am/ dge bsnyen nam/ ngage bsnyen ma 'am/ sad gang su yang rung bas dpal chen mo 'di'i ming
80a3(rgyud): bcu gnyis shes te 'chang ba dang / klog pa dang / sgrub par byang ba dang / brjod par byed na de dbul po spangs nas phyug po chen por 'gyuraro// de nas 'byung po'i tshogs thams cad kyis kyang de bzhin du
80a4(rgyud): gyur cig ces smraso// dpal lha po chen mo'i ming bcu gnyis 'di lta ste/ bkra shis ma/ dpal ldan ma/ pad+ma'i phreng thogs ma nor bdag ma/ dkar sham ma/ grags chen ma/ pad+ma spyan mnga' ma
80a5(rgyud): 'od chan ma/ byed pa mo// zas sbyin ma/ rin chen 'od ldan ma/ dpal chen mo ma/ sangs rgyas thaMd la phyag 'tshalo// spyan ngas gzi/ dbang phyug la phyag 'tshalo// dpal chen mo la phag
80a6(rgyud): 'tshalo// 'ong lnga ste/ dzi na/ g+h+r-i ni/ dgos pa thad sgrub par mdzad ma/ saM maM saM maM/ ni mi ni mi/ bdag gi mi shis pa thams cad gsal bar mdzad cig swA hA/ bcom ldan 'das kyis de skad ces bka'
80a7(rgyud): stsal pa dang / byang chub sede'i seda' chen po spyan ras gzigs dbang phyug bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa la mngon par dga'o// dpal gyi lha mo'i mtshan bcu gnyis rdzogaso// 
80a8(rgyud): rgya gar gyi mkhan pa dzi ni mai tra dang / zhu chen gyi l-i ts+tsha ba ban+d+ha ye shes sdes bsgyud cing zhus te gtan la phab pa// rgya gar skad/ Ar+ya sarba kar+m+ma A ga tsi bi sho d+ha ni nA ma d+hA rA Ni/ bod ska du/ 'pha
80b1(rgyud): pa las kyi sgrib pa thams cad rnam par sbyong ba zhes bya ba'i gzungs/ bcom ldan 'das mi 'khrugs pa la phyag 'tsha'o// na ma rat+na tra yA ya/ oM ka ka na~M kaM ka ni/ ro tsan ro tsa ni/ tro ni tro Da ni/ 
80b2(rgyud): thAs ni trA sa ni khwa ti ha na pa ti han/ sarba karma ba ra~M ba rA Ni me swA hA/ gzungs sngags 'di'i cho ga ni 'di yin te/ rtag tu bzlas brjod pas na las gcig nas gcig tu brgyud ba thang dzar
80b3(rgyud): dag par 'gyuraro// dus gsub du bzlas brjod pas na mtshams med pa lnga yang byang bar 'gyuraro// lan gcig bzlas brjod pas na ltos ngan pa dang / bkra bi shis pa rnams med par 'gyu'o
80b4(rgyud): lus la 'chang ngam/ glags bam la bris nas bgul du thogs te 'chang na dus ma yin par 'chi ba rnams gtan du byung bar mi 'gyuraro// gang zhig snying rjes don
80b5(rgyud): ri dwags dang kha dang / mi dang mi ma yin pa rnams kyang rung ste/ 'chi ba'i rna khung du brjod da de ngan song du 'gro bar mi 'gyur// yang na shaM sta dus las 'das na shaM 'phos pa'i ming nas
80b6(rgyud): smos te de'i phong babs pa dang snying rjes lan brgya'am/ stong ngam/ 'bub brjod na de sen dmyal bar skye su zer kyang de'i mod la thar bar 'gyuraro// sa 'am/ til las/ yungs kar rab rkug
80b7(rgyud): yang rung ba lo bzlas brjod pas te/ shi ba'i lus la gtor ram/ khrus byas nas de'i 'og tu 'chad pa 'am/ yang na mchod rten gyi nang du bcug ste bzhag la/ rigs sngags kyang bris nas
80b8(rgyud): mgo la btags na/ de ngan song du smras pa yang dag bdun gyis gdon mi za bar thar te/ bde 'gro mtho ris kyi 'jig rten du smra bar 'gyur ba 'am/ yang na rang gi spor lam gyi dbang gis skye ba
81a1(rgyud): // 'gyuraro// gang zhig zla ba nya ba'i tshe khrus pas la gtsang ba rlabs te/ dus gsum du gos brjezhing kha zas maM za ba 'am/ yang da kha zas dkar bag bza' zhing / sku gdung dang pa
81a2(rgyud): rten du gang gi ming dang ldan pas lan 'bum bzlas brjod pas na/ dengan song nas thar te gnas gtsang ba'i lha'i ri su skyes ras sgrub pa po'i thadu 'ongs pa bachod par byed cing lus kyang ston la
81a3(rgyud): lagaso zhes pa pa yang byin nas lan gsum bskor ba bas te mi sdang bar 'gyuraro// de'i ming 'bris la gzungs sngags bzlas brjid byed cing kho chod rjend 'bum bso la// gdugs dang rgyal
81a4(rgyud): mtshan dang kha dan la sogs pas lags par mchod nas rgya mtsho chen po dang / yang na chu klung du btang na nges ser dmal ba la sor ba nas thar bar 'gyur// yang na de ltar mchod pa byas
81a5(rgyud): nas mjug tu lam gyi gzhi mdor bachod rten chen por bas ta/ gdugs dang / rgyal mtshan dang / ba dan la sogs pas lags par mchod la// 'phags pa'i dge 'dun
81a6(rgyud): la yang mchod stod gsol nas yon yang phul te legs par mchod nas che ge mo zhig gi dge ba'i rtsa bar gyur cig/ 'di kho nas bde 'gro mtho ris kyi 'jig rten du skye bar gyur cig
81a7(rgyud): ces kyang shes par byas na/ de kho na bzhin du skyes nas lus kyang stod cing legaso zhes bya ba yang bin nas mi snang bar gyur to// mtshams med pa lnga byang bang ba 'am/ dam po'i chos spong ba 'am/ 
81a8(rgyud): 'phags pa la bskor ba btab pa yang rung ste 'chi khar rtsig pa la gzungs sngags 'di bris pa mthong na de'i las kyi sgrib pa thang zad par gyur na/ 'don pa dang bzlas brjod pas pa lta ci
81b1(rgyud): spos/ de bzhir gshegs pa de nyid bor nas 'di skad rigs kyi bu tshur nga'i gar du shog ces kyang gsung bar 'gyuraro// 'phags pa las kyi sgrib pa thang rnam par spong bzhes bya pa'i gzungs
81b2(rgyud): rdzog so// rgya gar skad/ Ar+ya bod+d+ha ut+pa pa ba hA da~Mn+t+ra/ bod skadadu/ 'phags pa rig pa mchog gi rgyud chen po// sangs rgyas dang byang chub se 'i'azang la phaga'i tshalo// 'od skad bdag gis
81b3(rgyud): thos pa dus gcig na/ bcob ldan 'das pa nyan yod nga rgyal bu rgyal byed kyi tshal mgos pang zas spyir gyi kun dga' ra bar bzhugs// de ras ba chub sanga' sems dpa' chen po lag
81b4(rgyud): rdo rje rig pa bye ba phrag du bas bskong nas bcom ldan 'das ga la ba der song sde phyin ras par sdang las babs te/ bcom ldan 'das kyi zhabs la mgo bos phag 'tshal
81b5(rgyud): bcom ldan 'das la lar gsum bskor ba bas te pogs pa cig tu 'du'o// de nas ba bdub sada' spyan ras gzigs dbang phyag kyang rig pa ba bdums yongasu bskor ras
81b6(rgyud): 'khor de nyid 'dug te/ bcom ldan 'das kyi zhabs la mgo bos phyag 'tshal nas/ bcom ldan 'das la lan gsum bskor ba bas te phyogs gcig tu 'dug/ de nas 'byung po'i bdag
81b7(rgyud): po dbang ldan 'byung po ba ba phrag du bas bskor nas 'khor de nyid du 'dus par gyur te/ bcom ldan 'das kyi zhabs dang phagar rdo rje la mgo bos pag 'tshal lo/ phyogs gcig tu 'dug/ 
81b8(rgyud): de nas gdol pa'i rgyal po phur bu gsum pa yang 'khor de nyid 'dus par gyur to// rgyal po chen po bzhi yang g.yog 'khor ba ba phrag du mas kun nas bskor te 'khor de nyid 'das na/ 
82a1(rgyud): bcom ldan 'das kyi zhabs la mgo bos phyag 'tshal te phyogs gcig tu 'du'o// de nas byang chub sed lag na rdo rjes bla gos phrag pa gcig tu bzar te dbus po gas
82a2(rgyud): pa'i lha nga sa la btsugs nas bcom ldan 'das ga la ba da logasu thal po sbar ba btud bcom ldan 'das la 'di skad ces gsol to// bcom ldan 'das san thaMd kyi don gyi sladadu
82a3(rgyud): bdag gsang sngags kyi tshig 'chad par gnang ba mdzadadu gsol/ bcom ldan 'das kyis byang chub sadar lag na rdo rje la 'di skad ces bka' stsal to// lag na rdo rje khyod ni shin tu
82a4(rgyud): ma rungs pa/ lagar rdo rje khyod ni shin tu brtsam pa meng ba/ shing tug tum pa yi da/ dza ltar sems can rnam sa kyi don gyi phyir gsang sngan 'chang / lag na rdo rje khod
82a5(rgyud): ni dam tshig shes pa yin la/ san gang dag dam tshig mi shes par brjod pa rnams ni rdo rjes mthar byed pa yid / khyo da ji ltar gsang sngags 'chang gsol ba/ bac+do~Ms dang
82a6(rgyud): lha lags mod kyi/ bcom ldan 'das gang dag rig pa mchog 'di'i don 'don pa dang / 'chang ba dang // mchod pa bgyid pa de dag ni bdag gi dang tshig 'tshal ba lags/ bdag gi
82a7(rgyud): dkyil 'khor du zhugs pa lags pas/ bcom ldan 'das kyis gnang bar mdzad gsol/ de nas bcom ldan 'das la gnod sbyin gyi bdag po lag na rdo rjes 'di skad ces
82a8(rgyud): gsol to// bac+doMs bdag gi yi ge bzhi pa zhes bgyi ba 'di ni rig pa'i tshogs thad kyi snying por gyur pa las mang po rab tu sgrub pa/ stobs dang pha rol gnon pa dpag tu ma
82b1(rgyud): pa bstan pa thogs pa ma mchis pa ste/ bcom ldan 'das rig pa'i rgyal po bshad par 'gyi'o// kye kye lha yul dang / sa dang / tshul gnas pa'i 'byung ba'i tshogs rnams khang yid rtsa
82b2(rgyud): gcig tu gyis la nyon cig/ rdo rjes mgo bkas par gyur tere/ de nas lag na rdo rjes rang gi rig pa'i tshogs la bltas nas gsang sngaT smras pa/ na mo rat+na tra ya s+ya/ na ma ts+tshaN+Ta badz+ra pA
82b3(rgyud): s+ya ma hA yak+Sha se rA ba tI sa/ ma hA shAkya saM bud+d+ha ya/ biR+YaM/ kirI/ mirI/ tirI/ Shid+yA ta ta ma ya rtsi ni maM li swA hA/ de nas thad ldan pa'i 'khor de 'dar yed yod nas thal mo sbyar te/ bac+doMs
82b4(rgyud): la 'di skad ces gsol to// bcom ldan 'das bdag cag la bskyab du gsol// bde par gshegs pa bdag cag la bskyab du gsol// de nas gnod sbyin gyi dbang po lag na rdo rjes nga
82b5(rgyud): dang ldan pa'i 'khor la grogs po dag ma 'ji shig/ ma 'jigs shig/ rig pa'i rgyal po dran par gyis gces dbugs phyung // de nas thad dang ldan pa'i 'khor
82b6(rgyud): ngo mtshar du gyur nas bcom ldan 'das la 'di skad ces gsol to// bac+doMs byang chub senga' lagar rdo rje 'di lta bu'i gsang sngan kyi tshig dag 'chad pa ni ngo mtshar to// bac+doMs bdag
82b7(rgyud): cag ni rig pa'i rgyal po gang na gnas der mchod par 'tshalo// su klog pa dang / mchod par bgyid pa dang / sgrub pa'i rir sngags 'chang de'i brtson pa bskyed par bgyi'o// bka' stsal ba
82b8(rgyud): kyi bu dag de de bzhin te/ dede bzhino// de nas rig pa'i rgyal po'i las ni 'di lags ma srang bu'am/ thal ba'am tshul lan cig brjod pas srung bar 'gyuraro// rigs sngar bcad dmachod
83a1(rgyud): / bo la lan gnyis brjod de rtsa ku sha bcad// yang na sa dra'o// de ltar na rigs sngags zad bcad par 'gyuraro// lan gsum brjod na rigs sngags tshang bar 'gyur te/ mar
83a2(rgyud): gyi ngo zhag brgyad la 'phags pa lag na rdo rje'i mdun du mchod pa bgyis la rigs sngags gang yi ge pa tshang ba 'am/ drad pa nyams pa de lan brgya rtsa brgyad brjod de rig pa'i
83a3(rgyud): mchog gi snying po dang lhan cig tu lan gsum brjod na rmi lam du ston to// ci ste las bcad par gyur nartsa ku shas byeb par bya ste rdzogs par 'gyuraro// lag na rdo rje'i mdud du
83a4(rgyud): lan bzhi brjod na dge ba dang mi dag pa ston tra'agyuraro// ci 'dod pa yid bzhin du sbyor ba bgyis na lasam su 'gyuro// gdon tshar bcad na thal ba 'am chu 'am
83a5(rgyud): dur khrod kyi sol bas bsnun no// yang na gzugs bgyis te lcug mas gzhus na gtong bar 'gyu ro// yang na sa la gzugs bgyis te dur khrod kyi sol bas lag mthil
83a6(rgyud): la rdo rje bris te lag pas bkab na gtong bar 'gyuraro// skud pa la mdud pa bor ba rnams kyis rig sngags bci // mkha' 'gro ma rnams bcad par bgyi na yungs kar dag
83a7(rgyud): la lan bdun bdun bsngags te bsnun na mkha' 'gro me thad ma rungs par 'gyuraro// dbab par bgyi marna bar bzlas brjod bgyi'o// yang na tsan dan dmar pos dkyil 'a
83a8(rgyud): byugs la rdo rje rtse lnga pa bris te gu gul gyis bdug pa dang / me tog rnams kyis dbab bo// phyag rgya gzhig na chu'am/ thal lcag ma/ so phag gi dum bu rnams kyis// 
83b1(rgyud): dug las gson chu'am/ rmya ba'i mdongs sam/ chu dri'am/ me long gi so// mar gyi po nag bcu bzhi nas lag na rdo rje'i mdun du zhag gsum bsnyung bar byas la brgyad stong bzlas
83b2(rgyud): brjod bgyi'o// de nas bcom ldan 'das lag na rdo rjes dam pa stsol bar 'gyur te/ de'i 'og tu dug gso ba la sogs pa dang / las gzhan rnams kyang bgyi'o// gal te mkha' gro
83b3(rgyud): rnams shin tu bcad par 'tshal na/ de nas lag na rdo rje'i mdun du 'bras kyi zegs mas lan brgya stong sbyin sreg bgyis na lag na rdo rjes ji skad bshad pa bzhin du tshe ji tsam thub
83b4(rgyud): bar rig sngags thadas rungs par 'gyur// seng ldeng gi rdo rje 'gyi saM tI/ rig sngags 'chang gi ming nas brjod la sa la lan cig btsugs dab shig par 'gyur to// de phyin ca
83b5(rgyud): rig sngags 'chang de rigasang sngags rnams mi 'jug gi/ rig sngags bcad par bgyi 'tshal na/ rig sngags 'chang gi gzugs bkris pa bcod na pa
83b6(rgyud): ba bgyis par 'gyu ro// rig sngags bshig/ bar bgyid 'tshal bas rig sngags de rig pa mchog gi snying po dang lhan cig brjod na rig sngags thad bshig par
83b7(rgyud): 'gyur te las mi bgyida'o// rig pa 'gugs par 'tshal bas mar gyi ngo zhag brgyad la nyin zhag gcig bsnyung ba bgyis la lag na rdo rje'i mdud du mchod par bgyis te/ rig pa
83b8(rgyud): mchog gi snying po dang lhan cig lan brgya stong bzlas brjod bgyis na rig pa 'gugs te phyis rig pa smra'o// rig pa nyams par bgyis na bzlas brjod pas pa mchog ste/ che/ 
84a1(rgyud): / ge bo'i rig pa la gnod pa mdzod cig ces bgyis na rig pa de las mi bgyidado// rig pa tshar bcad par bgyi na thal ba la gzugs bgyi ste/ rig pa mchog gi snying po dang lhan cig
84a2(rgyud): brjod la rkang pa g.yon pas kyang phyis na rig pa smad pa dang nyams par 'gyur te las mi bgyid do// gal te rig sngags 'chang gzhig par 'tshal na lag na rdo rje'i mdun du rig sngags 'chang gi
84a3(rgyud): ming nas brjod par me'i snying po po dang bcas pa bdud sbyin sreg bgyis na rig sngags 'chang ba bshig par 'gyur te/ bsod nams kyang 'jig go// srog kyang 'jigo// rig sngags 'chang de'i
84a4(rgyud): tshe ji tsam par gsang sngags rnams mi 'gru'o// slar gso bar bgyi na ma la te'i me tog mar las skyugs pa'i sbyin sreg bgyi ba lan nyi shu rtsa gcig la mdun du sgyid sreg bgyi na rig
84a5(rgyud): 'gru'o// las 'di dag ni ma bsgrubs kyang bgyid/ tsaM ste brjid 'a tshal na ril 'dzegs te kha zas 'o skyo 'thung zhing lan 'bum bzlas brjod 'gyis ni rig pa'i rgyal por
84a6(rgyud): mchog rang gi gzugasu mthong bar 'gyur te de la bu ci bya zhes gsung bar 'gyuraro// de nas bac+doMs las thaMd mdzod du gsol zhes brjod par bgyi'o// de bzhin du gyur cig ces brjod nas mi snang
84a7(rgyud): bar 'gyur ro// de nas yid kyis bzlas brjod bgyis ni rig sngags 'chang yang 'gu go// grog mkhar gyi sa las sbrul bgyis te sngags kyis btab na klu tha~Md mchi'o// dbang du yang 'gyu ro// 
84a8(rgyud): ma la lan bdun bsngags te mtshor bor na mtsho skam par 'gyuraro// 'bab chu chen por bor na 'bab chu chen po skam par 'gyur// gang du bor ba de skam par 'gyuraro// bdag gi rig pa'i rgyal po
84b1(rgyud): 'di ni rig pa'i rgyal po tha dang rig pa thad kyi mchog tu brjod pa'o// gal rig pa gzhan dag gi las maM 'tshal na yang sbyor ba 'dis/ rig pa thams cad sbyor bar bgyi'o// las thang bgyid// 
84b2(rgyud): bgyid na rig pa'i rgyal po ldan cig lan gsum brjod la 'ga' zhig ma mchis na/ nga'i 'gro dum du zir thig le'i snyim po nying du 'gas par 'gyuraro// gang go tsha gsang ba pa rnams kyi gsang
84b3(rgyud): sngags grub pa do tshe/ las thang tu rig pa'i mchog bzlas brjod 'gyi'o// mar gyi po dag brgyad la nyin na gcig bsnyung ba 'gyis te lagar rdo rje'i mdun du mchod pa bgyis la bsrang spu 'thun
84b4(rgyud): gyi mar sar blangs te/ mar sar des seng ldang gi mer la brgyad sdong sbyin sreg bgyis na/ rig pa'i mchog rig pa sgrub pa rnam sa la dam pa stsol bar 'gyuraro// gang gi pha
84b5(rgyud): rol 'bros par 'gying 'tshal na phub ma las lad brgya spong sbyin bsreg pa'o// so phag gis kyang 'phangs na 'bros par 'gyuraro// bar gyi nyin zhag cig bsnyung ba bgyis pa lag
84b6(rgyud): nardo rje'i mdun du a rma bi zhugs bus la rtswa dung ba'i lo ma lan brgyad stong sbyin srog bgyis na 'in cig rjed par 'gyuro// bar gyi bzhig bcu bzhinas zhag gsum bsrung ba 'gyis te las
84b7(rgyud): rdo rje'i mdud du mi tog ku mu dang / zho dang / sbrang rtsi dang / mar la skyugs pa khri ma'i nang du spyir sreg bgyis na dpal che bar 'gyuraro// rgya mtsho'i dbu ba dang / rgyu spos dang / ljong ngas rnams tshamanyam
84b8(rgyud): te rdza ba'i'i khris par nga/ rol bu sra ma tsam du bgyis te la gon rdo rjes mdud du rig pa'i mchog lan brgyad stong bzlas brjod bgyis la sbrul gyis zin pa la chu las btang na 'jog
85a1(rgyud): zin pa yang 'tsho'o// srid bus zin pa dang / khas baljags dang / 'bras phreng bar gyur pa la chab bskol ba las btingo // sbrus ma bu pa phyin pa la ni bar las bdang na bde tra
85a2(rgyud): btsa' bar 'gyu ro// byis pa gdon gyis zin da bdug pas bdags pas gtong bar 'gyuraro// bud pad kyis nad la ni dar ba las btango // phug tu 'drugau na lus la bsku'o// sgrub pa na bdag
85a3(rgyud): la bdugs na log 'dren thaMd las thar par 'gyuraro// lag na rdo rje'i mdun du srad bu la rig pa'i mchog brgyad stong bzlas brjod bgyis te/ lag pa la btags nas g.yul ngor zhugs na
85a4(rgyud): rol gyis maM tshugs par 'gyuraro// sbyin sreg 'gyi sa pa'i thal ba 'am/ thal ba gtsang mas kham por bkang la rig pa mchog bzlas brjod bgyis na rkun po gang ni 'dug
85a5(rgyud): bder mchi'o// gang gis rig pa'i rgyal po 'drim dkyis bzlas brjod bgyis pa de la dbang phyug chen po dang / dbang phyug chen po'i tshogs dang / bgeg dang lag 'dren dang / ma
85a6(rgyud): 'gro ma dang / srin po dang / sha za dang / gnod sbyin dang / 'byung po dang / grul bum dang / srul po dang / mdangs 'phrog pa dang / gdod rgyan pa dang / ma mo dang / lag na rdo rje'i phag brnyan dang / gang gi
85a7(rgyud): kyang glags me snyed kyi lag na rdo rjes de'i mgo 'gem so// bac+doMs kyi spyan snga 'am/ logs gtsang mar mchod pa bgyis te/ rtsa ku sha'i mdung rtse gsum pa thogs la yungs kar zho dang / 
85a8(rgyud): sbrang rtsi dang / mar bsregs pa sbyin blugs lan nyi shu rtsa gcig sbyin sreg bgyi zhing nyin bdun dus gsum du gcer bus ska bshig la bigyis na nor stsol bar bgyi // mar gyi ngo zhag/ 
85b1(rgyud): drug nas brtsams te mtsho 'grab du mchis la mar gyi ngo zhag brgyad pa'i bar du yungs kar dag las sbyin sreg lan brgya stong bgyis na nor dang gos rnams stsol bar 'gyuraro// 'phags pa
85b2(rgyud): rig pa'i rgyal po'i mchog sgrub pa ni ri mo mkhan gso sbyong gzung bas ma gong po'i ras la sbyin dang ma 'dres pa'i tshon rtsi rnams kyis sangs rgyas kyi sku gzugs bri bar bgyi'o// g.yas
85b3(rgyud): phogasu lag na rdo rje stan nang tshangs can gyi steng na mchis par bri'o// lag na rdo rje'i 'og tu rig pa'i mchog bla'o// bcom ldan 'das ni gser gyi kha dog lnga bu'o// lag na rdo rjeni sngo bsangs
85b4(rgyud): rgyar zad kyis brgyad pa'o// ga pa'i rgyal po yang sngo bsangs te/ rgyan tha~Md kyis brgyan la stan gong bu'i snang na mchis par bri'o// mar gyi ngo zhag bcu pa'i la zhim zhag gcig bsrung ba
85b5(rgyud): dbyis te/ ci nus su mchod par bgyis la rgyal bo'i blo gros kyis rig pa'i rgyal po dgug par bgyi'o// rdo rje/ 'i khas nye reg bgyi'o// rdo rje'i lta bas spos dbul bar 'gyir
85b6(rgyud): me kha las matog dbul bar bgyi'o// gdong dkar gyis srung bar bgyi'o// rdo rje sar mos khrus bgyi'o// nag mos khu ba bcing bar bgyi'o// gyen du lba ba'i gdong gis phyogs bcing bar bgyi
85b7(rgyud): rdo rje'i seng ge khris 'dug par 'gyi'o//  rje ldan pas bgegs garam par bgyi'o// shugs ldan mas slar gsheg su gso ma// yis rig pa mchog ga ro'i gzugs kyi bdun du gu
85b8(rgyud): gul gyi ril bu brkyang steng sbyin sreg bgyis na dngos grub gyi mtshan mar bac+doMs kyi gzugs 'gul bar 'gyuraro// zhag bdun na ti nor brgya rnyed par 'gyur// yang na long spyod stsol bar 'gyur
86a1(rgyud): // mar gyi ngo nag brgyad na lag na rdo rje'i mdun du du ru ka'i 'bras bu las lan brgyad brgya sbyin sreg bgyis na gang 'dod pa de spro bar 'gyuraro// lag na rdo rje'i bdud du bar dang gu gul gyi
86a2(rgyud): ril bu brgyad brgya'i srid sreg bgyis ra sos par 'gyuraro// mar gyi ngo dag brgyad la nyin zhag gcig bsnyung ba bgyis te shing a shwad+tha'i lo ra dab kyi steng du ldong ros bzhag la ji srid kyis
86a3(rgyud): gsum grub pa de sridadu bzlas brjod bgyi'o// dro bar gyur na rkang pas mchi'o// du ba 'phrul na mi sdang ba dang lo bdun stong du 'tsho'o// 'bar na bskal par gnas par 'gyur// rlung bzhin du lag na rdo rje'i
86a4(rgyud): gan su mche zhing kha zas ci 'dod pa za'o// a tha rA dzA rA pa shi d+hu kA ma kr-i ta aSh+Ta pa a ho rA tr-i shi te na badz+ra pA tre sa a gra ta arka kab+d+ha ag+ni pradzA la/ ru d+hir a ga taH ti lA rA ak+tA sa ha sa
86a5(rgyud): shudzu sa da rA dza ba sho ba ti badz+ra kA mo ba se ha ti/ tsi sta dag gsod par 'dod ni lag na rdo rje'i bdun du seng ldeng gi zhugs bus la yungs kar dang ska tshe'i 'bru las lan brgyad stong
86a6(rgyud): sbyin sreg bgyis na ngag 'chi'o// gnod par sems par bgyis na lag na rdo rje'i mdun du yi dwags kyi shing gi zhugasu bus la til nag po la lan brgya stong sprid sreg bgyis na gnod pa
86a7(rgyud): sems par bgyis par 'gyuraro// mar gyi ngo zhag bcu bzhi la nyin zhag gcig bsnang ba bgyis te lag na rdo rje'i rkang pa g.yas pa'i mthe bong las gzung la de'i ming nas phyung ste bzlas brjod
86a8(rgyud): bgyis na 'phral du dgar mi 'gyuraro// mar gyi ngo zhag brgyad la nyin zhag gcig bsnyung ba bgyis te rig pa mchog sngags kyis btab pa'i 'chang gis rdo rje bkrus la rigs sngaT kyang lan/ 
86b1(rgyud): brkyang 'argya bzlas brjod bgyis na gang gis ming nas phyung ste bzlas brjod bgyis pa de gdon gyis zin par mi 'gyur/ rdo rje'oms dgrus la rig sngags lan brgyad stong bzlas pa bgyis na so
86b2(rgyud): bar 'gyuraro// yul 'khor gzhig par 'dod pas sang ldeng gi rdo rje bgyis la yar gyi ngo tshes bcu gnyis la lag na rdo rje'i mdun du lan brgya stong bzlas brjod bgyis te/ shul gyi bzhi mdor
86b3(rgyud): btsugs na yul 'khor 'jig par 'gyuraro// phyung nas bsngags na sngags 'kho zhing rtag par 'gyuraro// mar ngo'i zhag dgu la lag na rdo rje'i mdun du rig pa mchog gis se tshe'i 'brul
86b4(rgyud): lan brgyad stong bzlas brjod bgyis na phung bar 'gyur// ga na rdo rje'i mdun du mar dang sras pa'i ske tsha'i 'bru las lan brgyad stong srin srog bgyis na brtas par 'gyur
86b5(rgyud): mar gyi ngo zhag brgyad la ba smad bu 'thur gyi 'o ma blangs te rig pa mchog gi bzlas brjod pas shing bsrungs la/ da las mang sar blangs te thong po'i rang du bzhag la thong ba bablangs
86b6(rgyud): mar gri ngo zhag bcu bzhi la nyir zhag gcig bsnang ba bgyis la mngon mtshan gcig yod par song ste/ 'byung po thad pa'i gtor ma bgyis la/ thod pa de thogs te lus kyi lho phogasu jug
86b7(rgyud): la ji tsam na 'bar ba de srid bzlas brjod bgyi'o// de nas de 'thungs na ci 'dod pa'i gzugasu 'gyu ro// na mkha' la 'gro bar 'gyur ro// mi snang bar 'gyuraro// gzugs sna tshogs ston par 'gyu/ 
86b8(rgyud): so lnga brgya 'tsho bar 'gyuro/ bdag rig pa'i rgyal po'i mchog 'di ni rig pa zad kyi gtso ba'o// bdag srung nags kyi mtha' mar mdud pa deng/ gzhan srung na spyi gtsug tu sku mdud do/ u / 
87a1(rgyud): // khum pi ra'i kha bcings na pogs pazhir chu ga tor// stag la ni yid kyis dkyil 'khor bgyis na bcings par 'gyuro// mtshams bca ra yungs kar gyi so// zhing srung na phur bu da
87a2(rgyud): slar srung na yid kyis rig pa'i mchog sbyar bar bgyi'o// gzhan yang sgrub na ba god pa'i ras la sbyin dang ma 'dres pa'i mtshor rtsi rnabs kyis rig pa'i rgyal po'i mchog bri bar bgyi snga / 
87a3(rgyud): sngo bsangs sham thabs sar mo// lag po g.yon na 'gas pa/ g.yas pas dam pa sbyin pa bri bar ba'o// 'og tu sgrub pa po la ban po ga phor thogs pa bri'o// zhag bdud za su'o sgo btu ngo // tha ma
87a4(rgyud): zhag gsum bsnyung ba bgyis te mar gyi ngo nag bcu bzhi la ci nus kyis mchod pa bgyis la skra tshogs las zhags pa bgyis te/ lag pa g.yas par thogs 'ji srid rang gi gzugs kyis
87a5(rgyud): 'chi ba de sa du bzlas brjod bgyi'o// rdo rje bzhadams slar gzhug ste/ de bu tsi ba zhes smra bar 'gyuraro// des tshangs pa'am/ khab 'ju lam/ dbang phyug char po'i pha che ge mo nas pa
87a6(rgyud): bzhags pas bzung la khrid de spyon cig ces brjod// yang na rgyal po 'am/ gnod sbyin name/ srin po 'am/ sha za 'am/ gang dgag par 'dod na de dgug pa ste de dag bde phag brnyar du
87a7(rgyud): 'gyu ro/ gang bsams pa de 'tshal te mchi'o// gang na ma god pa'i ras la ri mo mkhon gso sbyong bzung bas sbyin dang ma 'dres pa'i tshon rtsi rnams kyis rig pa'i rgyal po'i mchog bri bar ba
87a8(rgyud): steng mdog sngo bsangs rgyan zad kyis brgyan pa/ stod g.yogs dang dkar/ smad g.yogs so/ lag pa bzhi pa/ lag pa gi mod pa gcig 'ardo rje/ gcig na lcags kyu g.yas pa gcig
87b1(rgyud): basbyin pa/ gcig btson thogs par bri bar bgyi'o// 'og tu sgrub pa po lag na bol phor thogs par bgyi'o// g.yas phyogasu rdo rje khu tshur mdog gser lta bu rgyan thaMd kyis brgyan pa/ lag
87b2(rgyud): ga'i gnardo rje thogs pa dri'o// gamod logasu rdo rje bla gros bri bar bgyi ste/ de yang mdog gsar lta bu rgyan thad kyis brgyan par bgyi thong nas rdo rje sgrub pa ni zla ba gcig slongs mo'i zas
87b3(rgyud): zos la tha mar lus sbyang bar brdzi ste/ cho 'bral gyi zla ba nyal zhag gsum bsnyung ba bgyis la lcags snga gsum la bgyis pa'i rdo rje ri mo'i sku gzugs kyi mdung du shing a shwad+tha'i lo
87b4(rgyud): pa bdun gyi steng du bzhag la sgrub ste ji srid kyis 'bar ba de sI du bzlas brjod bgyi'o// 'bar nas blang bar bgyi ste/ blangs ma thag tu lag na rdo rje 'dra bar 'gyur// nyi ma shar ba'i
87b5(rgyud): kha dog 'dra bar 'gyur/ rig sngags 'chang gi 'khor los bsgyur bar 'gyuraro// de nas lcags kyu bsgrubs na spyad par bgyi ste/ rtswa ku sha rtsa ba med pa las lcags kyu bgyis la par
87b6(rgyud): gyi ngo 'gro bcu pa'i la zhag gsum bsnyung ba bgyis te ri ma'i sku gzugs kyi mdun du mchod pa rgya cher 'igyis la me tog gi steng du bzhag te/ de'i steng du lag pa bdag la ji srid kyis 'ja
87b7(rgyud): bai de sridadu bzlas brjod bgyi'o// 'bar nas blang bar bgyi ste/ blangs ma thag tus seng ge mthong zhing tshangs pa'i gnasu 'chi bar 'gyuraro// lag na lcags kyu thogs ma sum cu rtsa gsum ba
87b8(rgyud): kyang zil gyis mnang par mi nu'o// bcom sgrub pa bshad par bgyi ste/ lcags sna gsum las be chen sor bcu drug pa/ dbebs tho ba 'dra bzung drug par bgyi'o// sngar spyod pa 'gyis la
88a1(rgyud): // gyaM ngo zhag bcu bzhi la zhag gsum bsnang ba bgyis te ri mo'i sku gzugs kyi mdun du mchod pargya d+har bgyis la ras dkar po'i sdang du bzhag ste ji srid 'bar ba de srid du bzlas brjod
88a2(rgyud): bgyi'o// de nas blangs ma thag tu lag na rdo rje 'dra bar 'gyur te/ lag na rdo rje dang / stobs panyami ste/ lag na rdo rje'i gnasu 'chi bar 'gyuraro// dngos grub rnam pa gsum la bskal par gnas
88a3(rgyud): bar 'gyuro// sgrub pa thedu pho nya po rnams kyis las thaMd bgyis te rig pa sna tshogs sbyar bar bgyi'o// de ltar gang rig pa'i rgyal po 'dod pa dang / mchod pa de de bzhin gshegs pa thang
88a4(rgyud): mchod pa lagaso// mnyes par bgyis pa lag so// thod pa blangs te khrag gis bkang ste mar gyi ngo nag brgyad la nyid zhag gcig bsnyung ba bgyis te/ khang stong ma/ kun dga'i ra bar ji srid
88a5(rgyud): kyis bud med 'byung ba de srid bzlas brjod bgyi'o// de la tshe ge mo zhes bya ba la gnod pa gyis shig par brjod na gnas par bgyida'o// gnod pa bgyi du 'jugo// rings pa
88a6(rgyud): bgyi'o// rig pa'i rgyal po 'od 'gug pa 'dis bkug nas phyis rgyal ba'i blo gros kyis dgug par bgyi'o// na mo ratra tra ya sa/ na ma sh+tsaN+Da badz+ra pA tri s+ya/ ma hA yak+Sha se nA pa tri s+ya/ tu ru tu ru
88a7(rgyud): tsu ru tsu ru/ kaM raM ki ri/ rai tra pra tsaN+Da yaM Ta ya/ A gats+tsha a gaun+d+haM/ ma ma ar+t+ta ma/ pa ri pU ra ya/ a skr-i ta bid+yA d+ha rod ta ma a haM/ ste A kaR+Sha ya mi/ ma ma sarba ar+tha ma nor tha raM pU ra ko b+ha ba ma ma
88a8(rgyud): ar+tha sing d+hiny+tsa dam ci ku ru swA hA/ tse ste tshes brgyad la sgrub par 'tshal ni tshes bdun gyi pham ra dgu yul gyis bdugs la gsang sngags lan brgya rtsa brgyad brjod/ sgrub pa ni rgyal
88b1(rgyud): ba'i blo gros kyis dgu go / sgrub pa thang dang / las thadu yang dgug pa 'dis dgugo// na mo rAt+na tra ya s+ya/ na ma sh+tsar+tha badz+ra pA Ni s+ya/ pa hA ya k+Sha sa nA ba tIs/ dza ya ma ti/ dzin ti dzi na d+ha ri Ni A ba sha ma
88b2(rgyud): da sha Sha shwe ba/ de ba nA ga ya~Mk+Sha ge d+harba kA nu tsarma ru shi la stsal tu/ kr-iSh+Ta b+hU ma pa Sha ye/ shAM g+h+raM badz+ra pA tsi ste Adz+nyA pa ya ba~M swA hA/ rgyal ba'i blo gros 'dis dgug par 'gyi'o// nas rdo rje lha
88b3(rgyud): sgrog gis bcing bar bgyi'o//  mo rAt+natra yA ya/ na ma sh+tsaN+Da badz+ra pA pra li/ ma hA ya k+Sha sa nA pa Sha ya/ ku ru ku ru/ tse ba tsa ta/ ma la ma la/ sa ra sa ra/ tiSh+Tha tiSh+Tha/ ma hA ba la/ sa ma ya ma nu
88b4(rgyud): s+pha ra saMd+han pa sh+tsad+d+ha badz+ra pA Ni/ Adz+nyA pa ya ti swAhA/ rdo rje lcags sgrog 'dis gu gural gyi ril bu gsum yungs kar gyi 'bru bar du sgrags la sbyin sreg bgyis ma
88b5(rgyud): bcings par 'gyur// rab pa bang sgrub pa dang / pho nya mo yang rung ste/ de 'od nyid kyis bcing bar bgyi'o// rdo rje sar pos bcing ba las grel bar 'gyi'o// na mo rat+na tra yA ya
88b6(rgyud): namash+tsaN+Ta badz+ra pA Na ya a hA ya k+Sha~M se nA pa Sha ye shu lu hu lu/ gats+tsha gats+tsha ma hA da la swa b+hA ba nas bu nan la gan sa ya ku ru ku ru/ gats+tsha gan+d+ha swAhA// che ba khor ba gsum gting ba ci
88b7(rgyud): kyang dbu'o// de nas shugs ldan gyis slar gshegasu gsolo// na ma~M badz+ra pA Na ya/ kha Da pa Sha/ gats+tsha gats+tsha/ b+ha ga ba ti ma hA yArba d+hi ba Na/ tsau rol tsan li/ dzi ra la tsi ni li/ hi ri la aH
88b8(rgyud): ga ne ku ru swA hA/ shugs ldan gyis slar gshegasu gsol ba'i sngab te/ a ka ru'i bdug pa la lan bdun bzlas brjod bgyis paso// na mo badz+ra pA Ni s+ya/ na ma ste b+ha ga ba ti/ badz+ra pu khi
89a1(rgyud): / r-i Sh+Te/ gar te ga pe/ rkan rtag ni ti swAhA/ nye reg bya ba'i gsang sngag so// na mo dz+ra bA dz+r-i sa dz+wal brgya tsing ku ru d+ha ru/ la hrul hu/ prA tI gr-id+d+ha s+thA/ oM marga N+Da hA pa kA la
89a2(rgyud): swAhA/ spos kyi gseng sngag so// na mo badz+ra pA Ni s+ya/ da hi da ha/ btso ba tsa/ ba d+ha be d+ha/ shaM khi swA hA/ me tog gi gsang sngag so// na mo badz+ra pA Ni s+ya/ a te ni/ tsi lo ni/ kha la karma Ni/ dar tsi
89a3(rgyud): na tsi li ni swA hA/ bdug pa'i gsang sngagaso// na mo badz+ra pA Ni s+ya na ma ste/ b+ha ga ba ti sha ta mu khi ma hA gau ri tsa tshu le/ tsu tsu le/ tsi tsau rak+Sha rAk+Sha swA hA/ srad bus srung bar bgyi'o// na mo
89a4(rgyud): bA dzi s+ya/ ka ta ka ta/ ma ta ma ta/ ra ra ra ra/ badz+ra bi ga la/ ma ta dar dar ni/ ki ri Ni ki ri Ni/ ki ri tsi ki ri swA hA/ khrus 'gyi byer gsang sngagaso// na mo badz+ra pA tri s+ya/ na ma ste/ b+ha ga ba ti/ da
89a5(rgyud): kha ti sha ba ti/ sa ha sra ba ti A gats+tsha/ shI g+h+ra kai ki ri/ shu kra bi d+ha ba d+ha swAhA/ srad bu la lan bdun lnga/ sa brjod bgyis te khu ba bcing // na mo badz+ra ba tri s+ya/ uH
89a6(rgyud): ma rAk+Sha/ a d+ho rak+Sha/ tsa tur di shaM rak+Sha/ ma tha ma the/ trA sa ya trA sa ya/ stam b+ha ya stam b+ha ya/ ud d+h+r-i ta badz+ra Adz+nyA pa ya ti swA hA/ yungs kar la lan nyi shu rtsa gcig bzlas brjod
89a7(rgyud): bgyis tre phyogs bcing // na mo badz+ra bA tri s+ya/ tad+ya thA/ badz+re badz+re Ni khadz+ra si ha ni khadz+ra pA Ni/ br-i ye badz+ra ba ra de bi ka te/ deSh+pa ka rI la ba naM/ le po dar baM ki ta/ gau ra rU pa dang sha na mardza
89a8(rgyud): rabak+She madz+dzi/ mAM sa pri ye/ e hi e hi b+ha ba tAM byai ku ru br-i dz+wa la~M ta ta ke shi aM dam nu sha sha rI ra/ ma nu pra bi she/ ka ta ka ta/ pu re bu ra/ d+hu na d+hu na/ ba ta pa ta/ khal+lu bak+ku/ ha sa ha sa/ A
89b1(rgyud): bi she A di she/ swa ta swa ta/ kai tsir ya si/ thA ga ba ti/ Sha hu rU be/ angad b+hi ka sr-i ga la he ru ka ra bid dze/ a Ta Ta Ta Da ha se/ i ma se tu sta/ gra ha s+ya hr-i da ye/ b+hi da b+he da/ tsa la tsa la/ gu pu hra
89b2(rgyud): mu ku ru ke ru/ A bi sha A bai sha/ badz+ra pA mi A dz+nyA pa ya ti sAhA/ las bdu rtsa ku sha skams pa la sngags kyis btab ste bdug par bgyi'o// na mo badz+ra pA dza~M s+ya/ la la ha se has/ 
89b3(rgyud): badz+ra tsa ku ru ku ru/ kam+ba kam+be/ tsa la tsa la/ dzamra dza l+le sA hA/ gshegs nas gsung du gzhu'o// na mo badz+ra pA tri s+ya/ d+hu d+hu ma sa la ma sa la / d+hu ru ma a ma ma/ badz+ra pA Ni lak+Sha d+hi ba tim
89b4(rgyud): ma ka sh+tsing ba~Mg+h+ra~M ku ru swAhA// yungs kar ram/ thal bas bgegs rab tu zhi bar bya'o// ci ste rig sngags 'cha grub pa rnams kyi rig pa bcad par 'tshal ne mar gyi
89b5(rgyud): bco lnga la lag na rdo rje'i mdun du bku la'i me tog/ dag las lan brgyad stong sbyin sreg bgyis na rig sngags 'chang tha~Md kyi rig sngags bcad par 'gyur// ma god dI
89b6(rgyud): ras la sbyin dang ma 'dres pa'i chen rtsi rnams kyis rig pa'i mchog bri bar 'gyi ste/ mdog sngo bsangs rgyan thad kyis brgyan pa'o// sgyid sreg brtse ba bza' zhing bri bar bgyi'o// mang
89b7(rgyud): gyi ngo zhag bcu bzhi la zhag gcig bsnyung ba bgyis te ri mo'i sku gzugs kyi mdun du ni nus su mchod pa bgyis la byang chub kyi shing gis zhugs bus te ta ma la'i me tog maral
89b8(rgyud): spyugs pa brgyad stong sbyin sreg 'gyis na ri mo'i sku gzugs 'gulo// me tog gi phreng ba yang 'gu'o// de nas mtshan mo'i lha mo me tog ces bgyi ba grub par 'gyur te/ lha mo me tog
90a1(rgyud): gi las rnamasu 'gyuraro// rig sngags 'chang gi rig pa'i sgrub pa la bgegasu mi 'gyuro// log 'dren gyis mi tshug so// dngos grub 'dis mtshan po'i lha mo bzhi dngos gru
90a2(rgyud): tu 'gyur te/ srod ni lha mo me tog gi'o// mjing ni lha mo phreng ba'i'o// nam gung ni lha mo ku mu da'i'o// tho rangs ni lha mo mdzes ma'i'o// rig sngags 'chang ni rig pa sgrubar srod la
90a3(rgyud): log 'dren gan su 'ong ste/ de nas mtshan mo'i lha mo ba tog gis log 'dren mthong nas bac+doMs lag na rdo rje'i yid la bgyi // lag na rdo rje yid la bgyis pas log 'dren rnams
90a4(rgyud): skrag cing nyams te nyam thag nas 'bros par 'gyuraro// lag na rdo rje rig sngags 'chang de'i mdun du 'dug cing dngos grub kyang myur du stsol bar bgyi do// 'jing la gal te bgags
90a5(rgyud): byung na mtshan mo'i lha mo phreng ba des lha chen po la bac+doMs lag na rdo rje khyod la 'bod zhes sgrog so// des de thos nas snying 'dar zhing byur bu myur bar bdun du 'dug
90a6(rgyud): des na rig sngags 'chang de la bgegasu mi 'gyuraro// dngos grub kyang byung du 'gru'o// nam gu la gal te bgags byung na mtshan mo'i lha mo ku mu dang yang / rgyal po che ni ba bzhi
90a7(rgyud): kye kye btsun pa kun dag lag na rdo rje khyod la 'bod zhes sgrogs// de dag gis tshig de thos nas snying 'ad zhing myur bu myur bar mdun du 'dug ste/ de nas de la bgagasu mi 'gyuraro// 
90a8(rgyud): tho rangs la gal te bgegs byung na mtshan mo'i lha mo mdzes ma yang log 'dren rnams la kye kye log 'dren sdang ba rnams drag po lag na rdo rjes bka' stsal to zhes bsgo bar
90b1(rgyud): bgyi'o// nga dag gis de'i tshig thos nas phyogs bcur 'bros// des na de la 'gegasu mi 'gyur te bde bar las rnams 'grub par byedo// mar gyi ngo dag brgyad dam/ bcu bzhi la bud med
90b2(rgyud): bu byung ba'i khye'u lta ba sor gnyis tsom bcad la gser gyi gyim bag gis bkris te mar gyi ngo zhag brgyad la nyin zhag gcig bsnyung ba bgyis te/ lag na rdo rje'i mdun du lan
90b3(rgyud): brgyad stong bzlas brjod bgyis na mi snang bar 'gyur// tshe yang nyis 'gyur du 'gyur// zhag bdun du phye thug btudo// phyis mar gyi ngo zhag bcu bzhi nas zhag gsum bsnyung ba brgya
90b4(rgyud): te zhi ba'i mtshan yod par song la mtshan gyi steng gi lho phyogs legasu lag pa g.yas pa gzhag ste skra las bgyis pa'i skud pas bcing // bcings nas ji srid
90b5(rgyud): kyis bcad zhes sgra 'byung ba de srid bzlas pa rjod bgyi/ sgra lan gsum du byung na dngos grub du 'gyuraro/ khu tshur bcangs te sgrub par bgyi'o// khu tshur bcangs nam
90b6(rgyud): snang bar 'gyuraro// sku lcang lo 'khyil bar 'gyuraro// lo bcu drug len pa tsam du 'gyur// lo bdun brgya 'tsho bar 'gyuraro// dbang phyug chen po'i tshogs rnams kyang phyag brnyan du 'gyur
90b7(rgyud): tsaM ste dgra bsad par 'tshal na mar gyi ngo dag bcu bzhi la nyin gcig bsnyung ba 'gyis te/ spre tshil las gzugs bgyis la seng ldang gi phur bu lngas gan du btsugs la du
90b8(rgyud): khro du mchis la dong brkos te dong der bcug la steng du zhugs bus la dug dang / khrag dang yungs kar bsres pa lan brgya stong sbyin sreg bgyis na du zhing tshig ste 'phral du 'gum/ 
91a1(rgyud): mar gyi ngo zhag bcu bzhi la ba ser po'i lci ba sa la ma lhung ba blangs te/ sa phyogs gtsang mar gzugs bgyis la ci nus kyis mchod de/ zhag gcig bsnang ba bgyis la
91a2(rgyud): shing bil ba'i lo pa bsregs shing ro dang / sbrang rtsi dang / bar la skyugs te brgyad stong sbyin sreg bgyis na dpral ba las 'od zer 'byung // de nas dngos grub tu 'gyur te geser dpag tu med
91a3(rgyud): ba stsol bar 'gyu ro// yang na nyin gcig bzhin du ri mar stsol bir 'gyu ro// gseg mi la lan brgyad stong bzlas te dur khro bor na yi dwags thad glu len cing gar byed par 'gyuraro// 
91a4(rgyud): mar gyi ngo zhag bcu bzhi nas lag na rdo rje'i rkang pa'i drung du zhag gsum bsnyung ba bgyis la shing ka ra bi ra'i matog las len brgya stong sbyin sreg bgyi'o// de nas kar bi ra'i ma Nag
91a5(rgyud): dag las me tog cig blangs te klu'i gan su song la bzlas brjod bgyis na klu dang klu mo rnams dbang du' gyur ta ci 'tshal ba rnabs rnya do// lig bu mig dang / gser
91a6(rgyud): dang / mchod pir thogs kyang ka ra bi raM'i me tog dang 'dra'o// gang na gnod sbyin po 'dug pa dang bzlas brjod 'gyis na gnod sbyid po pachi sde rung bar 'gyuraro// yang da dor stsol bar
91a7(rgyud): 'gyur ro// gal ta mi mchin zhag gcig bsnyung ba bgyis te shing ma da na'i tshong ma dang / dug dang / khrag bsres pa lan brgya stong seng ldang gi zhugs la sbyin sreg bgyis da da tshig cing
91a8(rgyud): mi sdug par 'gyur la mchi'o// gal te klu mo mi mchid de la yang de nyid kyis sbyin sreg bgyi'o// yar gyi ngo tshas bco lnga la zhag gsum bsnyung ba bgyis te rgya mtshor 'bab pa'i chu
91b1(rgyud): bor zhugs la klu shing gi me tog brgyad stong byi dor bgyis na dus ma yin par char 'babo// zhag bdun 'o skyo 'thungs la mar gyi ngo nag brgyad la zhag gcig bsnyung ba bgyis te lag
91b2(rgyud): na rdo rje'i mdun du mchod pa bgyis las las bgyis pa'i rdo rje bzhag ste/ de'i rked par shing a shwat+tha'i lo ma bdun bzhag la de'i stang du ldong ros bzhag ste ji srid kyis dngos grub
91b3(rgyud): gsum du gyur pa de srid bzlas brjod bgyi'o// 'bar bar gyur na lo bdun stong du 'tsho'o// lus mdzes par bgyis la mar gyi ngo zhag bcu bzhi la nyin zhag gcig bsnyung ba bgyis te
91b4(rgyud): lam gyi sum mdor mchod pa rgya char bgyis la der 'dug ste ldong ros sran ma tsam zhig khang bcug la ji sri du kha'i nang dugs par gyur pa de srid bzlas brjod
91b5(rgyud): bgyi'o// de nas dngos grub du 'gyur te thig le bgyis na mi snang bar 'gyuraro// lo lnga brgya thub par 'gyur ci 'dod pa'i gzugs can du 'gyur// nyi ma'i gung tshigs la
91b6(rgyud): bgyi'o// tshes grangs dang skar ma 'das mi 'tshal// bsnyung ba bgyi mi 'tshal bar skyes pa'i ro ma rma sa ma nyams pa blangs te/ rdo rje sen mo'o sngags bzlas brjod bgyis la bkru'o// 
91b7(rgyud): rdo rje lta bas spos srul bar bgyi'o// rdo rje ma kha las me tog stsal bar bgyi'o// banas de'i snying khar 'dug ste mi do tsam gyed du ma 'phaT kyi bar du rig pa mchog gi snying po dang ldan
91b8(rgyud): cig bzlas brjod 'gyi'o// gyed du 'phags ma thag tu slar 'og tu ltung / lhung nas bud med bcu nye bar gnas par 'gyur te/ de dag g.yog 'khor rnams la stsal bar bgyi'o// 
92a1(rgyud): de dag kyang stobs mnyam par 'gyuraro// ci ste ma sru la na bdag bud med bcus bskor te mi la zhor te gar dga' ba der mchi'o// yang yid kyis bsams pa de bzhon pa las 'byung
92a2(rgyud): lo brgyad khrir 'tsho bar 'gyuraro// rig sngags 'chang du yang 'gyuraro// mar gyi ngo zhag brgyad dam bcu bzhi la skyes pa shi ba'i ro bzhag pa'i khogs kyi g.yas rol gyi zur shing khar song la
92a3(rgyud): pi ba mar gyi po nag brgyad la daM mdung rtse gsum par bgyis la slongs mo pa'i zas bza' zhing rig sngags 'chang bzlas brjod bgyi'o// pi ma mar gyi po nag brgyad nas zhag gsub bsnyung
92a4(rgyud): bo bgyis te dur khrod song la mdung rtse gsum pa la mchod pa rgya cher bgyis te/ mdung rtse gsum pa lag pa g.yas par thogs la/ rig po'i mchog lan brgyad stong bzlas brjod bgyis
92a5(rgyud): na mdung rtse gsub pa las 'od zer 'byung ste de nas dngos grub du 'gyuraro// mtshan po btsugs na rgyan thaMd kyis ba rgyan pa'i bud med dag 'byung // skyes pa ci la ma rag par
92a6(rgyud): ba dag kyang nye bar gan so// gang bsams pa thad da // phyung na thaMd med par 'gyur// 'byung po rnams phag brnyan du 'gyuraro// cho ga gang la blangs pa'i cho ga de nyid la sgrub par bgyi'o// mar gyi ngo zhag
92a7(rgyud): bcu bzhi la zhag gcig bsnang ba bgyis te lag na rdo rje'i mdun du ci nus kyis mchod pa bgyis la de'i mdun du 'bras chan gyi lo ma bkang ste bzhag la 'bras chen mi snang bar ma gyur gyi bar du
92a8(rgyud): bzlas brjod bgyi'o// de nas dngos grub du 'gyur te phas 'bras cha ni la 'pho bar bgyid// rdzas kyang 'phro bar 'gyur// 'bru'i rnam pa gzhan dag kyang 'pho bar 'gyuraro// mar gyi po nag brgyad la zhag/ 
92b1(rgyud): gcig bsnyung ba bgyis te seng ldeng la bgyis pa'i rdo rje la shing kun gyis bdugs la/ rig pa'i mchog gi snying po dang lhan cig bzlas brjod bgyis na gang gi ming nas phyung ste bzlas brjod bgyis
92b2(rgyud): bde brjed byed kyis zin par 'gyur// lce bog gis bdugs la lan brgya stong bzlas brjod bgyis na gtong bar 'gyur// mar gyi po zhag brgyad la nyin zhag gcig bsnyung ba bgyis lo ya
92b3(rgyud): ran da'i shing gi zhugs bus la ba glang gi lpags pa la bsregs blugs lan brgyad stong ming nas brjod sbyin sreg dgyis na ba glang rnams mchi'o// skyes pa'i rom smad ma nyams pa blangs te
92b4(rgyud): chu 'gram gyi phyogs gcig ma/ skam sa gtsang ma pho nya ma rnams kyis las thaMd bgyi'o// de nas rig sngab 'chang nyi ma'i gung tshigs la mi ro'i mgo shar phyogasu bstan te
92b5(rgyud): pogs bzhir bstan bkur bgyid pa bzhi bzhag par bgyi'o// de nas rig sngags 'chang de'i snying khar ldong ros bcug/ ste dngos grub rnam gsum ma thob kyi bar du bzlas brjod pa'o
92b6(rgyud): 'bar bar gyur na lo sdong thu'o// rkang pa la bskus na lo lnga brgya thub ste 'di ni dngos gru'o// mar gyi pon brgyad la nyin zhag gcig bsnyung ba bgyis ta lag na rdo rje'i mdun du ba la sha'i shing gis
92b7(rgyud): zhugs bus la shing bil ba'i yam sreg shing no dang sbrang rtsi dang / mar las skyugs pa brgyad stong sbyin sreg bgyi zhing ming nas brjod du phyugs chung // gal te mi rnyed na phyugs phyung de mchi'o
92b8(rgyud): dgra gang land kyis btab par bgyid 'tshal na du rta bad la bdag lus la dril ba'i dri ma bsar te/ mang gyi po nag brgyad la lagar rdo rje'i mdud du du ru ka'i shing gi zhugs bus la/ dri ba das
93a1(rgyud): // lan brgyad sto sbyir sreg bgyi'i dming nas brjod na mdzed kyis 'dab so// lag ma rdo rje'i bdud du lnga pog gi 'dug pas bdugs la rig sngags kyang la brgyad stong bzlas brjod
93a2(rgyud): bgyis na gso ba bgyis par 'gyuraro// yar gyi nga 'ag gcig la rgya mtshor 'bab pa'i chu klung du zhugs la zasuM rke spro 'thung zhing zla ba nya'i bar du bzlas brjod bgyis na yul gru 'thob// bram ze
93a3(rgyud): du bgyi na yar gyi ngo ches drag nas brgyad kyi bar du dus gsum du lag ra rdo rje'i mdun du sne pa'i me tog las lar brgya stong bzlas brjod bgyis la tha bar 'ag gcig bsnyung ba bgyis ni smras pa
93a4(rgyud): 'am bud med kyang rung ste/ dbang du 'gyur// mar gyi ngo nag brgyad la zhag gcig bsrung ba bgyis te/ lag na rdo rje'i mdun du bil ba'i shing gis zhugs bus la yungs kar gyi 'bru mar dang
93a5(rgyud): ba'i til las lan brgyad stong sbyin sreg bgyi zhing ming nas brjod na dbang du 'gyur// bud med yugs sa mo dbang du bgyin nyid 'ag gcig bsnyung ba bgyis la lag na rdo rje'i
93a6(rgyud): mdun du arga'i shing gi zhugs bus te/ arga'i me tog mar kha sprugs pa lan brgya spong sbyid sreg bgyi zhing ming nas brjod da dbang du 'gyuraro// dus gsub du khrus bgyi zhing
93a7(rgyud): lag ni rdo rje'i mdun du shing ba da ni 'char ma las lan brgya stong sbyin sreg bgyis na zhag gsum gyis dbang du 'gyuraro// mi ngas 'byung bar 'tshal na mar gyi ngo zhag brgyad la dur khrodadu song
93a8(rgyud): la dur khrod kyi ning gis zhugs bus la dug rlon pas lan brgyad stong sbyin sreg bgyis na mi ngas 'byung // zhi ba'i 'gyin par gyi bzhag brgyad la zhag gcig bsnyung ba bgyis ti la ge rdo rjen
93b1(rgyud): mdun du shing tha mal pa'i zhugs bus ungal dang / zho dang / sbrang rtsi dang / mar la bsnyugs pa brgyad stong sprin sreg 'gyis na zhi bar 'gyuraro// gzhan bskrad par 'tshal nu ba khwa'i bshog pa yung
93b2(rgyud): kar gyi 'bru mar la bsnyugs pa brgyad stong zhag bdun dus gsum du sbyin sreg 'gyi'o// 'di ni bskrang ba'i mchog// dab ba bgyi na zhag bdun dus gsum du ba lang gi lci ba las brgyad stong sbyin
93b3(rgyud): sreg bgyis na dab pa bgyis par 'gyuraro// las gcig gis chog rgyas par sgrub par 'tshal bas mA ma kaM thoT lo// pad+ma'i rdzing du song sI mA ba~M kaM la rag par pad+ma 'bus phul na rig pa'i rgyal
93b4(rgyud): po mchog rang gi gzun ston te nga la bu rtsi ba zhe smra'o// des bac+doMs cho ga rgyas pa'i dngos grub sprul du stsol zha sa brjod pa dang / de bzhin pa'o zhes brjod nas pi sdang bar
93b5(rgyud): 'gyuro// de cho ga rgyas pa las 'byung ba'i las thang dngos grub tu 'gyuraro// gal te ngas las grub par ma gyur na ri 'og tu la sa 'di bsgrubs na dngos grub kyi mchog tu 'gyuraro// yar gyi ngon
93b6(rgyud): nas bzung snga pi ra'i nya'i bar du mi smra ba'i brtul zhugs kyi za su'i skyo 'thung zhing de bzhin gabye ba'i mdun du 'bum bzlas brjod bgyis na de bzhin gshaDa pa'i gzun 'gul bar 'gyur / 
93b7(rgyud): de nas chog rgyas pa dang dngos grub du 'gyur// ras sngon po la lan brgya rtsa brgyad bzlas brjod 'gyis te/ 'og bskor bcings la lan nyi shu rtsa gcig spyir sreg bgyis pa'i thabs man
93b8(rgyud): bor srung bar bgyis na gyad par non cing gyad gyis tshur phyir mi no no// yid gzhungs par bgyi na bra ma'i khu ba mar dang cha bskams la mar gyi ngo zhag bcu bzhi la nyin zhag gcig bsnyung ba
94a1(rgyud): // bgyis te lag mardo rje'i mdun du lar brgyad stong bzlas brjod bgyis pa 'thungs na thos pa 'dzin par 'gyuro// lar gyi ngo ches zhag gcig nas brtsams te lag na rdo rje'i
94a2(rgyud): du mar dang 'o ma bsres pa las lan brgya rtsa brgyad bzlas brjod bgyis pa 'thungs shing zhag bdun bgyis na thos pa 'dzin par 'gyuraro// yar gyi ngo nya la nyid 'ag gcig bsrung ba ba
94a3(rgyud): lag na rdo rje'i bdud du ang go ta'i me tog brgyad stong spyid sreg bgyis na nyi ma gsum pa la thos pa 'dzin par 'gyuro// zhag bdun na lag mardo rje'i kha nas 'od zer 'byung sde rig snga
94a4(rgyud): 'chang la bskor ba byas nas gyen du 'gro bar 'gyuraro// rig sngags 'chang ji ltar 'dod pa'i gzugs can du 'gyuro// lo su ma stong thub par 'gyuraro// mar gyi ngo nag bcu la lag ra rdo rje'i
94a5(rgyud): mdun du sna ma'i me tog brgyad stong phul na gnas s+ho/ bar 'gyur// cho ga rgyas pa sgrub pa pos nyidang / sha dang la dang / srang can gyi bag dang / lba bshos dang / kha 'dra
94a6(rgyud): dpal phub dang / shing thog rnams bza' bar mi bgyi'o// khal te 'di dag kyang zos la las kyang bsgrubs na lag na rdo rje'i de nyid mthar byed cing ngas kyang dngos grub tu bi 'gyuraro// sa
94a7(rgyud): gu ni mar gyi ngo zhag brgyad la grog mkhar rtse mo yod pa'i mdun nas sa blangs te/ kha'i rnam lnga dang bsres la sang ga'i gzun bgyis te gso sbyong bzung la / zla ba gcig za su'o skye
94a8(rgyud): 'thung zhing tha mar na gsum bsnyung ba bgyis te mar gyi zhag brgyad la smra'o// sngar pho nya mo rnams kyis las rnams bgyi'o// bstan bkur bgyis pa rnams kyang srung bar bgyi'o// de nas
94b1(rgyud): lag na rdo rje'i bdun du bzlas brjod 'gyis te/ seng ge'i sgra 'brir gyi bar du bgyi'o// sang ge'i sgra thos nas lha ma yin gyi bu mo rnams 'byung // de dag la 'dod pa bskyed par mi bgyi'o// 
94b2(rgyud): gal te 'dod pa bskyed na sang ge ni ma mchiso// lha ma yin gyi bu rnams ni mchis te/ lha ma yin rnams kyang yongasu spyad par 'gyur// gal te de dag la 'dod pa ma bskyed na seng ger 'gyur
94b3(rgyud): te seng ge la zhon nas rig sngags 'chang gi bu mo brgyad cu 'byung // rig sngags 'chang bzhi stong yang g.yog 'khor du 'gyuraro// gang du 'dod pa der mchi'o// rig sngoT 'chang gi 'khor
94b4(rgyud): los bsgyur bar 'gyuraro// 'khor lo la soT pa'i spyod yul du mi 'gyuraro// gang gi tshe rdo rje dang / 'khor lo dang bdud rtsa gsum pa dang kha con dang / zhags pa dang / hu
94b5(rgyud): thung dgang byug brdebs pachi ba de'i tshe/ seng ge/ sgro 'byir de seng ge'i smras mtshon pa thad dpag tshad brgyad khrid mchi'o// rig sngan 'chang gi rgyal po gang dag
94b6(rgyud): ba'i sgra thos pa de dag thangs la ltung // mtshon chad dag zad kyang dbang du 'gyuro// bskal par gdas pa'i rig sngags 'chang gi rgyal por 'gyuraro// mar gyi ngo dag brgyad la nyin zhag
94b7(rgyud): gcig bsrung ba bgyis 'a ba'i lci ba sa la ma lhung ba blangs te skabs gtsang ma'i phog su gdod sbyir gyi gzun bgyis te/ de la pa tog dbang po dang / gtor ba dmar po sbyin// pho
94b8(rgyud): rnams kyis las thad bgyi'o// pho Ta gcig tu gnod sbyar zad la me kha las me tog dkar po rnam stsol to// gzun de'i mdun du arga'i shing gis zhugs bus la shing bil ba'i
95a1(rgyud): // shing sreg cing zho dang / sbrang rtsi dang / mar la bsnyugs pa brgyad stong sprin sreg bgyi'o// de nas gzugs 'gul zhing dngos grub tu 'gyur te nyid re ti ra ra rar dbu'o// dpor g.yog bdu/ 
95a2(rgyud): gyi zas dbu'o// las 'di bsam par bgyis ste gtsang bar bgyis la lan cig bzlas brjod bgyis be banag po pa spang spu 'thun gyi 'o ma blangs la bram zor bu pos bsrabs pa'i ma
95a3(rgyud): blangs te mar gyi ngo zhag bcu bzhi la zhag gsum bsrung ba bgyis te/ mtshan cig yod pa 'am/ lag na rdo rje'i khyim du song la shing a shwad+tha'i lo pa bdun blangs te de dag gi sdang du gnod sbyin
95a4(rgyud): gyi gzu mthe bor gyi ma tsam zhig bgyi ste/ de nas 'gul gyi bar du bzlas brjod bgyi'o// de nas so la ma rig par mido// de nas dngos grub tu 'gyur te de nyin ra Sha na ra re re 'bu'o// dpon
95a5(rgyud): g.yog bcu gnyis kyi zan dbu'o// 'di ni dngos gru go/ rig sngags gang gnad la zin pa'i rig sngaT daphyi brob zlas brjod bgyis la/ pi dezhin rig pa mchog gi snying po/ 
95a6(rgyud): dang lhan cig bzlas brjod bgyis na de la tshig su bcad par 'gyur gyi gsang sngar mi 'gyur// de nas 'byung po'i bdag po dbang ldan gyis bac+doMs lo 'di skad ces gsol to// bcom
95a7(rgyud): rig pa'i rgyal po yi ge bzhi pa ni bskal pa bzhir gnas pa lag so// bcom ldan 'das rig pa'i rgyal po rdzu 'phrul che ba/ dbang che ba dang / ma rungs pa/ gtum pa/ drag po lag so// bcwa
95a8(rgyud): ming brjod pas bdag la gnod pa lag so// de nas bac+doMldas kyis 'byung po'i bdag po dbang ldan la 'di skad ces bka' stsal to// 'byung po'i bdag po de de bzhin te/ ji skad smras pa de
95b1(rgyud): 'byung po'i bdag po rig pa'i rgyal po chen po rig pa mchog 'di ni rdzu 'phrul che ba'o// 'byung po'i bdag po rig pa'i rgyal po chen po 'di ni 'gro lding ba'i gzub can 'gro lding gi skad
95b2(rgyud): ba'o 'byung po'i bdag po rig pa'i rgyal po chen po'i mchog 'di ni phag 'tshal ba dang bcas par yi gsum cu rtsa gnyis pa'o// yi ge bzhi pa 'di yang mi mnyam pa dang mnyam pa'i nu
95b3(rgyud): ba mang ba ste bskal pa bzhir gnas pa yino// bac+doMs de bzhin gshegs pa mar me mdzad nas bzung ste bshad pa'o// 'byung po'i bdag po 'di thos na san gang dag mtshams med pa
95b4(rgyud): lnga byed pa dag kyang san dmal ba chen po man med par skye ba de ni gnas ma yin zhing go skabs med/ rig ba'i rgyal po chen po rig pa mchog gi mthu ri 'di min
95b5(rgyud): lha ste dpeng ma/ nor bu rin po che chen po'i rgyal po ga/ tsug tor ldan zhes bya ba mthong ba tsam gyis nad thad med par 'gyur zhing gdon thaMd kyang 'bros par 'gyuraro// 'byung ngom
95b6(rgyud): bdag po de bzhin du rig pa'i rgyal po chen po bzhi dag gang gis bzlas brjod pas pa de mtshon gyis 'chi ba'i dus byed par mi 'gyur te/ ngag gis ma yin/ chu yis ma yin khas ma yi
95b7(rgyud): zhing de bar ma dor 'tsho bar mi 'gyuraro// ngar 'gro log par ltung bar mi 'gyu ro// nges par rdo rje'i rigasu skye bar 'gyuraro// de nas tshe dang ldan pa shA ri'i bus bac+doMs la lar gsum bskor bya ba
95b8(rgyud): ta spyan sngar 'dug nas mgo btud/ bac+doMs la 'di skad ces gsol to// bcom ldan 'das ci'i sla reg pa'i rgyal po lag na rdo rje 'di skad rig pa'i rgyal po mi mnyam pa dang mnyam pa
96a1(rgyud): / batshungs pa pad pa 'di bdag gis bac+doMs de bzhin gshegs pa mar ma mdzad das bzung ste bshad nas gsung / bcom ldan 'das bdag gi mngod par shes pa'i stobs kyis pa
96a2(rgyud): 'i de lngar rdzu 'phral che yang rje su dran te/ rdo rje 'chang chen po 'di nyid kyis de bzhin gshegs pa 'khor ba 'jig gi gsung rab la lha rnams la mA ma ki bstad sde 'khor 'dus pa dang
96a3(rgyud): mtshams med pa bgyis pa'i san gcig cig ha cang yang mi ring ba zhig na mchis pa de 'od zer gyi snang ba de mthong nas yi dga' bar gyur te rnar bltas nas rig sngaDa 'chang rnams
96a4(rgyud): rgyal po rdo rje phreng ba zhes bgyi bar gyur to// shA ri 'i bus rig sngags 'chang de la bsam so// de nas bac+doMs la lan gsub bskor ba bas te/ de dang shA ri'i bu yang bac+doMs
96a5(rgyud): sbyar sngar 'dug nas bcom ldan 'das la 'di skad ces gsol to// bac+doMs de'i sAdu mA ba ki de ltar rdzu 'phrul che'o zhes bdag mchi'o// bac+doMs kyis bka' stsal pa/ shA ri'i bu do// 
96a6(rgyud): de rdo rje 'chang chen po la dris shig/ de nas shA ri'i bus rdo rje 'chang chen po la 'di skad ces smraso// rig pa'i rgyal po mchog khod ci'i phyir// bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshen pa mar me
96a7(rgyud): mdzad nas bzung ste bdag gis rig pa'i rgyal po chen po 'di bshad ces de skad sgra/ rdo rje 'chang chen pos 'di skad ces smras// shA ri'i bu da ji snyam du sems/ ci de bzhid gshegs pa
96a8(rgyud): po yin nam/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa gtso bo yin/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa gtso bo yin na// de bzhin gshegs pa gtso bo yin zhe na/ shA ri'i bu de bzhin gshen pa dgra pa
96b1(rgyud): pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas zad ni shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa las byung la/ de bzhin gsheDa pa thad kyis shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa bshad// shA ri'i bu de bzhin du bang gis
96b2(rgyud): kyang rig pa'i rgyal po chen po mchog gi snying po la bas la bac+doMs ngo bzhin gshegs pa ye shes sgron ma chen po'i 'od zer gyi rgyal po de'i mthus mA ma kI phag rgya chen po'i rgyal mo cha
96b3(rgyud): mo de tho bo// de nas shA ri'i bu cang baM smra bar gyur to// de'o tshe bcom ldan 'das kyis 'byung po'i bdag po dbang ldan la bka' stsal pa 'byung po'i bdag po gang gis de bzhin gshan pa
96b4(rgyud): 'bum phrag gang+gA'i klung dgu bcu rtsa gnyis kyi ba ma snyed la phag byas pa bas gang gis rig pa'i rgyal po chen po'i mchog lag na rdo rje la yid kyis phag bas pa de ni de nyid las bsod
96b5(rgyud): dmas mang du bskyed// de nas bang chubasede' rngoHba dri ma med pas bcom ldan 'das kyi zhabs gnyis lag tugs te/ bac+doMs la 'di skad ces gsol to// bcom ldan 'a
96b6(rgyud): byang chub sade'i lag na rdo rje 'ongs dzaM srid cig nas rig pa'i rgyal po chen po dang / rig sngags 'chang gi bdag por bskos pa thob ste/ 'di ting 'dzin gang gi gnas/ 'di'i sngon gyi dge bI
96b7(rgyud): bshes gnyen ni su laT/ 'di gnas pa gang gis gnas/ de skad ces gsol ba dang / bac+doMs kyis babadrub se der rtogs pa dri ba med pa la 'di skad ces bka' stsal to// rtogs pa
96b8(rgyud): dri ma med pa sngon byung ba 'das pa'i dus na/ bskal pa gang+gA'i klung dgu bcu'i bye ma snyed 'das pa na gdul ka zhes bya pa'i bskal pa chen po byung ste/ bskal pa chen po la de bzhin ga
97a1(rgyud): / pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas ye shes sgron ma chen po'i 'od zer zhes pa ba 'jig rten du byung // rigs kyi bu 'jig rten gyi khams mi mjed 'dzin
97a2(rgyud): de'i tshe de'i dus na rdo rje ldan zhes bya ba'i 'jig rten gyi khamasu gyur to// bac+doMs de bzhin gshegs pa ye shos sgron ma chen po'i 'od zer de ni byang chub sede'i bye ba khrag khrig brgya stong
97a3(rgyud): phrag drug cu la mun pa mun na gau rnam par sel brnar snang bad ces bya ba'i chos kyi rnam grangs de bzhin gshegs pa'i gsang ba 'cha do// rdo rje 'chang gi ri Di 'jig rten gyi khams rab
97a4(rgyud): 'byam dpag tu med pa nas 'dus pa 'jig rten gyi khams mtha' yas mu med pa'i rdul phra rab skad la ting 'dzin dang / gzung kyi sngags pa dpag tu med pa bstan pa'i pir
97a5(rgyud): 'dzum pa mdzad// de nas rdo rje 'chang chen po'i khyu mchog tu gyur pa 'jig rten mtha' yas pa'i dbang phyu ga gi rgyal po zhes bya ba 'khor 'dus pa de nyid 'dus pa
97a6(rgyud): gyur pa de stan las langs te/ bla gos phrag pa gcig tu gzar nas dbus mo g.yas pa'i lha nga sa la btsuDa te/ bcom ldan 'das kyi zhabs gnyis la btugs nas yang langs te/ 
97a7(rgyud): rtogs yangs pa chen po rab 'bum gyi 'og gi phoT nas phyag rgya chen po bsgyur bas rdo rje blangs te phyogs bcu'i 'jig rten gyi khams rab 'bam mtha' yas rgya mtsho rnam pa bcu
97a8(rgyud): yang dag par bskul nas de dag gis rgyal po bsgyings par bsgyur bas rgya mtsho chen po bsdu ba'i tshul gyi nga rgyal chen po des rdo rje gsor nas dus kyi tha ma 'jig pa'i ma ltar bu
97b1(rgyud): mig gi 'dzums pa'i 'od zer 'bar ba'i dkyil 'khor gyi 'og gi phyogs kyi phyag rgya bsgyur bas rdo rje de bzhin gshegs pa'i zhabs kyi drung du bzhag ste/ zhabs gnyis la phyar
97b2(rgyud): 'tshal nas/ de bzhin gshegs pa de la 'dzum pa mdzad pa'i rgyu de zhus pa/ de ci'i slad/ bac+doMldas kyis byang chub sada' chen po'i 'khor 'dus pa la 'dzum pa bstan/ bcom ldan 'ongs
97b3(rgyud): kyi zhal gyi sgo dang / smin mtshams kyi mdzod spu nas sngon ma byung ba'i 'od zer kha dog sna tshogs byung / bcom ldan 'das de'i slad 'khor 'dis bskul nas bdag bac+doMs la zhu zhing mtsha
97b4(rgyud): na thugs rje chen po dang ldan pa bcom ldan 'ad sa kyis bdag dang byang chub se de'i tshogs 'di la thugs brtse ba'i slad bka' stsal du gsol// rdo rje bsgyings pa
97b5(rgyud): chen po 'jig rjen mtha' yas pa'i dbang phyug ga rgyal po lag na rdo rjes de skad zhus pa dang / de nas de'i tshe bac+doM sa kyis mtshan dpal be'u chen po las mthon kha chen po
97b6(rgyud): bai DUR+Ya lta bu 'od zer nor bu rin po che chen po skar mdog lta bu'i 'od dang ldan pa 'od zer chen po'i dkyil 'khor phyogs bcu'i 'jig rten gyi khams rab 'byam mtha' yas pa
97b7(rgyud): cher sdang ba'i 'od zer gyi ma lce byung nas dri ma med pa'i 'od zer rngar 'phro ba'i dkyil 'khor las lag pa g.yon pas rdo rje blangs pa las gsang ba'i bdag po lag na rdo rje rag
97b8(rgyud): pa'i rgyal po chen po byung // lcags kyu'i mtshan las ni lcags kyu/ nyas ni 'dod pa'i rdo rje ma/ bkra shis las ni lu gu rgyud/ g.yung drang 'khyil pa mchog tu mdzes shing me 'ab
98a1(rgyud): ba lta bu las ni ma kha la/ ba ma bum las ni sar mo/ gdugs las ni rgyal mtshan drag po/ rdo rje las ni dga' ba ste/ rgyal mo chen mo po nya mo dang 'khor du bcas pa bdud
98a2(rgyud): po de dag byung // de dag gi mdun du ma rungs pa khro bo'i gzugs stobs po che dang / kho bo ki li ki li dus kyi me'i rin po che lta bu rdo rje khu tshur las byung // lag ngar las ni khu tshu ro// phrag
98a3(rgyud): ba 'bar zhing mdzes pa las ni rdo rje gnam lcags te/ de ltar 'khor dang bcas pa'i pho nya mo bcu'o// de bzhin du drug cu phrag bzhir bsgre'o// rtogs pa dri ma med pa 'di ltar lag na rdo rje
98a4(rgyud): g.yog 'khor dang bcas shing pho nya mo dang / 'khor dang bcas pa byung nas dam tshig chen po dang ldan pa'i dkyil 'khor du bac+doMs de bzhin gshegs pa ye shes sgron ma chen po'i 'od
98a5(rgyud): zer las ngas de bzhin gshen ba'i byin gyis brlabs kyis gsol ba btab pa dang / de bzhin gshegs ba dri ma med pa zhes bya ba'i ting 'dzin la mnyam par gzha/ 
98a6(rgyud): stang thog mar de bzhin gshegs pos sku dang / gsung dang / thugs kyis gsang ba bcu dang / gsang ba mthu yas dkrigs phrag pa ba dang ldan pa'i mdo sde'i dbang po'i
98a7(rgyud): rgyal po da gdul dka' ba rnams 'dal ba dang / thad mkhyen pa'i ye shes bstan pa'i phyir de bzhin gshegs pa'i 'khor dam tshig can 'dres pa'i dkyil 'khor du bshadado// rtor pa
98a8(rgyud): dri ma med pa de tshun chad bac+doMs de bzhin gshegs pa yis sgron ma chen po'i 'od zer da la soDa pa sangs rgyas bye ba phrag dag cu rtsa dgu'i gam du bdud pham par mdzad nas bstan pa
98b1(rgyud): / kun tu bzung bar gyur to// rdzogs pa dri ma med pa de la bac+doMs de bzhin gshegs pa ye shes sgron ma chen po 'ang zer de'i 'og tu bskal pa dgu cu rtsa drug pa la 'jig rten gyi khams pa
98b2(rgyud): mjed 'dir de bzhin gshen pa dag bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas don gzigs pa zhes bya ba 'jig rten du byung ste/ bac+doMs de'i gsung rab la bdang cang mi sla ba zhes
98b3(rgyud): bya ba dbyung // rtogs pa dri ma med pa lag na rdo rje ngas yang bdud pham par byas nas don gzigs pa zhes bya ba'i de bzhin gshegs pa brgyad cu dang / sangs rgyas bye ba phrag dgu bcu

98b5(rgyud): rol pa zhes bya ba bskal pa bye ba phrag drug cu rtsa brgyad las bdud pham par byas te bstan pa kun tu bsrungs par gyur to// de'i 'og tu der stong snyed 'das nas lag ni rdo rje 'di de ba'i
98b6(rgyud): gshen ba de dag gi gsang ba 'dzin pa dang bstan pa srung bar gyur to// de bzhin du sbyar te tha mar de bzhin gshaDa ba gtsug tor can dang / rnar gzigs dang / thad skyob dang / gser thub
