160b5(rgyud): zhab gsum gyi bar du sang lding gi yam sreg shing skud pas dkri pa stong rtsa brgyad rtsa brgyad sbyin sreg bas na skyes pa dbang du gyuro// mi'i gtso bo dbang du bya bar 'dod na sa
160b6(rgyud): gyi ngo ches brgyad la 'og gcig bsnyung dubs te/ grog mkhar gyi phung po gcig 'dug par song nas de'i snying du ma tog dong dri dang / bdug/ ba phul la ngo'i 'og tu oM shwad+tha'i shing gi
160b7(rgyud): me sdang 'a yungs kar gyi sbyin srag lan sdong sbyin sreg byas na mi ri gtso bo dbang du 'gyur/ bud med dbang du bya bar 'dod na zhag gsum gyi bar du dud pa mang pa'i mngag sa la 'bras dang pu'am
160b8(rgyud): bsres pas sbyir sreg lan brgya rtsa brgyad bas na dbang du 'gyur// yugs sa mo dang du byan lag rje rje'i mdun du yar gyi ngo ches brgyad la zhig gcig bsrung ba bas te pa la sha'i shi \u0f7f/ 
161a1(rgyud): // me sbar nas ske tshe dang / lan tshwa lan brgya stong sbyin sreg pas na yugs sa mo dbang du 'gyuraro// spyan la ma gtogs par gang gsang sngags theng la snying gzing bar byed pa dang
161a2(rgyud): gdung bar byed pa dang / rig sngags kyi rgyal po gdung bar byed pa'i snying po dang bcas par sbyar bar bya'o// de ltar sbyar na bde blag du 'grub par 'gyur// zla ba gcig gi ba du slongs mo'i zas bza'
161a3(rgyud): zhing snying po bzlas brjod pas pa la de'i 'og tu mar gyi zhag brgyad la skyes pa'i ro ma nyams pa blangs te snying pos gtor ma sbyin zhing de'i lag du lig bu mig bzhag la de nas rig sngags kyi
161a4(rgyud): rgyal po bzlas brjod pa sta yi dwags kyi rig sngags 'chang gis lag tu lig bu mig 'bul bar 'gyur gyi bar du bzlas brjod pa'o// de nas 'grub par 'gyur te/ des mi gnyis bskus
161a5(rgyud): gang la reg pa de gsar du 'gyur// nye ba'i snying po thogs pa med cing stobs kyis pha rol gnon pa'i phyi ma'i la sa rnams 'byung ste/ bac+doMs yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas
161a6(rgyud): kyi rig sngags thad kyi yum gsungs pa ga 'dran par byas ma rig sngags thed 'grub par 'gyur ba yin pa dang / rig sngags thad kyi nye ba'i snying po dam pa 'jug par byed pa
161a7(rgyud): bshad pa gang yin pa'i spyan dang / nye ba'i snying po dran par byas na rig sngags sgrub par dka' ba thad kyang 'grub par byed cing rig sngags rnams las gang dang gang la sbyar ba de yong byung du
161a8(rgyud): byed par 'gyur// rig sngags gang las thad la las mi byed pa de la rig sngags 'chang gi yum dang nye ba'i snying po ldan pas lag na rdo rje 'am lha chen po'i mdun du snga ma'i me tog mang
161b1(rgyud): nang du bsnyugs pa brgya stong gis las thad bde blag tu dngos grub sbyin par bye'o// rig sngags yid la bsams te/ grog mkhar gyi sa las gzugs byas la dri dang me tog dang / bdug pas/ 
161b2(rgyud): rgyan nas lag na rdo rje'i mdun du bzhag ste yum dang nye ba'i snying por ldan pas sna ma'i ma tog brgyad brgyas bsnun na rmi lam du ston te de bzhin du 'grub par 'gyuraro// rmi lam nyi du rig rdza
161b3(rgyud): 'grub pa 'am yang na mi 'grub pa yin pa'i tshig sngags zad ston par byed/ de ltar rtogs nas rig sngags bde blag tu bsgrub par ta'i gzhan du mi yino// yar gyi ngo tshes brgyad nas brtsa
161b4(rgyud): te rgya mtshor 'bab pa'i chu klung gi nang du zhu gsal slongs mo'i zas za zhing lan 'bum bzlas brjod byas na yul sbyin par 'gyuraro// yar gyi ngo tshas brgyad nas nya'i
161b5(rgyud): du zas 'o ma dang phye'i 'dag gu ze zhing rig sngags bzlas brjod byas na gzhan gyi yul 'khor la gnod pa byed par 'gyuraro// de nas zisu chu dang phye'i 'dag gu za zhing bzlas brjod byas
161b6(rgyud): na dmag gi dpung 'joms par ba'o// mar gyi po nag brgyad la zhig gcig bsnyung ba bas te 'phags pa log na rdo rje'i rkang pa g.yas pa'i the bong bzung nas nye ba'i snying po bzlas pardza
161b7(rgyud): byas na ci tsam na lag na rdo rje'i rkang pa'i mthe bong las 'od zer 'byung bar 'gyur to// 'od zer das kyang rig sngags 'chang g.yas phyog su bskor nas lag na rdo rje'i spyi bor mi snang bar
161b8(rgyud): 'gyuraro// de nas 'grub par 'gyur te rgyal po sbyin par byed cing tshe lo brgya thub par 'gyur// slongs mo'i zas za zhing rgya mtshor 'bab pa'i chu klung gi nang du zhugs te nye ba'i snying po spyadas/ 
162a1(rgyud): / bcas par lan 'bum bzlas brjod byas la danas rig sngags 'chang gis chu'i nang du yungs kar gyi sbyin blugs lan brgya stong pas na bar snang la ral gri mthong bar 'gyur
162a2(rgyud): de blang bar bya'o// ci ste snang bar mi byed na ni rig sngags 'chang gis rig pa mchog bzlas brjod byas na snang bar 'gyur te 'og dpag can gyi rig sngags bzlas brjod byed bzhin du blang bar byar
162a3(rgyud): de blangs pas skra lcang long 'khyil cing lo bcu drug lon pa'i sha tshugs can du 'gyur te/ dpag tshad nyis stong gyen du 'phags pa dang / rig sngags 'chang tha~Md kyis mi sod pa dang / 
162a4(rgyud): lo nyis stong thub par 'gyuraro// gter 'byung bar 'dod na rig sngags 'chang gnas gang na gter yod tra song la tshes grangs dang rgyu skar yang bdam mi dgos/ bsnyung ba
162a5(rgyud): yabya mi dgos par bil ba'i ma'i nang du yungs kar dang / pad+ma'i lo ma bsregs pa la nye ba'i snying po lan brgya stong sbyin sred/ byas na gter gyi lha des rmi lam du ston par byedo// de nas rig pa mchog
162a6(rgyud): bgegs rnams kyi sbyin sreg byas nas blang bar bya'o// dga' byed gdong gis gnas bsrung bar bya'o// nye ba'i snying pos ni mar me sbar bar bya ste/ ba lang gi rwa arga'i shing bal gyis dkris la/ 
162a7(rgyud): ser mo'i mar gyis mar me sbar ba gter gang na yod pa de brtol te/ sgra tshig tshig po 'byung bar 'gyuraro// yang na srin phyis arga'i shing bal gyis dkris la rdo rje khro bo'i sngaT dang ldan pas srog cha
162a8(rgyud): go ta'i tshil gyis mar me sba'o// mtshan ma ni de nyid dang 'dra'o// nag pa la ri arga'i shing bal gyis g.yogs te pad+ma'i rgyus pas dkris la mi'i tshil gyis sbar te bzung // mtshan ma ni de nyi dang 'dra ste
162b1(rgyud): snying po chen po gsu bya'o// lha rnams ngas rnam pa sna tshogs ma thong nas nye ba'i snying po'i las rnams bshad pa yin/ sgrub pa'i snying po stobs ldan pa/ gang dag snying stobs med pa dang / bso
162b2(rgyud): rnams chung du de dag me/  chos phyin pa rdzogs pa'i phyi gang gyi sA khyad par dag bdag gis suni bshad pa / bcom ldan layang rdo rjems/ de nas tshig di dang sbrus/ ga
162b3(rgyud): gang dag tshangs pa yis// gas sngags kyis ni sbyor ba dang / chogs ni nges bzhag pa/ mi rnams chog med pa dang / stobs dang mthu ni med pa yis// rtag tu choms par mi 'gyur te// gang gis
162b4(rgyud): mi rnams bde blag tu/ longs par spyad par 'gyur ba dang // pha rol phyin pa'ang rdzogs byeng dang // ji ltar nor rnams rab bzhag pa// de dag bdag gis bshad par bya// bcom ldan lag na rdo rje rmi
162b5(rgyud): de ska dun tshig kyang smras// gter gyi sgo ni rab pa shad pa/ sa mthar rgya mtsho thug pa yi/ sa yi 'og gnas gang yin pa/ bdag gis su ni rab bshad kyis lha rnams kyis ni
162b6(rgyud): mnyan par gyis// de dag gis ni kha dog mtshan gsang sngags gang gis gzhom pa dang / cho ga ji bzhin las rnams dang / bde blag tu ni thob pa yi// sbyar sman bdags bshang
162b7(rgyud): bya/ de dag gi ni mtshan ma yang / so so run bshad par ba/ gru gsum du ni zla gam dang / zlum po dang ni zung bzhi dang / pa chu shing lo ma dang / de bzhin gzhan ma bsil ba yab 'dra// gter
162b8(rgyud): gyi sgo ni brgyad bshad pa// de dag kha dog lags pa nyan/ ngang pa'i mdog 'dra gter sgra yang/ ka ra bi ra'i mdog 'dra dang / 'dam bu chug sher 'dra ba dang / rgya skyegs khu ba'i kha dog 'dra/ 
163a1(rgyud): // ku'i mdog can gter sgo yod// bad+ma'i mdog dang 'dra ba dang / gi ru wang gi ni kha dog 'dra/ de bzhin 'bring gar dang mtshungs// kha dog bshad pa 'di dag gis// gter sgo rnams kyi
163a2(rgyud): bgegs gsal bzhin// stang dang sa 'og gnas pa yi// bgegs rnams gang gis brlag 'gyur ba'i// sbyin sreg las ni cho ga rnams// rab tu bshad kyis mnyan par gyis// gter sgo
163a3(rgyud): gsang sngags gang gis bgod/ de dag rim pa dang shad par bya/ namo 'adz+ra bA Na yi/ na mo ru drA sa/ namam bya dz+nyA ma/ bi du niHswAhA/ ba drA yA hA/ oM ga na ma sAr+sa ba du ba~M Ni swA hU/ 
163a4(rgyud): ti b+ha ri sAr/ mu ka ti ni sA hA/ bri mu ti ni swAhA/ pre te sA hU~M/ bid ra Ni sA hA/ hoH kho swA hA/ ga ga ne swA hA/ bi tsi sAhA/ e ga Ni sAhA/ bo ra ga Na sAt+ma/ ma hA bar te swAhA/ 
163a5(rgyud): sAhA/ ka ra ba ra bi ka ra swA hA/ bi rU bi sAt+ma/ me ra~M ba swA hA/ badz+nyAn sA hA/ gar+b+ha ni swAhA/ marma Ni swA hA/ kun pa tIn swA hA/ sa la dkyil 'khor gru bzhir bskyad nul du byugs la
163a6(rgyud): ku sha'i stan bting la shar phyog su kha bltas te 'dug nas gtsang sbra dang / tshangs par spyad pa dang / dbang po dul bar bya ste/ zasu chu grog 'thung zhing las brtsams la cho ga 'dis lha zad bkod
163a7(rgyud): khur ba bkra shis ldan dang / ban tse dang / tsan dan dri zhim po dag phyogs dang mtshams kyi lha rnams la dbul zhing zho dang dmar bag spangs te/ sngags snga mas sha ma'i yam sreg shing mar gyis
163a8(rgyud): du sngags pa brgya ste cur pasres bya/ bgegs pad phu po byed pa'i gtsangad byed ce bya jig pa bstan pa bya ste/ na mo 'dra 'jig/ kun tu kya ma me/  rgya mam
163b1(rgyud): ni pra mo ti ni sAhA/ rig sngags 'dis yungs gang la lan bdun bzlas brjod byas te phyogs bzhir gtong na srung ba byas par 'gyur/ na mo badz+ra bA rdzi sa/ a mar a ma ra/ ma ri ka tin tin ti la ti/ 
163b2(rgyud): swAhA/ rig sngags 'dis yungs kar la bzlas brjod byas te/ mgo bong gto don bgogs rnams 'tshe bar mi byed// na mo badz+ra bA dz+ra s+ye/ ku ti ku ti/ tu ti tu ti/ ha ra ha ra swA hA/ rig sngags 'di tshul/ 
163b3(rgyud): bzlas brjod byas pa'i sar bzhag na me'i 'jigs pa mi 'byung // gter sgo kun gyi bgegs rnams ni rnam pa brgya du rab bshad/ mau ro dag ni mi'u thung dang / 'jigs par byed pa skad cig pa// 
163b4(rgyud): glang po che dang ma he dang / rab tu 'jigs pa'i srin po dang // stag dang bya dang spyil po tsam// bgags rnams brgyad bo rab bshad/ deng ga phung bar bya ba'i phyir/ rig sngags 'di ni sbyar ba rtsa
163b5(rgyud): namo badz+ra 'dzis/ ma dza mas kya kaM kau rI/ ka m-i ma mngam na dzishi pa shan/ ts+tshe na na mtshan 2/ 
163b6(rgyud): 'di dang / rig sngags kyi rgyal pos yungs kar la bzlas brjod byas te/ phyogs bzhir gtor na bgegs thad mi snang b.ra'agyuraro// na mo rat+na tra yA ya/ na mo b+ha ga ba te pra hA ya/ khe ri bi bi ki ri/ 
163b7(rgyud): na ri ba na ri/ mo ha ni ha ri ha ri po ShA Ni swA hA/ rig sngags 'di chu la bzlas brjod byas te/ phyogs bzhir gtor na bgegs thad bcom zhing mi snang bar 'gyuraro// na mo badz+ra pA tri s+ya/ na mo mi ri
163b8(rgyud): mi ri/ tsan dI tsan dI/ man+ti swA hA// gsang sngags 'di tshu la bzlas brjod pas te phyogs dang phyogs mtshams rnamasu gtor na phyogs bcing bar byas par 'gyur te/ khwa yi gzugs ni mi
164a1(rgyud): / snang 'gyur// 'phur zhing che la gsum du snang // spyil po tsam zhes bya ba ni// phyogs rnams kun tu zhi bar 'gyur// gter gyi sgo yi ri mo ni// thod pa rab 'dra rtogs par bya// den phur bu
164a2(rgyud): zar snang ba// 'ja' khugs 'dra ba'i 'od dang bcas// phur bu don dpal gzugs ldan// de la lag pas reg mi ba// lus ni sbyar sman bskus nas kyang // de nas phur bu dbyung bar bo// gang gis sal
164a3(rgyud): de lhung ba'i// na mkha'i phub ma shu dag lung // nim pa'i lo ma ldong ros dang / sgog skya nas dang shing kun rnams// mi khrag gis ni sbyar ba yi// byug pas de la bsku bar bya// de nas sa la lhung bar
164a4(rgyud): 'gyur// de ltar ma byas nas mi 'gyur/ shr-i ri sha yi me tog dang // de yi rtsa ba shun phrags dang // ru rnga rgya spos 'bri ha ti// yungs ka 'di rnams cha mnyam pa/ ra gcin dag dang brta/ 
164a5(rgyud): bar bya// lus la bskus pa'i sbyar sman 'di// khrag 'joms pa mi mchog yin// rur+Na dang ni rgyu spos dang / lig bu mig dang / ldong ngos bcas// sbal ba'i tshil dang ldan byas
164a6(rgyud): te/ dud pa'i mig rtsi rab sbyar ba// 'di ni mig rtsi'i rgyal po ste// gter gyi sgo rnams gcod pa yin// nya raM kun da'i shun phrags blang // sin du ba ra'i gi'u wang bcas// bring ga'i dud pas rab tu
164a7(rgyud): 'dugs// 'di ni sbyar sman mchog yin te// sbyar sman gyis ni lus bskus nas// de nas phur bu dbyung bar bya// ci ste snang bar mi byed na// khra yi 'khrul 'khor rangs byed cing // bgegs kun phung
164a8(rgyud): ba byed pa yi// ri dregs 'dzin de yis sbyang/ ka ru gA ka dug/ dI g+ha/ ru byiH/ kan+de tu ma bka ga nga/ saM b+ha ba bing du lu ni ku min/  n+da ni/ dUn+datU na/ ka / pi ka lo ka mem hA Shi d+da ha
164b1(rgyud): ha ra ha ra ha ra/ tsa la tsa la tsa la/ ra ra / tha tha tha/ sha sha sha stam+b+ha ya nA sha ya nA sha ya/ ha ha ri/ gi ni gi ni/ tun+da tun dgrin mu ya/ ha na brah+ma Ni/ pa ta ni/ mo ha ni/ bi tsi ri/ ma ba na/ thar tha ra/ miH
164b2(rgyud): mi ti/ saM ti si ti/ mi ri mi ri/ bi ri bi ri/ hi ri hi ri/ de mya ni de mya ni/ bi tra ba ti kha ti ni/ ba ta no// ba tA ni/ ha ha ha ni swA hA/ phung bu 'byin pa na mdog gsum du btsal te/ chu dang yungs kar gyis bsnu/ 
164b3(rgyud): mkhra de rengs par mi 'gyur// yang na rgyang ring por lhung bar 'gyur te/ rig sngags 'dis ni bgegs thad bcom par 'gyur// na mo badz+ra pA Na yai/ na mo ru drA ya/ na mo braSh+Ta ya/ gar shi
164b4(rgyud): ri ri/ siM si ri ri/ mi ri/ bab pa swA hA/ rig sngags 'di 'am yang na gos dkar can gyis gtsug phud bcing bar bya'o// gang gis nor rnams blang bya ba'i// gru gsum 'joms pa 'di
164b5(rgyud): yin te// kho ra khor yug spang byas la// rab tu bsgrims te brta ga par bya// da yi mtshams kyi dbus dag tu// ri mo gru ga/ sum gnag pa yod// ci sta da ltar mi snang na/ 
164b6(rgyud): de nas 'o mar gtor bar po// oM ba marga'i thal sman gyis// mkhas pa dag gi sor ba gtong zhing // dung gi pha mas phyi bar bya/ khor khor yug gtor bya zhing / gtor dang ti dor bas nas
164b7(rgyud): kyang // ci ste mtshan ma mthong 'gyur na// sbyar sman gyis ni bskus na yang / lcags kyi khang bas brdab pas na// chags par 'gyur te gzhan du min// zla gam dag gi dbus dag na// bkris
164b8(rgyud): ldan pa'i gzugs kyang snang / ci sta da ltar mi snang na/ thal ba'i sman 'di sbyang bar bya// i 'dra byi'u rug lo ma rnams// mnyam par gzhag pas btsir nas ni// ba gcin dag dang lhan cig
165a1(rgyud): // bskol nas gtor ba byas nas ni// bkra shis ldan pa dang snang ste// 'di la blo ldan the tsom med// sbyar sman gyis ni bskus nas kyang // lcags kyi khang pas brdab par ba// des na sa lang
165a2(rgyud): ltung ste// rnam pa gzhan du 'gyur ba med// bzlum po gzhom pa'i cho ga yis/ sbyar bar bya ba rab bshad// kho ra khor lug sbyangs nas ni// rab tu bsgrims te brtag par bya// pad+ma'i rtsa ba'i mdog
165a3(rgyud): 'dra ba// sbrul mgo gdengs ka'i ri mo snang // tse ste de dag mi snang na/ thal ba'i sman 'di sbyar bar bya// ka li sha yi sa bon dang // btsod rnams dang ni ba gcin gyis// sbyar nas kun tu blugs bar+ya
165a4(rgyud): de nas mtshan ma snang 'gyur te// sbyar sman gyis ni lus pa skus nas// lcags kyi khar ba brdab par bya// des na des ni 'jig 'gyur te/ rnam pa gzhan du 'gyur ba med// gru bzhi po yi rim
165a5(rgyud): yang gru bzhi yin te bshad par bya/ ci ste de ni mi snang na/ thal ba'i sman ni sbyar bar bya// sU ha sha ra'i yal ga blangs// ma nyam par gzhag pas btsir byas la/ ba gcin gyi
165a6(rgyud): ni sbyar nas kyang // mkhas pa yis ni blugs par bya// blags nas mtshan ma snang 'gyur to// de la sman gyis bskus byas shing / lcogs kyi khar bas brdab pas na// chag par 'gyur te gaH
165a7(rgyud): du min// pad+ma yi ni dbusu yang // snying po dag ni snang ba yod/ sman rnams kyis ni lus bskus nas// rdo ba yis ni brdab pa zhing // de ni snying po gzhom par bya// da na yod par the tshom med/ rdzi
165a8(rgyud): ltar bdag gis bzhag pa bzhin/ lhag par yang ni blang bar bya/ chu shing lo ma'i dbyibs 'dra ba// sbyar ba'i thabs ni mnyan par bya// de ni mtshan ma snang po ni// gi'u wang thig le 'dra ba yi/ 
165b1(rgyud): ri mo gnyis ni sum yang rung / yang na bzhi 'am lnga yod do// mtshan ma 'di dag snang bar 'gyur// ci ste mtshan ma mi snang ma// thal ba'i sman 'di sbyang bar bya// a shwad+tha dang ba ta ba'i// lo ma a
165b2(rgyud): bamarba rnams// ra yi gcin gyis sbyang na su// khor khor yug thugs par bya/ blugs ma thag tu snang 'gyur te// sbyar sman gyis ni bskus nas kyang / lcogs kyi khang bar 'ardab bas na/ chag
165b3(rgyud): bar gyur te gzhan du min// bsil yo ba dag dang 'dra ba ni// yu bar bcas par snang bar 'gyur/ ba shir gyis legs par spyad byas la/ de yis mtshan ma brtag par bya/ ci ste don mi sdang na/ 
165b4(rgyud): thal ba'i sman 'di sbyar bar bya// in+da shing gi lo ma dang / ning rgun dag gi lo ma dag/ rta yi gcin gyis sbyar nas kyang // dza ra khor yug blugs nas ni// de nas mtshan ma snang
165b5(rgyud): dedang sbyar sman gyis ni bskus nas kyang // lcags kyi khar bar brdab byas na/ chag par 'gyur te gzhan du min/ chu shing lo ma 'dra ba las// ru sbal rgyab dang 'dra ba dang
165b6(rgyud): rdo rje ci ste rang 'ongs pa/ de ni gzhom du med pa yin// gter gyi sgo ni thad la// phur bu rnam pa bzhi yod// dbang po gshin rje lus ngan dang // khyab 'jug phur bu bzhi pa'o// gtar gyi sgo ni thed/ 
165b7(rgyud): rig sngags 'dis gtor ma sbyin par bya ste// gshin rje la ni bsreg bya rnam so// khyab 'jug la ni 'bras can sna tshogs pa'o// ku be ra la ni spyang thug/ dpal ldan la ni 'bras kyi'o thug sbyi
165b8(rgyud): ba bya'o//  mo badz+ra pA Ni sa/ nan+d+ra su mi d+he/ go bin+te/ r-i ti ti/ mi ti mai ti/ mo ra ti sA hA/ sngags 'dis ci 'dod pa'i gtor ma thing byin la// de nas las brtsam par bya'o// gzhor gyi snga
166a1(rgyud): / ni 'di yin te// na mo badz+ra pA Ni sa/ ti shi ya bi ti sha ya/ na mo ma hA'i yA ya swA hA/ sngags 'di dag gis tshu la bzlas brjod pas te/ gsang gtor ba ste de nas las pa'o// 
166a2(rgyud): la gter sgro gcog pa'i mchog/ rdo rje rnams dang gzhan yang gang // khwa yi rigs rnams gcig pa yi// sbyar sman rnams kyang bshad par byo// ka na ka yi rtsa ba da // a sha na ga ti'i gi wang
166a3(rgyud): dang spu yi rtsa ba 'di dag rnams// arga dang pa'i shun phrags dang // rib bu sran tsam byas nas kyang // grib ma dag tu bskam par bya// gtor sgo thaMd gcog pa 'di// 'byung po'i mchog ces
166a4(rgyud): bya ba yin// 'bam po dang ni gcod rnams dang // gi wang ldong ros bcas pa dang // ka ra bi ra'i rtsa ba dang / arga dkar po'i shur brags dang // sho na ka yi shun brags dang // 'di dag
166a5(rgyud): ni bsnams byas la/ ba gcin dag dang brtag par bya/ gter sgo thad gcog pa yi// sbar sman dag gi dam pa ste// la ga na rdo rjes bshad pa yin/ ag+ni man+t+ra'i lo ma da
166a6(rgyud): e ran+ta yi rtsa ba dang // sU ha ga shi ri sgo skya rnams// ba gcin dag dang brtag par bya// gter sgo gcog pa'i sbyar sman 'di// rdo rje zhes ni bya ba yin// ka ra bi ra'i rtsa ba dang // chu shing sa bon
166a7(rgyud): pa dang // yung dang nag ta ma la dang // ga ri kir ni dkar po rnams// ba gcin dag dang brtag par bya// spyad sman gyi ni rgyal po 'di// gter sgo gcog pa'i mchog yino// bai hU~M dz+re hA mo ra ti/ 
166a8(rgyud): bzhin ram nye'u yungs kar rnams// ba gcin gyis ni legs sbyar ba// gter sgo/ gcig pa'i dam pa yin// ba lung gi ni me tog dang / shal la ka yi snying po dang // 'bam po sni ha kI ri
166b1(rgyud): gi'u wang dag dang ldan par ni// rag cin dag dang brtag byas pa/ rdo rje 'joms pa'i mchog man/ ko sha ta ka'i sa bon dang / go bir mi 'bras bu dang / du ru ka me los rnams/ ba gcin dag dang brtag pas la
166b2(rgyud): zhag grangs bzhi bcu dgur bzhag pa/ rdo rje 'joms pa'i dam pa yin/ pa ri dzA ti'i rtsa ba dang // su bar sna dang ta ka dang // spen pa yi ni lo ma dang // sbrang rtsi dang ni shing kwa dang // gi'u wang dag dang sbyar ba ni// 
166b3(rgyud): sgo gcig pa'i dam pa yin// sbyad sman dam pa 'di dag ni// rdo rje 'joms pa yin par bshad// gser rnams blang bar 'dod pa yi// lag pa bsgru ba nga las nyon/ ru dza dang ni rgyu spos dang // a li ta dang mo ra ti/ 
166b4(rgyud): ba bsku ba'i mchog yin te// rdo 'bar byed 'jigs pa yin/ zhim thig le yi sa bon dang // nag ta ma le'i 'bras bu rnams/ ba gcin dag dang sbyang ba ni/ bde bar byed pa'i lag skud yin// pad+ma'i
166b5(rgyud): rtsa brgya spos dang // sa rag shi dang spu rnams ni/ ra yi gcin dang legs sbyang ba'i// bde bar byed pa'i lag skud yin// ka gan 'dzi yi sa bon dang // kar ni ka ra'i me tog dang / praM yang ku dang rgya
166b6(rgyud): spos dang // su ra bi dang tsan dan dkar/ gi'u wang dag dang ldan pa ni// bde bar bang po'i lag skud yin// sgo glegs leg pas reg pa na// mtshams nas kyang ni 'bye bar 'gyur// de nyid rengs par bya ba'i phyir// 
166b7(rgyud): rig sngags 'dzin sbyang bdug/ na mo badz+ra bA triH/ Thar ti re/ mir swA hA/ rig sngags 'dis tshul lan bdun bsngags te sgro glags kyi ngos la gtor na rengs par 'gyur te/ bang brag tu bzung bar 'gyur/ 
166b8(rgyud): gter gyi sgo rnams thed la/ rig sngags 'di ni sbyar bar bya// rangs byed rmongs pad dge ba ste/ bgegs rnams thad 'joms byed pa/ tshangs pa nyid kyi bas pa ste// rmongs byed sgo yi tham pa'i phyir/ ring
167a1(rgyud): / brtol nas byung ba ste// dri za lha mo rnams dang ni// mi 'am cis ni rab tu mchod// 'joms par byed cing skrag byed pa/ lha yi gzugs ldan blo gros che// rig sngags 'di ni bshad par
167a2(rgyud): kaM li ki li/ bi ga la k+Shi ha ha b+hi mi gi/ ha na ha na/ shA lan bi dar ya badz+reH/ kaM li ki li shad+de na/ s+yAm+b+ha ya ru dre Na/ de na ha ne ha na shak+tin/ ki ri ki ri/ tsi ri tsi ri/ me ri mi ri/ na ru tin ru ti/ tha ra thar/ tha tha
167a3(rgyud): rar ba ta ya ba ta ya/ stam+b+ha ya s+tham+b+ha ya/ pa ta ya ba te ya/ gardza gar+Na/ mardza maH/ tardza tardza ki ki nau / ki ki ni/ dun+na b+hi dun+na b+hi/ shukla de Sh+Ta ka rA lA na ne/ kan ne dri bA rA pe/ tsa ma bin+du se ma dA/ di ba pra b+ha/ ba
167a4(rgyud): sha ne/ ka ha kA ha khA ba ga hasta/ tre nai tra/ ru drA ya nash+ma shA ne/ ya dA kri da se/ gr-i pA ga gre bA/ ga glai bA/ yur ba r-i Ni/ an+na kA ro sA ye ka sha kaM ma ku Ta/ tsan+ne ka shaR+Ye/ de ba gan d+haH
167a5(rgyud): yak+Sha bi drA/ dar a tse te/ su pU dzi te/ dre bA dre bI/ thi thi ma pa ba spa \u0f7f/ ga ha he ba ka ka ga/ tsi tre/ han ha na/ sAm+b+ha ya stam+b+ha yaM/ ma hA bi d+hA tsa turmu kho dz+nyA ba ya ti swA hA/ rig sngags 'dis
167a6(rgyud): yungs kar dang / chu dang thal ba rnams las gang yang rung ba gcig blangs te/ rig sngags bzlas brjod byas la phyogs bzhir gtor na bgegs thaMd rengs par 'gyur zhing // dgra yang bcom par
167a7(rgyud): 'gyuraro// de nyid kyis bsad pa dang / gnyid log tu gzhug pa dang / mun par bya ba dang / gar dang glu dang rol mo la sogs pa bye du gzhug pa dang / gzhan yang sen mi snang ba gang yin pa dag dang / snang ba hA
167a8(rgyud): yin pa dag dang / bgegs dang log 'dren gang yin pa dang / ci ste rgyal po'i pho brang ma/ dur khrod kyi gnod pa byung ngam// sgrol gyis bcings pa'ang rung / gzhan yang san gnod par byed pa gang yin
167b1(rgyud): de dag thaMd 'joms par byed cing rmongs par byed pa yino zhes bac+doMs rdo rje 'dzin gyis de skad bshad// gser len pa na rdo rje lag na thogs shing rig sngags kyi mchog 'dis sbyin bsreg legs par bya
167b2(rgyud): na mo badz+ra pa Nis/ bi be tA yo swA hA/ ti sto su ka la hA ya swA hA/ ku beSh+Ta nA ya/ ba rin+ta asta nA yA sAhA/ ni drA d+hi pa ta ya swA hA/ sha ye yu bA yu sAhA/ li bi gra ra tA ya swA hA/ ba hu ya~Mk+Sha ya swA hA/ ya swA hA/ 
167b3(rgyud): NA ya swA hA/ gau Na ba ta ye swA hA ka ma rU ba ya swA hA/ ka li na swA hA/ byA g+hA ya swA hA/ byA g+hA d+hi ba ta ya swA hA/ rAk+Sha sA ya swA hA/ rAk+Sha sA d+hi pa ta ye swA hA/ khaD+ga ya swA hA/ khab+ba d+hi pa ta ya swA hA/ ru drA ya swA hA/ 
167b4(rgyud): ye mA ya swAhA/ ba ru NA ye swA hA/ ku ba rA ya swA hA/ bri thi ba swAhA/ mA tri byA swA hI/ prah+mA ya swA hA/ gang gsang sngags 'di dag gis sha ma'i ye sreg shing brgyad brgya sbyin sregu bas na sa
167b5(rgyud): zad bcom par 'gyur/ zhes bac+doMs rdo rje 'dzin gyis bshad/ de lnga 'khrul 'khor thad 'joms pa'i nye ba'i snying po dang ldan pa/ sbyin bsreg pa'o// yang na nye ba'i snying po gcig
167b6(rgyud): bus te'o// de ltar ma bas na brlag par bya'o// de nas dbang ldan gyis bac+doMs lag na rdo rje la zhus pa/ bac+doMs stobs po che pha rol gnon pa/ mi rnams la phan pa'i phyir nyan par 'tshal ba de bdag la
167b7(rgyud): gsungs shig/ khwa rnams bshad pa du zhig mchis// brtson 'grus mthu stobs ji tsam lags// bdagi the tsom de dag gsungs// ji bzhin du ni gsungs pa'i rigs// rdo rje 'dzin chen mnga' bdagis
167b8(rgyud): dbang ldan gyi ni tshig thos nas// dbang ldan gzi brjid chen po pa/ tshangs pas bshad pa'i khwa de nyid// sngon ni sa 'di steng dag na// rtag tu gter rnams mang po yod// gter de dag ni srung ba'i phyir/ 
168a1(rgyud): // pa nyid kyis khwa rnams yod// khra yi rnam pa brgyad bshad pa// brtson 'grus che zhing stobs po che// lag na rdo rje bka' mchog gis// de dag gang gis brgyar 'gyes dang // gtor ma snga
168a2(rgyud): rnams ji bzhin pa// de dag bdag gis bshad par bya// gnag dang dkar dang de bzhin dmar// mgrin pa 'thon kar grags pa dang / ka pa ni dza ra mig dmar dang // mdang bkra dang ni shel mig can// de
168a3(rgyud): la nag po gshin rje ltar 'dzin pa yino// dkar po ni tshangs pa lha ra'adzin pa yin// de bzhin du mgrin pa 'thon ka ni smin drug gi bu lhar 'dzin pa yin// ka bin dza ra ni khab 'jug lhar 'dzin pa min
168a4(rgyud): mig dmar ni ku be ra lhar 'dzin pa yino// de bzhin du mdapa bkra ni dbang po lhar 'dzin pa yino// shel mig can ni sa'i lha lhar 'dzin pa yino// khwa de dag gi kha dog mtshan// 
168a5(rgyud): rnams bdag gis bshad pa yin// de dag gi ni mdog dang dbyib rims bzhin du ni bshad par bya// nag po yi ni gzugs gang dang / mthu stobs gang yin rab bshad/ 
168a6(rgyud): dog rab tu gnag pa dang / bong tshad che zhing 'jigs par byed// dpag tshad gcig na gnas bzhin du// dril bu'i skad 'dra 'byin par byed// gtor ma 'dod phyir yang dang yang / de bzhin rgyun tu skad kyang
168a7(rgyud): 'byin// gang gis zhi bar 'gyur ba yi// zas rnams kyang ni bshad par bya// sha btsos de bzhin badzes pa rnams// brjel ni sbyin par bya// myur du sngags kyang sbyar ba zhing // gtor ma yeng ni sbyar ba rgya
168a8(rgyud): na mo badz+ra pA Ni s+ya/ kr-iSh+Nak+Sha mo/ kr-iSh+Na d+hi pa ta ye swA hA/ gtor ma la yang sman 'dis bsdigs la de nas sbyin par bya'o// dkar po mi ni gzugs gong dang / mthu stobs gang yin rab bshad/ nam rmi
168b1(rgyud): la dag bskor bas nas// da ni chu spyar mdog 'dra yi// mdab ma'i shugs kyis 'ong bar 'gyur// rgyun tu kho ra khor yug nas// mdab ma'i bshog sgra chen po yis/ 'brug sgra chen po 'byin par bya
168b2(rgyud): gnas rnamasu ni lan cig 'tsho// lan gnyis lan gsum bskor bar byed// gdon rnams lan gsum tshang ba'i bar// de sridu ni gtor ma sbyin// sna ba 'bras yos mar dgos// gtor ma rnamasan
168b3(rgyud): smin par ba// sngags la na mo badz+ra pA Ni s+ya/ sho d+ha ya sho d+ha ya pa ba ta yau/ sho pA d+hi pa ta ya swA hA// dmar po yi ni gzugs gang dang // mthu stobs gang yin rab bshad// bzhad bzhin du ni skad kyi
168b4(rgyud): zhing // zab mo'i sgra ni rab tu sgrogs// lan lnga'i bar du skad 'byin zhing / de ni myur du 'ong bar byed// ji srid lan lnga skad 'byin pa// de sri du ni gtor ma sbyin// dri dmar dang ni me tog dmar/ bu la li ka
168b5(rgyud): sbyin ba dag// bza' ba dang nil tu dang // til gyi khu ba sbyin par bya/ na mi badz+ra pA dzi sa/ dak+She \u0f7f/ k+She rAk+ShA rI pa ta ya swAhA/ mgrin bathon ka'i gzugs gang dang // mthu stobs
168b6(rgyud): yin rab bshang // sngar mos kyang ni brang bar byed// de ni khwa ltar skad 'byin cing // lan bdun par du skad 'byin te// de ni myur du 'ong bar 'gyur// gtor ma myur da sbyin par bya// sngags kyang legs par
168b7(rgyud): dran par ba// lan tshwa med pa'i sha sbyin cing // yam bsreg shing yang sbyin par bya// gtor ma'i las ni 'di dag gis// de ni myur du ltung bar 'gyur// sngags la/ na mo badz+ra pA Ni s+ya/ nI la ga sho nI la
168b8(rgyud): te dzo/ nI lA d+hi pa ta ye swA hA/ ki ban dza ra'i gzugs gang dang // mthu stobs gang yin rab bshad// srin pa bzhin du yang dang yang // skad po che ni 'byin par byed// myur ba myur bar skad 'byin cing // 
169a1(rgyud): // de bzhin sgra yang lan gsum 'byin// nye ba dag tu 'ong bar 'gyur// de tshe zas kyang sbyin par bya// gsang sngags kyis ni bya ba yin// khrag gis su ni bkang ba yi// sngon sum dag kyang
169a2(rgyud): bar byed// de bzhin nya dang sha rjen sbyin// sngags la/ na mo badz+ra pA rdi s+ya/ ka ra li/ ba ka ra li/ ka ra khA d+hi pa ta ya swA hA/ mig dmar gyi ni gzugs gang dang // mthu stobs gang yin rab bshad// rta ba'i/ 
169a3(rgyud): du ni skad 'byin cing / khar ba'i sgra ltar tsher tsher po// de bzhin sgra cher sgrogs par byed// me lce 'bar ba kha nas 'byin// the tsom med cing myur ba ru// de la gtor ma sbyin par bya// de bzhin shan rje
169a4(rgyud): ba dang / chang gis bkang ba'i snod kyang byin/ sngags la na mi badz+ra rdzi s+yai/ rak+Sha ne tr-i dak+ta ni garak+Sha d+hi pa ta ye swA hA/ mdab blan ni gzugs gang dang // mthu stobs gang yin/ 
169a5(rgyud): bshad// 'brug sgra bzhin du skad 'byin cing // de yang de bzhin 'ong 'gyur/ rang gi lus las de bzhin mdag/ glog gi rgyud la drang snang bar 'gyur// rnga mo ltar mi brtul zhing
169a6(rgyud): 'ong // dur ba bzhin du yang dang yang // lan brgyad du ni skad 'byin cing // de ni myur du 'ong bar 'gyur// de la gtor ma sbyin bya zhing // gsang sngags kyang ni bya ba yin// bu re zho dang sbyar ba yi/ zas
169a7(rgyud): rab tu sbyin par bya// sngags la/ na mo badz+ra pA Ni s+ya/ tsai tra ts+tshi tra k+Sho// pi tsa tI d+hi pa ta ye swA hA/ shal mig can gyi gzugs gang dang // mthu stobs gang yin rab bshad// nam mkha' dag
169a8(rgyud): ni khebs par byed// de ni dal nas 'ong bar byed// glang po che ltar skad 'byin cing // mdab mas rlung ni g.yo bar byed// mdab ma de ni rlung gi su// grang bar yang ni byed par 'gyur// skad ni lan
169b1(rgyud): gnyis 'byin byed cing // de ni khad kyis 'ong bar 'gyur// de la gtor ma sbyin bya zhing / gsang sngags kyang ni bya ba yin// de bzhin mar dang sbyar bya yi// nas kyi zas kyang sbyin par bya// pa yi mang
169b2(rgyud): de bzhin sha/ bur chang gis bkang bar sbyin// sngags la/ na mo badz+ra pA rbaM s+ya/ ka ka rAk+Sha ka kar dri ti/ ke ka rA d+hi pa ta ye swA hA/ khra 'di dag ni bdag gi su// mtshon bcas cho gar ldan pa
169b3(rgyud): gang zhig khra ni nag po yi// sngags las brten te las brtsom pa/ de la 'jigs pa ci yang rung // cung zad kyang ni 'byung mi 'gyur// de la sbrang rtsi 'om spyad/ de las 'gal bar las bya ba/ 
169b4(rgyud): gang yin de ni bdag nyid brlag/ bdag nyid chen po dra 'di dag/ mchod ba bas na ldog 'gyur te/ lag na rdo rjes bshad pa bzhin/ khra tha~Md kyi gsong snga na ni lhag par spyan dang rig sngag
169b5(rgyud): kyi rgyal po dang sbyang bar bya'o// khra gnom pa'i rig sngags tshangs pa/ spros pa/ ngas bshad zin te/ de dang sbyang zhing las bya'o// sa kyang khra tha daphung bar bya ba'i phyir gtum pa
169b6(rgyud): mi bzad pa'i rig sngags gang thos pas brag la thog thog 'bab pa bzhin du dum bu brgyar 'gro bar 'gyur bar bshad par bya'o// na mo badz+ra pA Ni s+ya/ ma hA tsan+d+ra tsan+te tsin+tan man tsa ma ne/ stam+b+ha ni/ 
169b7(rgyud): dzam+b+ha ni/ mo ha ni/ hi hi ga ka ra ya swA hA/ khra tha~Md bzlog pa la yungs kar gyis bya'o// de nas rdo rje 'byer byed gnom par 'dod na rdo rje 'byung byed la bltas la/ rdo rje khro bo nyid bsngags te blang bar gyi'o// 
169b8(rgyud): sman 'di dag kyang gtor bar bya ste/ rgya sran gyi khu ba dang / sru sru'i rtsa ba dang / 'om bu bsregs pa'i khu ba dang / so ma dang / so ma ta ba dang / saM mo dza ti dang / 'di rnams bsras pa'i chus gtong la nyi ma'i / 
170a1(rgyud): // kyis gdung bar bya'o// gang na nyi ma med pa deng nor bu me shel bstan par bya'o// de nas bcos ma'i rdo rje 'bar bdagazhig par 'dod na/ swa ri ka'i thal ba dang / gze ma dang / kaR+Sha ga dang / 
170a2(rgyud): ab yag dang / kun+di ka'i thal ba dang / 'di rnams bsres pas bshig na des 'jig par 'gyuraro// de nas bcos mo'i rdo rje 'byung bang bya bar 'dod na lhang tsher srang gnyis dang / so ma ra tsa'i sa
170a3(rgyud): bon srang gcig dang / kha bla srang phyed dang / mon sran gre'u re pa ma srang gnyis dang / phye ma zho gnyis dang / sa ma rdza ti zho gnyis dang / kr-i ta dz+r-i zho gnyis dang / ka lwa pa Sha'i sa bon zho gnyis dang / 'di
170a4(rgyud): rnams lhan cig tu sbyar te/ phye mo zhib mor bya'o// lhang tshe ro yang brtag par bya ste/ ka tsa pa la bsregs pa'i chu dang / 'o ma bu dang / in+d+ra brig sha bsregs pa'i chu dang gcig tu sbyar la
170a5(rgyud): mthang gis bskus pa'i snod kyi nang du zla ba gcig gi bar du bzhag nas kra kan+di dang / mu zi'i phye mas btab na de nas rdo rje 'byar bdad dag dang bar 'gyur te/ sgo glegs sam/ 
170a6(rgyud): ngos se gang 'dod pa la gtum pa'i phyir gyis bskus na rdo rje 'bar byed/ a sho ka'i me tog 'dra bar dmar por 'gyu ro// las thaMd la yang nye ba'i snying po dang ldan par 'gyuraro// gter sgo 'di dag pa
170a7(rgyud): bshad/ gter rnams 'di ni yod do zhes/ mngon pa'i rtags ni gang dag gis/ nges par rtogs par 'gyur gyi nyon// rdzas kyi tshad ni ji tsam pa/ de kun bdagis bshad par bya// shing med khrag khrod
170a8(rgyud): gnas dag na// sa la tha yi shing 'dra ba/ dag pa ni 'dri zhim snang ba yod/ zab su mi 'greng gnyis tsam na// nor rnams khri phrag drug yod/ de ni klu dang ldan pa yin// shing gi gnas ni dum na// pad+ma/ 
170b1(rgyud): mdab ma 'dra ba dang / pad+ma chen po dra zhim yod/ zab su mi 'greng gnyis tsam yod/ nor ni drug khri lnga stong yod// de ni srin dang ldan pa yin/ shing med pa yi gnas dag na/ sa la tha la'i 'bru 'dras
170b2(rgyud): ta la'i dri dang ldan pa yod// zab su mi 'greng gnyis tsam na// 'bum las lhag pa'i nor yod// de ni gnod sbyin ldan pa yin/ shing med pa yi gnas dag na// sa la ta la'i shing 'dra ba/ gcig pu dri
170b3(rgyud): zhim ldan pa yod/ zab su mi 'greng gsum tsam na// nor rnams bya ba snyed yod// de na rnam thos bu yang gnas// shing med pa yi gnas rnams na// sa la ta yi mig 'dra ba/ dkar zhing dri zhib ldan
170b4(rgyud): yod/ zab su mi 'greng gsupa tsam na// nor rnams bzhi khri drug stong yod// de dag na ni dbang ldan yod// shing med pa yi gnas rnams na/ ci ste sa la'i khri 'dra ba/ rkang pa bzhi la ldan pa
170b5(rgyud): ste/ ke taka ti dri can yod// de na bye ba snyed yod// de ni klu dang ldan pa sa na// mtshan rtags chen po 'di dag ni// bshad zin gzhan la ngal nyon// dbyar zhing skam la thub pa dang // rgu
170b6(rgyud): shing bsing bar gyur pa dang // mdza' bo de bzhin bi la sbrul/ lhan cig gcig tu gnas pa dang // de bzhin sbrul dang ne'u la gnyis// khung gcig na ni lhan cig gnas// gang na gau da dkar po dang / 
170b7(rgyud): byi ba dkar po lhan cig gnas// gang na wa ni nyal ba dang // ci ste sa phyogs dro ba dang // khyi ni rtag tu grong bor nas// dgon pa'i phyogs gcig gang na nyal// shing ni thur du mi 'khrung ba// ci ste thur
170b8(rgyud): du khrud 'gyur dang // 'o ma med las 'o ma 'byung / mu tu'i rtsa ni gdugs 'dra dang / rgyal mtshan mdab pa 'dra ba dang / shing rnams gang dag bum pa 'dra// rtswa las rtsa 'byung yal ga 'phang / 
171a1(rgyud): // rtsub cing kharnga 'dra ba dang // mdab ma skam zhing lo ma snum// dus ma yin par me tog 'byung // rtag tu 'bras bu chags pa dang / tsher ma med las tsheng ma 'byung / tsher ma can
171a2(rgyud): las tsher ma med// rtse gcig shing rigs gang yin pa// ci ste kha drag gyur pa dang // shing drung grog mkhar phung chen yod// dus ma yin par me tog 'byung / shing drung gang na gzugs
171a3(rgyud): yod la// rtag tu 'bras bu mchod pa dang // mchod pa med cing gzi brjid ldan// shing drung gi ni phyogs gcig na// bde byed mtshan ni snum byed yod// shing drung gi ni phyogs gcig na/ 
171a4(rgyud): snga rdo leb yod pa dang // grong gi phyogs gcig ma ma yis// gnas yod mchod pa med pa dang / khron pa'i phyogs gcig sangs rgyas bzhugs/ ci ste khrod pa'i phyogs pa/ 
171a5(rgyud): na bde byed mtshan ma stegs bur bcas// rtag tu snu ma pa gnas pa dang // khron pa yi ni phyogs gcig na/ rdo leb ming dang ldan pa yod// zhing gi phyogs gcig klu
171a6(rgyud): rnams kyi// mchod cing stegs bur bcas pa dang // rtag tu snum dang ldan pa yod// zhing gi dbus ni gang dag na/ rdo yi phung po chen po yod// de na khung gi sgo yang yod// zhing dag gi ni
171a7(rgyud): dbus rnams na// rdo lebazung gsum yod pa dang / rdzing bu dag gi 'gram dag na// ma mo rnams ni gnas yod pa// mchod pa med cing gzi byin ldan// mcho du zin kyang gzi med na// ngas pa
171a8(rgyud): de na nor yod do// grong gi phyogs gcig slar song nas// ra dang rmig pas rko bar byed// khang pa brtsegs pa'i kha dag nas// bya rog thur de lta bzhin du// rtag tu skad kyang 'byin par byed// 
171b1(rgyud): bu yi ni 'gram dag na// ci ste gnod sbyin gzugs yod dang / chu klung 'gram na sangs rgyas gzugs// dbang phyug che dang lhan cig gnas// grong dang grong gi phyogs gcig na// sa 'bigs zhe
171b2(rgyud): bya rdol ba yod// grong rnams kyi ni dbus dag na// stegs bu med pa'i mchod shing yod// klu yi mchod shing stegs bu dang // lhan cig na ni gnas pa yod// de dog gi ni lho phyogs na/ grog ma
171b3(rgyud): phung po chen po yod// grong ngam yang na dgon pa na// ma mo'i gnas ni mchod pa med// sangs rgyas gzugs dang nyi ma'i gzugs/ ci ste de dag g.yon phyogs na// gang la nyi ma'i gzugs
171b4(rgyud): yod la// klu dag dang ni lhan cig gnas/ zhing dbus rdo phung chen po yod// grog mkhang dang yang lhan cig gnas/ sa pa ni dag kyang dung bar 'thul/ rtse yang gnyis par 'gyur ba ste/ rtag tu
171b5(rgyud): yang ni gzi bin ldan// chu yang shin tu skam par 'gyur// chu ngogs pha gu phung chen yod/ sa dag kyang ni bye ma 'dra// ngab brtsegs pa'i phyogs gcig na// rtag tu dung
171b6(rgyud): pa 'dra bar 'o thul// grong ngam yang na dgon pa 'am// zhing ngam yang ni khyim dag na// khwa dang phug ron lhan cig tu// gang na shin tu mdza' bar 'gyur// grang ngam tsha'am bkras pa 'am// ske
171b7(rgyud): ba yis ni gzir bzhin du// de ltar dus ni tha// phyogs gcig tu ni dga' bar 'dzin// zhing dag gi ni dbus dag tu/ rdo leb ming dang ldan pa yod/ shing rnams gang la ba lang rdzi khru bas
171b8(rgyud): gzir zhing skom pas gzir/ rtag tu 'dzeg cing rtsa ba dang / sdug bsngal de bzhin rab bder 'dzin/ dus kun tu ni ba lang rdzi// gang du de bzhin rtse byed cing // grang zhing grang ba med par 'dzin// 
172a1(rgyud): // bzhin du skyo ba med// bad+ma'i sdong bu gcig pa la/ pad+ma la ni pad+ma skyes// de bzhin ud pa ba ku mud/ ci ste kha dog ngan par 'gyur/ dril nim par mi 'gyur bapa/ 'dab ma dag kyang
172a2(rgyud): 'khums pa dang / gang la 'bras bu mi chag pa/ de la pad+ma ku mu da// ba gcin dang ni rtagacin dang / rdo thal rnams dang lhan cig sbyar// de dang de yi me tog dang // chu rnams la ni gtor byas na/ 
172a3(rgyud): gang na gter de gnas pa yi// sa phyogs da dang chu rnams dang / me tog sngon po dmar por 'gyur// rtag tu sa phyogs gang dag na/ chu ni khyor gang tsam yod la// sa gzhi de yang dro ba dang // khang pa
172a4(rgyud): brtsegs pa gang dag la/ rdo thal sngon por 'dug pa dang / byi ru lta bur mdog dmar zhing / bar bar du ni gnas pa dang / yang na rab tu mdog sngo zhing / phug ron mdog ltar 'dug kyang
172a5(rgyud): rung / de bzhin ni kha ba dang // gang na gzugs ni mdo/ snum zhing / bkrus kyang shing du skam pa yod/ de bzhin dri dang me tog phreng / de ni snying po ldan pa ste/ yon lag 'brum
172a6(rgyud): bskus pa la/ mi yi lha yis bldag byas na/ myur du yal bar 'gyur ba dang // gang na rdo rje'i gzugs yod pa// thur du yang ni lta bar byed// phyogs gcig na ni lha gzhan gyi/ shing ngam yang na rdo
172a7(rgyud): gzugs yod// mgo la rdza thogs ci ste snang // rdzing bu 'gram gyi gnas dag na// nor lha yi ni bu yi gzugs// nu'i phyogs phyogs pa de 'dug bzhin/ shar phyogs logasu lta ba dang // rdzing
172a8(rgyud): bu'i 'gram nam mo gnas// nub phyogs phyogs pa de 'dug bzhin/ shar phyogs log su lta ba dang // khron pa'i phyogs gcig sangs rgyas gzugs/ ci ste dur khrod gnas dag na// sang+yas
172b1(rgyud): gzugs 'dra snang ba dang // chu med phyogs na sbrul gzugs dang / gang na mi ro mgo med 'dra// rdo 'am yang na shing la byas// lam gyi bzhi mdo gang dag na// ci ste dbang po'i gzugs snang zhing // sgra
172b2(rgyud): chen la ni zhon bzhin du// bum po mgo la thogs nas kyang // thur du lta ba yod pa dang / mig rnams yongs kyi mi gnas pa'i// shing med pa yi gnas dag na/ ma mo dag kyang gnas 'gyur la/ 
172b3(rgyud): mtshan ni thur du lta ba dang / shing gi tshal ni gang dag na/ ci ste glang tshan gzugs yod dang // grong nas kyang ni rgyang ring ba/ gang na phag gi gzugs yod pa/ rdo'am yang na shing las byas/ 
172b4(rgyud): gi tshal gyi dbus dag dang / shing mtshams par la sogs pa na/ dbang phyug gi ni gzugs yod// da ni rtag tu thur du lta// khrod ba'i phyogs gcig gnod sbyin gnas// gzugs brnyan
172b5(rgyud): stegs bur bcas pa ste/ gang na klu dang gnod sbyin dang yang na gtum pa'am brgya byin gyi// sha tshugs 'dra la shing rigs thogs/ gang na glang gi gzugs yod dang / 
172b6(rgyud): glang gi gzugs ni shing las byas// yang na sa las byas pa yod/ shing gi tshul gyi phyi rol no// yang na klu yi rje gzugs yod/ lam gyi bzhi mdo gang dag na// klu ni gcig pu gnas pa la/ 
172b7(rgyud): shing rnams kyis kyang bskor ba ste/ mi rnams med pa'i sa phyogs bzang // chu med pa yi dgon pa na/ klu yi mchod shing kha brag bzhi/ dur khrod na ni sbrul 'dra'i shing / yang nA klu yi mchod shing yod
172b8(rgyud): dur khrod dan shing yod pa/ klu shing dag gi kun nas bskor// dur khrod gang na khyi dang ni// yang na wa ni rtag tu gnas/ grog mkhar ba yi dus kun du// wa rnams snang ba yod pa dang // dgun zhing grong
173a1(rgyud): // mgyu ba du/ phyugs na rtag tu rgyal bar byed/ lags yangs kyisang rung / sogs rtag tu lta ba dang / rkapa lag dag gis 'dru ba byed/ bya gas la duganas na// ga tu ba
173a2(rgyud): du lta bar byed// grog mkhar gyi ni phyogs gcig na// gang du bya rog mchu dag gis// rtag tu rko bar byed pa dang // sa ni rtag tu dud par 'thul// gang nas ni dkar por snang // dbyar zhing skam la
173a3(rgyud): rtsub pa dang // rtag tu yang ni dud bang 'thul/ gtsang ma'i gnas ni gang dag na// rtag tu mi gtsang snang ba dang / nyi ma nub ka dag tu yang / dud pa med par dud 'dra sdang / dbyar zhing dra bas khes
173a4(rgyud): 'gyur la/ kho ra khong yug gas pa dang / rtag tu yang ni rab tu 'bru shing drung gang na rtag 'bar dang // gel ba khri shing med pa la dbyar zhing thog thog 'bar ba dang // rtag tu chu
173a5(rgyud): sgo gang dag na/ sa ni 'khor lo gzhol dag gis// khebs par snang ba yod pa dang / grang ba'i dus na dro ba dang // dro ba'i dus na grang ba dang // gzhan dgis ni ma 'dres pa'i/ 
173a6(rgyud): shing gi tshal gyi dbus dag na// mi yi thod pa khung chen yod// a nin dza byi dzin kan te// shing med gnas na gter yod// khang ba dag pa dag na yang / brag cha'i sgra ni yod pa dang // me tog rje
173a7(rgyud): cing 'bras bur ldan// 'bras bu la yang me tog cha/ shing gang 'bras las 'bras bu 'byung // me tog las kyang me tog skyes// dkyil 'khor bzhi dang 'dra ba yi// sa ni rab tu 'bar ba
173a8(rgyud): gang na yal ga gcig pu las// 'bras bu 'byung gi gzhan las min// lo ma med pa'i yal ga las// me tog gang nas 'byung ba yod// nyin par lo ma 'khum 'gyur zhing // mtshan ma
173b1(rgyud): 'du bar 'gyur ba dang // shing gnyis rtse mo'i yal ga dang // rab tu 'du bar 'gyur pa yang // rdzing gi 'gram na stobs bzang gzugs// shar phyogasu ni kha lta zhing // sred med bu yang lho pa
173b2(rgyud): 'dug/ ci ste rdzing gi 'gram dag na// sangs rgyas sku gzugs yod pa dang // kun dga' ra ba'i phyogs gcig na// ci ste gnod sbyin gzugs yid dang // sku ba yi ni lo ma rnams// lur mar
173b3(rgyud): shing bu gu yod/ ci sta zhing gi dbus dgas/ klu mi gzugs dang skul ka/ yang na pade byed mtshon yod dang/ ci ste zhing gi dbus dgan// khron pa 'ga' zhig yod pa dang / bde byed gnas kyi
173b4(rgyud): stegs bu yi// phyogs gcig na ni gzugs gzhan yod/ lagyi bzhi mdore shing drung na// ci ste khron pa yod pa dang / dung ba dkar po'i phyogs bzhi nas/ rtsa rnams kyis
173b5(rgyud): kyang bskor ba dang / shing la ci ste gzugs yod dang / sa la sbra mas rtag tu bskor// sa phyogs bzang por dbyar gyi dus/ srin phyis phung po snang ba yod// rtags 'di rnams
173b6(rgyud): las gtar rnams kyi// mtshan ma dag ni rtags byas te/ 'byung ba dag ni ngas bshad zin// de nas blugs par bya ba'i sman// yang dag gi ni rtogs 'gyur nas// rtag tu the tsom mad 'gyur
173b7(rgyud): ba'i// gluT sman chog mnyan par gyis/ 'bras can nos sbyar til bye dang / kuny+dzar yi me tog rnams// ma ho'i 'oms sbyang bar bya/ sna ma'i me tog brdeg pad+ma bya/ ka ra bi ra'i me tog rnams/ 
173b8(rgyud): maho'i rim pa gcin spyad/ sran chung ti kha dang lhan cig tu/ tshu yis su ni brtag badra ba// kun da'i me tog blangs pas la/ 'o ma tshan dan dag dang sbyad/ in+d+ra br-ig sha'i lo ma rnams// zho la
174a1(rgyud): // dang brtag par bya// nya lcibs sa ni blangs nas kyang / chu dang lhan cig brtag par ba// kun da'i me tog ma bye ba/ blangs nas 'o mas sbyar ba dub// ang+ga dmar bar lo ma rnams/ 
174a2(rgyud): 'o ma yis ni spar bar ba// a shan ni zho dang sbyar// mkhas pas blugs sman debs la// rang bzhin gyur par rtogs nas ni// nor yod par ni bstan pa yin// gzhan dag kyang ni bshad pa ste// 
174a3(rgyud): ma bsregs po yi kham phor dag// 'bras phye 'od gus skus byas la// mdzub go 'arkos nas bzhag por bya// rang bzhin gzhan du gyur na ni// nor rnams yod par shes padra ba// yungs kar an
174a4(rgyud): me tog rnams// gong bu dag tu brdzis nas ni// rang bzhin gyur na nor yod// 'bras rnams til dang lhan cig tu// zhodang sbyar te 'ong bur byas/ kham por kha sbyar nang bcug la/ 
174a5(rgyud): mdzub gang brkos pa'i 'og tu bzhag/ rang bzhin gyur na nang yod/ rgun rmad dusu dus rnams ni// mar gyis bkang ste brkos nas bzhag/ zhu bar gyur na nor yod// lha rnams san
174a6(rgyud): don gyi phyir/ blugs sman dam pa'i cho ga rnams/ bdag gi su ni bshad pa yin// se ni rnams la phan gdags phyir/ mig sman gang gis mi bskus na// sa la gter kun mthong 'gyur / 
174a7(rgyud): mig sman rnams kyang bshad par bya/ 'ug pa'i mchi ma zags pa yis// lig bu mig ni bsgos nas kyang // ldong ros dag dang lhan cig tu// blo can gyi ni mig kyang sku// ldong ros dang ni
174a8(rgyud): shing mngang dang / gi'u wang dang ni 'ug pa li/ mig rnams lhan cig sbyang byas la/ blo ldan gyis ni mig kyang bsku// nga yi gcin dang de bzhin du/ bi lha yin gcin blangs le// 'ug pa'i
174b1(rgyud): mig dang lhan cig tu// dud pa bkag ste bsreg par bya/ lig bu mig dang sbyang byas la/ blo ldan gyis ni mig kyang bsku// rdul bye'u rang ni shi ba yi/ khong du lig bu mig bcug la/ dud pa bkag
174b2(rgyud): ste bsregs pa ni// mig sman rab tu bzang ba yin// 'dzin mo'i mgo ba 'o nang dag tu// lig bu mig ni bcug nas kyang / dud pa bkag ste bsregs na ni// mig sman rab tu bza' ba yin// ru
174b3(rgyud): le'i mgo bo blangs nas ni// de yi nang du ldong ros gzhug/ dud pa bkag ste bsregs pa ni// mig sman rab tu bzang ba yin// mthing ril sgo nga bya gag sgong // de bzhin sbrul mgod dag rnams// dud
174b4(rgyud): ba bkag ste bzhag pa ni// mig sman rab tu bzang ba yin// na ma ka ri sbrul mgo dang // lig bu mig dang sbyar byas nas/ dud pa bkag ste bsregs pa ni// mig sman rab tu bzang ba yin/ 
174b5(rgyud): rang shi ba yi sbrul dag gi/ khong du lig bu mig bcug la// ljong sa dang ni lhan cig tu// dud pa bkag ste bsreg par bya// mig sman rab tu bzang ba yin// na ma ska ri gi'u wa
174b6(rgyud): 'ug pa yi ni mig rnams dang // 'dzin mo'i mgo dang cha snyam par/ dud pa bkag ste bsreg par bya// lung bong gi ni mig gnyis dang / de bzhin byi ba'i mi gnyis dang // ba rgod mgo dang lhan ci/ 
174b7(rgyud): tu// dud pa bkag sde bsregs pa ni// mig sman rab tu bzang ba yin/ spre'u yi 'jug ma dag dang ni// de bzhin 'dzin mo'i mig gnyis dang / sbrul gyi mgo dang lhan cig tu/ dud pa bkag ste
174b8(rgyud): ba ni/ mig sman kun gyi mchog yino// sen rnams kyi don gyi phyir/ mig sman gyi ni sbyor ba mchog lha rnams bdagis bshad pa yin// mig sman rnams dang blu na sman rnams la ni nye ba'i snying
175a1(rgyud): // sbyar bar bya'o// gter gyi las thang ni rig sngags kyi rgyal pos bya'o// nye ba'i snying po'i las rdzog so// ngas sngar bshad pa'i pho nyam gang yin pa tha~Md kyi pho nya ma'i las ban
175a2(rgyud): bar bya'o// lha rnams rig sngags chen mo stobs chen mo'i 'phrul gyi rig sngags de dag gi rig sngags kyi cho ga'i las kyang bshad par bya'o// de la po nyam thad kyi las ni 'di yin te/ lo
175a3(rgyud): spyod kyi gzhi sgrub par 'dod pas zhag gsum bsnyung ba bas la/ 'phags pa lag na rdo rje'i mdun du/ lha bshos sna tshogs phul nas mchod pa byas te/ pr-i yang ku'i shing gis me sbar la pri yang ku dang gi'u wa
175a4(rgyud): dang / ril bu stong rtsa brgyad sbyin sreg byas na/ zhag bdun gyi tha mar longs spyod kyi gzhi 'thob par 'gyuraro// mar gyi ngo zhag/ bcu bzhi la mchod sbyin pas pa'i mchod stong blangs
175a5(rgyud): mi ro bsregs na/ rig sngags kyi snying po dang ldan par bzlas brjod byed bzhin du// 'dag ma blangs la blangs pa de spyan gyi sngags bzlas brjod pang bzhin du// phug ron gyi khung du
175a6(rgyud): shi ngar byas te/ phyi ma mar gyi ngo zhag bcu bzhi la/ lha chen po'i gnasu song nas log 'dran gyi sngags kyis gtor ma'i cho ga thad byas la/ zhag gcig bsnang po byas te/ ldum bu so ma'i 'dab
175a7(rgyud): ma bdun blangs po'i steng du sol ba bzhag nas gzugs kyi lho phyogasu rig sngags bzlas brjod pa ste/ dud pa 'thul ba'i bar du bzlas brjod byas la/ de blangs nas nang par bram ze rnams dang
175a8(rgyud): dge slong gi dge 'dun la mchod ston pa ste// thig le byas na lus mi snang bar 'gyur zhing tshe lo lnga brgya thub la/ pho nya ma thang dbang du 'gyuraro// zasu 'o ma'i 'dag za zhing tshes gcig la brtsam/ 
175b1(rgyud): tshes bdun gyi bar du rig sngags bzlas brjod pas nas zhag gcig bsnyung ba bas la bka' bzlog ma'i gnasu song ste/ 'bras pa las mdung rtse gsum pa bas pa brgya stong sbyin sreg byas na
175b2(rgyud): yul gru thob par 'gyur/ cho ga 'di nyid kyis mo mo'i gan su song la mchod pa bas te dbang phyug chen po'i sngags kyi las thang ba'o// ma mo'i gtso bo'i mdun du 'bras be las khur ba bkris shing
175b3(rgyud): ljon par byas pa/ brgya stong sbyin sregu bas na yul gru sbyin par byed/ mang gyi bo nag bcu bzhi la zhag gcig bsgrung ba bas so// 'phags pa las 'ardo rje'i mdun du sa mo latog lama'i ba 'argya
175b4(rgyud): slong sbyin sreg bas na pho nya ma thaMdi las so cag par 'gyuraro// rog sngags kyi rgyal po sgrub pa'i las rnams la ni pho nyim rnams sbyang ba ba'o// pho nya brda ri si la 'i bdud rtsi thabs sbyong dang
175b5(rgyud): dga' bad gdong sbyar bar bya'o// bdud rtsi thab sbyor la'o/ pa'i gsang sngags thad la ni rig sngags kyi rgyal po dang spyad sgra ra bar ba'o// yang na bac+doMs mnye tshe sbyar bar ba'o// gnon
175b6(rgyud): cog dbye bar 'dod na ma da na'i tsher ma dug dang khrag gi nang du bsnyugs pa brgya stong sbyin sreg pas na 'byer bar 'gyuraro// mar gyi ngo zhag bcu bzhi la zhag gcig bsnyung ba bas te smin drag gi bu'i
175b7(rgyud): gan su song nas/ rig sngags lan brgyad brgya bzlas brje bas na gzhan gyi yi du 'ong bar 'o gyuro/ smyos pa dang bud med dbang du bya bar 'dod na mar gyi ngo nag bcu ba'i la zhag gcig bsrung
175b8(rgyud): ba byas te/ lha chen po'i gan su song la gzugs lnga phogasu sing ldeng gi shing gis/ me sngar nas yungs kar gyis lan brgya stong sbyin sreg pas na skyes pa dang bud meng dbang du 'gyur// mang gyin
176a1(rgyud): // tshes bdun la rgyu skaras ril bab pa'i tshe/ ril ba las shing brnyan bdun skyes pa blangs nas dug mo yungs kyi shing drang lan stong bzlas brjod pas te btsugs na grong khur gri mi thad
176a2(rgyud): gnyid log par 'gyuraro// mar gyi ngo nag brgyad la spos kyi rangs bu blangs te/ mi'i tshil gyis bsgos nas mar gyi ngo zhag bcu bzhi la zhag gcig bsnyung ba bas te/ lha chen po'i gnasu song nas
176a3(rgyud): mchod pa rgyas par byas la gzugs kyi lho phyogasu spos kyi 'dag gus mdung rtsa gsum pa bris nas de'i stang du mi'i thod pa bzhag pa la 'dug ste/ thod pa'i snod mi tshil gyis bkang ba'i nang du smos
176a4(rgyud): kyi reng bu bzhag pa las thod pa'i nang du dang ba chags bar byas nas de blangs pa lag na rdo rje dang / lha chen po dang / grogs rnams la yang skal ba byin pa te/ de nas mig gnyis bskus na lus
176a5(rgyud): mi snang bar 'gyur zhing // 'dod dgung bsgyung ba'i ga thugs can stobs po che tshe lo dgu thub par 'gyuraro// gdon las thar bar bya 'dod na a shwad+tha'i shing gis ma sbar te len tshwa da
176a6(rgyud): ske tshes lan brgya stong sbyin sreg pas na cheng ston nas gtong bar 'gyuraro// dgun zla tha chungs yar gyi ngo tshas bcu bzhi la zhag gcig bsnyung ba byas te/ 'phags pa lag na rdo rje'i mdun du ar+tha'i shing
176a7(rgyud): gis me sbar nas drin shu la'i me tog brgya stong sbyin sreg pas na pho nya mo tha~Md kyis dam paM sbyin par 'gyuraro// tshogs kyi bdag po lcags can ni pho nya ma thad kyi gzhan 'debs pa dang / sgrub pa byed pa
176a8(rgyud): ngas bskos te/ de dran par byas na pho nya ma thad mdun na 'khod par 'gyur// nga dang lha rnams kyi snying po lta bur gyur pa/ 'byung po'i bdag po cho ga rgyas bsgrub pa pho nya ma thad kyi yi dang 'thad pa tshogs
176b1(rgyud): bdag po lcags can bshad par bya'o//  mo rat+na tra ya s+ya/ na mash+tsa d+b+ha badz+ra pA Ni s+ya/ ma hA yak+Sha se nA ba tI s+ya/ tad+ya thA/ ra ba ra ga/ d+ha ba d+ha ga/ ma ra ma ra b+hany+dza b+hany+dza/ ha na ha mad ha han/ pa tsang tsa/ l+r-iH
176b2(rgyud): gr-ih+Na/ ts+tshin+dats+tshin+da b+hing+ga hrIn+da/ han la \u0f7f ka badz+ra T+Ta swAhA/ lcags can rnying lta bur gyur ba/ 'byung ba'i bdag pa tshig rgyas par smug tshogs kyi bdag zi la nyam thad kyi ying dang 'thad pa 'a
176b3(rgyud): na mo badz+ra bA na ye na ma I shwa rA ya/ na mo nan+da ke shwe rA ya/ ru lu ru lu/ pi la ta ma te gi/ tsa la lo haka/ duShA sa gra ha ma~M nan A bau sha ya swA hA/ 'di ni tshogs kyi bdag po lcags can pho nya ma rna
176b4(rgyud): kyi gzhan 'dabs pa dang / sgrub par byed pa thogs ba med pa'i las cano// gdon dbab pa thaMd la ni me tog gis bya'o// las ma cog la yang tshogs kyi bdag po l+ya Da la brjod na
176b5(rgyud): las thung ba'o// zhag gsum bsrung ba bas nas mar gyi po nag brgyad la lag na rdo rje'i mdun du dkyil 'gro bskyang nul gyis byugs te dri dang / me tog dang / bdug pa phul
176b6(rgyud): nas be kau ka ta'i shing gis ma sbar la bil ba'i yam sreg shing brgya stong sbyin sreg pas/ da'i 'og tu tshogs kyi bdag po lcags can gyis mtshan mo rmi lam du bstan par 'gyur// de nas pho&
176b7(rgyud): ma dzang byed par 'gyur/ lo nyam rnams kyi cho ga rdzog so// log 'dren rnams kyi rig sngags bshad pa gang yin pa de nyid sdong po'i mchog kyang bshad par bya ste/ na mo badz+ra bA dzA sa/ oM pi tita
176b8(rgyud): ma ti ste ha/ snying po'i las rnams 'byung ste sgrub pa zad dang / las thad la las 'di nyid bya ste/ gu gul dang ni yungs kar dang // gi'u wang shu dag ru rta dang / sug sbal yang ni de bzhin te/ smon
177a1(rgyud): / shing dang ni thab shing dang // tsan dan dang ni a ga ru// a la ya ka bad tra dang // ge sar 'di rnams cha bsnams la// chu dang lhan cig brtag par bya// gang na spyar sman 'di gnas pa
177a2(rgyud): der ni 'jigs pa mi 'byung ste// chom rkun ma yin mtshon rnams min// sbrul rnams ma yin lha min min// lags rdo rje'ang 'dis bskul bas// sa steng dag tu rgyal bar 'gyur// 'di yis
177a3(rgyud): lus la bskus pa ni// log 'dren rnams las thar bar 'gyur// sbyar sman 'di ni byas nas kyang // sgrub pa thang sgrub byas na// log 'dren rnams kyis mi tshugs te// lag na rdo rjes bshad pa
177a4(rgyud): bzhin/ log 'dren rnams kyang gzhan 'debs pa// sgrub pa byed pa ni 'phags pa lag na rdo rjes bdud rtsi thab sbyor bskos// gyi ngo zhag brgyad la zhag gcig bsnyung ba
177a5(rgyud): te/ 'phags pa lag na rdo rje'i mdun du tsan dan dmar po'i khu bA 'phags pa bdud rtsi thab sbyor bri'o// de'i g.yog sum cuHgnyis kyang thal bas bri'o// de'i log 'dren
177a6(rgyud): rnams la gtor ma sbyin par bya'o// bdud rtsi thab sbyor yang lan brgya bzlas brjod pa'o// de nas lag na rdo rjes bshad pa bzhin du log 'dren rnams 'grub par 'gyuraro// log 'dran rnams kyi
177a7(rgyud): cho ga rdzogaso// 'phags pa spyan ras gzigs kyi dbang phyug gis rig pa mchog las bac+doMs ma gos dkar mo can bshad pa gang yin pa de'i phyi ma'i las rnams ngas bshad kyis lha
177a8(rgyud): rnams nyon cig/ sgrub pa thaMd la srung ba yin te/ chom rkun dang / stag dang / sbrul dang / chu srin na bkra dang / ma hA kar rnams las gnas srung ba dang / mtshams bcad pa dang / kha bcing bar ba
177b1(rgyud): rnams yid kyis bya'o// gter blang ba ni gter gang na yod pa der song la bsnyung bar byas te/ dkyil 'khor bskyang nul gyis byugs nas bil ba'i shing gis me'i nang du yungs kar mar dang sbya
177b2(rgyud): bas lan brgya stong sbyin sreg byas na de'i 'og tu gter ston par 'gyur te/ de nas blang bar bya'o// mar gyi po nag brgyad la zhag gcig bsnyung ba byas te/ 'phags pa sbyin ras gzigs dbang
177b3(rgyud): phyug gi mdun du mchod pa bas nas sna ma'i me tog brgya stong lan re bzlas brjod pas te/ 'phags pa spyan ras gzigs dbang phyug gi brang du bsnun la bzlas brjod rdzogs pa'i til gyis
177b4(rgyud): lan brgya stong sprin sreg bos na dngos grub grub pa'i mtshan mar phags pa spyan ngas gzigs dbang phyug gi yan lag dang nying lag 'gul bar 'gyuro// de nas grub nas yul grum
177b5(rgyud): yang na gsang sbyin par 'gyur/ zla ba gcig gi bar du slongs mar zas za zhing rig sngags bzlas brjod byas la de nas rig sngan 'chang gis zla ba nyal zhagacig bsdu
177b6(rgyud): bu byas te/ ras ma nyams pa la tshon rtsi sbyin med pas 'phags pa spyan ras gzigs dbang phyug 'drir gzhug ste/ 'dam bu mda' rgyu'i mdog can thor tshugs byas pa lag pa g.yon pa na bad+ma
177b7(rgyud): thogs pa/ g.yas pa na sngun gyi nor bu thogs te/ brang na dpal gyi be'u yod pa/ pad+ma la bzhugs par bya// g.yas phyogasu bac+doMs ma gos dkar can 'dam bu mda' rgyu'i mdog dang ldan pa
177b8(rgyud): tshugs byas shing pad+ma'i phreng bas rgyan la pad+ma la bzhugs te/ yid tsam gyis 'dud par ba'o// de nas rig sngags 'ochang spyad pa byas pas mar gyi po nag lnga la sku gdung dang ldan pa'i mchod rten
178a1(rgyud): // gyi drung du ri mo'i sku gzugs bkram ste/ mchod pa rgyas par byas la lha bshos kyang rgyas bar dbu'o// ri mo'i gzugs kyi mdun du bri yang ku'i phye ma brdzis pas gzugs byas
178a2(rgyud): te/ spyan ras gzigs kyi gsang sngags snying po dang bcas pas lan brgyad brgya bzlas brjod bya'o// de nas mjug brtul te rig sngags kyi rgyal po bzlas brjod byas pas mtshams bcad
178a3(rgyud): bA'o/ bac+doM sa mas ni steng dang 'og bcing bar bya'o// stang dang 'og bcing ba na lho phyogasu skar mda' ltung lta 'gyur te/ de nas dngos grub 'grub pa'i mtshan mar shes par bya'o// de nas rig snga
178a4(rgyud): 'chang gis yang nye reg byas la ri mo'i gzugs kyi mdun du ku sha'i stan la 'dug ste/ rig sngags lan brgya stong bzlas brjod byas na ri mo'i gzugasu 'gul zhing sa yang
178a5(rgyud): bar 'gyuraro// de nas 'grub par 'gyur te/ bla ma la phyag byas nas/ rig snga bzlas brjod byang bzhin du gyen du 'phags par byam 'dod dgur sgyur ba'i gzugs can du 'gyur zhing
178a6(rgyud): dpag tshad stong gyen du 'phags shing rna gsang zhing mig rno ba dang / rig sngags 'chang thad kyis mi sod pa dang / tshe lo dgu stong thub par 'gyur// lus dang bral ba'i 'og tu yang bde ba can du
178a7(rgyud): skye bar 'gyu ro// gos dkar can gyi rig sngags kyi cho ga la gzhan 'debs shing sgrub par byed pa'i gsang sngags chen po yang ngas sbyin par bya'o// oM shrI baN+Da ra bA si ni/ na dza TA ma ku Ta d+ha ra Ne swAH
178a8(rgyud): kaM ba ka bi ka be ki bi ri sAhA/ rig sngags 'di lag na rdo rje'i mdun du 'phags pa spyan ras gzigs dbang phyug gi gzugs gzhag par bya'o// de'i g.yon rol du ni gos dkar can bzhag/ 
178b1(rgyud): bya'o// de nas rig sngags 'chang gis yang gyi ngo zla ba nya la nyin mtshan du bsnyung ba byas te/ dri dang me tog dang / bdug pa la sogs pas mchod pa byas nas/ zhag gsum gyi bar du bzlas ba
178b2(rgyud): byas na/ de nas gos dkar can 'grub par 'gyuraro// gos dkar can gyi cho ga rdzogaso// lha rnams ngas 'phags pa spyan ras gzigs dbang phyug gau lngas rnams bshad zin te/ gzhon rdo rje sde'i
178b3(rgyud): thogs pa med pa'i las rnams kyang bshad par bya'o// ston zla ra ba tshes brgyad la zhag gcig bsnang ba byas te/ lag na rdo rje'i mdun du kar bai ri'i me tog brgya stong lan re bzlas brjo pas
178b4(rgyud): bas 'phags pa rdo rje sde la bsnun nas/ mdun du 'dug par 'gyur te/ pho nyam rnams kyis lha'i tshogs so cag 'gugs par 'gyur zhing de la dngos grub sbyin du 'jug ste/ mngags
178b5(rgyud): thag tu yid ci sems pa 'grub par 'gyur// gdon rnams kyi sgra nga gzhom par byan/ lan bdun bzlas brjod byas pa'i yungs kar gyis bya'o// bca' skal lan bdun bzlas
178b6(rgyud): brjod pa ste/ gdon la bstan na gdon gyi lus tsha bas 'debs par 'gyuraro// nad do cog la sa la lan bdun bzlas brjod pas te/ byin na nad mang bar 'gyur// gzhon nu mchog gi gzhan 'dadra
178b7(rgyud): shing sgrib par byed pa'i snying po bshad zin to// drag tu bskul ba gzhan yang bshad par bya'o// na mo badz+ra pA tri sa/ oM hu yu hu yu swA hA/ 'phags pa rdo rje snga'i snying po'o// mar gyi ngo nag brgyad la
178b8(rgyud): zhag gi cig bsnyung ba bas te/ lag na rdo rje'i mdun du rdo rje'i sde bzhag nas me tog dkar po brgya stong snying po dang sbyar te/ 'phags pa rdo rje sde la bsnun na de nas 'phags pa rdo rje sde 'grub pa
179a1(rgyud): // 'gyur te/ drag tu bskul ba'i snying po mchog bzlas brjod pas pa theng byed par 'gyur// 'phags pa rdo rje sde'i cho ga rdzog so// wa rnams ngas 'phags pardo rje lnga'i las ba
179a2(rgyud): dag gis myur du mdun na gnas par gyur pa rnams bshad zin te 'geng bar dga' ba mthu dang pha rol gnon pa dpag tu med pa'i rgyud phyi ma gang gis rtsa bzhin du bde blag tu las rnams
179a3(rgyud): byed pa yang bshad par bya'o// mar gyi ba zhag bcu bzhi la zhag gcig bsrung ba bas te/ 'phags pa lag na rdo rje'i mdun du arge'o shing gis me sbar nas yungs kar mar dang sbyar bas
179a4(rgyud): lan brgya stong sprin sreg byas na// gzhon nu mchog sgrub par 'gyur te/ las dgrub pas cho ga rgyas par gzhan dag bad blag tu 'grub par 'gyuraro// rig sngags 'chang rig sngags
179a5(rgyud): sgrub pa na gzhon nu'i gsang sngags dran par bya ste/ dran tsam gyis myur du mdun na 'dug par 'gyuraro// rtse zhing sgrub na lha/ thad gzhon blta ba'i phyir 'ong bar 'gyur te/ 'ongs
179a6(rgyud): nas dngos grub sbyin par bya'o// zhag gsum bsnang ba byas te/ mar gyi ngo zhig bcu bzhi la lha chen po'i gnas ma/ yang na kun dga'i ra ba 'am/ khang stod du song nas be'u dkar po blangs te dri da
179a7(rgyud): me tog dang / bdug pas rgyan la kha lho phyogs bstan nas sbrang rtsi dang / a lam bums lag pa gnyis bskus te/ rkang pa g.yas pa byug pa bya'o// rig sngags kyang lan brgya stong bzlas
179a8(rgyud): brjod pas te/ be'u sgrar bzhu'o// de ste smar mi btub na yang len brgya stong bzlas brjod byas te/ de nas smrar bcug na ci ba zhes smra bar 'gyur// des kyang 'dod pa thad sbyin par gyis shig ces
179b1(rgyud): shig/ de nas yid la gang bsams pade thaMd 'grub par 'gyur te/ tshe lo stong nyis brgya thub par 'gyuraro// gzhon nu'i las rig sngags kyi rig sngags sgrub par byed pa bshad zin to// ci ste rdo rje'i/ 
179b2(rgyud): rigs sgrub par 'dod na lag na rdo rje'i sras gtsug nas byung gtum pa/ drag pa 'dul dka' ba bsten par bya'o// sgrub par 'dod pa gang yin pas yum snang la dran par byas te sras gtum po dra
179b3(rgyud): par bya'o// 'di'i las gang sgrub na rdo rje'i rigs 'grub par 'gyur ba yang bshad par bya ste/ mar gyi ngo zhag brgyad la zhag gcig bsnyung ba bas nas 'phags pa lag na rdo rje'i glogs
179b4(rgyud): lo gsu ni 'phags pa rdo rje sgo// g.yon phogs na 'phags ba gtsug nas byung bana'o// de dag la dri dang / me tog dang / bdug pa rnams dbul bdub ste/ 'phags pa rdo rje sdel
179b5(rgyud): dran da/ ra po dbu'o// 'phags pa lag na rdo rje dang / gzho nu la naM tsan dan dmar po dbu'o// me tog dkar po dang / dmar po yA tshul de dang 'dra bar dbul bar bya ste/ de'i mdun du seng
179b6(rgyud): ldeng gi shing gis me sbar la yum gyi gsang sngags kyis tsan dan dmar po'i yam sreg shing mar gyi nang du bsnyugs pa brgya stong sbyin bsreg pa'o// de nas gzhon 'grub par 'gyur te/ bige
179b7(rgyud): med pa bde blag tu cho ga rgyas pa 'grub par 'gyuraro// lag na rdo rjes bshad pa bzhin// rig sngags rgyal po mnga' bdag mchog/ gang zhig phyag 'tshal mchod byed pa// gang zhig rtag tu lan
179b8(rgyud): gcig 'am/ yang dang yang du brjod byed dang / gzi chen sras ni yum dang bcas/ legs pa du ni dran par byed// de la ngas ni khong zug tu/ log na rdo rjes bskul ba bzhin/ dngos grub kyi \u0f7f/ 
180a1(rgyud): / ba gang zhig cho ga rgyas pa 'di// gsang bcas gsang chen ldan pa dang / lag na rdo rjes sngags bshangad dang // gzi chen phyi ma'i rgyud klog dang // gzhon nu dam pa mnga' bdag
180a2(rgyud): ni spyan dang lhan cig ldan pa dang // phyi ma'i rgyud las bshad pa yin/ las rnams gang zhig lnga byed pa/ de la dpal ldan rdo rje 'dzin/ lus kyi spyi bo rtag tu gnas/ de nas bac+doMs lag nadzuH
180a3(rgyud): sangs rgyas kyi spyan spyi bo la bskur te// rdo rje 'bar ba'i ting 'dzin la sgom par zhug so// bac+doMs lag na rdo rjes rdo rje 'bar ba'i ting 'dzin la snyoms par zhugs ma thag tu lnga thad sa pas 'jig
180a4(rgyud): par 'gyur te/ lhags nas khyab 'jug ni bac+doMs kyi glo g.yon phogasu 'du'o// lha chen po ni g.yas phyog su 'du'o// smin drug ma ni 'dzem bzhin du rgyab log su 'du'o// dka' bzlog ni mdu
180a5(rgyud): phyog su 'dug// gzhon dril mdzes dang / smin drug gi bu ni blo g.yasu 'dug/ tshogs rnams ni g.yon pog su 'dug/ mo drug gis bskor ba'i dpal gyi lha mo gzi brjid
180a6(rgyud): chen mo shin tu 'od 'bar ba drag mo pha rol gnon pa drag mo ni phyogs gcig tu 'dug ste/ de'i lha yul dang / lha ma yin dang / grub pas bsten pa'i 'khor gyi dkyil 'khor der ma zhug so// de
180a7(rgyud): nas bac+doMs lag na rdo rje ting 'dzin las bzhengs te lha de dag la glang po che'i lta stangs kyis blta so// de nas phyogs gcig na 'dug pa'i dpal gyi lha mo dang / phonya mo stobs chen mo'i pha rol
180a8(rgyud): gnon pa dang ldan pa drug kyang blta so// de nas pho nya mo drug po rnams kyi dpal gyi lha mo chen mo la legs por bltas nas/ pho nya ma de dag gis bstod/ pho nya mo chen mo me lce ma dang / me rtag
180b1(rgyud): dang phreng ldan ma dang / mdzod ldan ma dang / 'bar ldan ma dang / kha 'bar ma dang / 'di dag gis dpal gyi lha mo la bstod pa/ ag+ni dzi hA sA ye na maHbI ta daMg+h+nA ya na maHya mA ya na maHda ha nA ya
180b2(rgyud): namaHbin+du dz+ri hA ya na maHA daR+sha nA ya na maHpri sha lA ya na maHswA hA/ ma lce mas bstod nas lha rnams dga' bar gyur to// me rtag ma'i rig sngags bshed / tsu ru tsu ru/ mu ru mu ru/ pu ru bu ru
180b3(rgyud): swA hA/ a kats+tsha pa te swA hA/ me rAg mas bstod nas/ phreng ldan mas bstod pa/ na mo badz+ra pA Ni ye/ daM ba ti/ de ba ya/ tsi lo mi li/ ka li pra tIts+tsha bi li da ba te swAhA/ phreng ldan mas bstod nas/ mdzod ldan
180b4(rgyud): mas bstod bzhi po badz+re ba Na yed ba'i d+ha bA yA ti badzi cir pa du / dza ban nyi tod ne swAhA/ mdzod ldarnams bstod nas la bar ldan mas mngon par bstod/ na mo badz+ra bA tri sa na
180b5(rgyud): pra tsat+pa s+ya/ na ma skr-i tA sarba b+hU ta/ pa sha ma ni/ sarba a ta sad nin ba sha mi hu na ni hu na ni/ mo ha ni mo ha ni/ hi hi badz+ra pA Ni swA hA/ 'bar ldan mas bstod nas kha 'bar mas mngon par
180b6(rgyud): bstod pa/ shri ye ma hA shri ye/ tsa le ma hA tsa le/ i rnyid de ka ni/ ma hA b+ho gi ni/ b+ho ga ba ti/ ma mA ba lo ka swA hA/ kha 'bar mas bstod nas lha'i mig gis rdar blta so// de nas dpal gyi lha mo
180b7(rgyud): chen mo lag na rdo rje la brjod nas de nas bskyod par brtsam mo// de nas lha'i dkyil 'khor de dag gis dpal gyi lha mo chen po rgyang ring po nas 'ong ba mthong nas myur du langs te/ lag na rdo rje
180b8(rgyud): g.yas phyog su 'khod do// stobs po che'i tshogs la gtum byed dang / gsar can dang / thugs pa dang / rdzong ldan dang / lca Da can dang / so can dang / mtshan sbyin dang / bdad rtsi thab sbyor la so/ 'tshon
181a1(rgyud): // pa de dag gis mngon par bstod/ tshogs rnams kyis dpal gyi lha mo chen mo stobs chen mo bstod pa ni spyan dang lag na rdo rje la lag 'tshal nas thog mang ga tum bengs brjod pa
181a2(rgyud): badz+ra pA Na ye ma dam re gA ra gA/ ga ga g.yag ya ga ya/ tsan+da ko dz+nyA ba ya ti swA hA/ gnyis bste bsar can brjod pa/ na mo badz+ra bA NI s+ya/ ban bon tsa la pa tsa la phan mo dz+nyA ba ya ti swA hA/ gsum pa
181a3(rgyud): ste rmugs bang brjod pa/ na mo badz+ra pA Ni s+ya/ da ha da ha/ pa tsa ba tsa tsur+ya tsUr+Na nA sha ya/ bi nA sha ya dze b+ha ko dz+nyA pa ya ti swA hA/ bzhi pa ste rdzing ldan brjod pa/ na mo badz+ra pA tri sa/ tsu ru tsu ru/ te te tata/ ma
181a4(rgyud): Sha kaN bkod tadz+nyA pa ya ti swA hA/ lnga pa ste tshogs chen mo lcags can brjod pa/ na mo badz+ra pA Ni se/ tad+ya thA/ ra ba rag/ dab dang ma ra ma ra mA ra mA ra~M/ b+han+d+ha b+han+ti/ han han/ ba tsa
181a5(rgyud): tsagr-ih+Na gr-ih+Na/ tshin+da tshin+da/ b+hiR+Sha b+hin+da/ ta na la ha ka badz+re Na swA hA/ drugapastaM si can brjod pa/ na mo badz+ra pA tri s+ya/ hu ta hu ta/ grA ha ma pa ri shu mi badz+re hasta na/ su pra tin dan ta ko d+hU pa
181a6(rgyud): ti swA hA/ bdun pa sna tshogs gzi bo che stobs po che mtshan sbyin brjod pa/ na mo badz+ra pA Ni s+ya/ tiSh+Tha tiSh+Tha/ D+ho ma hA gra ha badz+ra sa t+ye na su pra ti bi ba pA la to dz+nyA pa ya ti swA hA/ brgyad pa ste tshogs chen
181a7(rgyud): po bdud rtsi thab sbyor brjod pa na mo badz+ra pA Ni s+ya/ tu lu hu lu/ tiSh+Tha tiSh+Tha/ a mr-i ta kuN+Da la/ kha kha khA hi khA hi/ ban+d+ha ban+d+ha swA hA/ lnga de dag gis tshogs chen po brgyad po de dag las brtsams
181a8(rgyud): dpal gyi lha mo chen mo la bstod nas/ tshogs chen po de dag gis kyang dpal gyi lha mo chen mo la rim gro byed cing lag ni rdo rje'i 'khor gyi dkyil 'khor du song // de nas gzhon nu smin dru'i
181b1(rgyud): lha mo chen mo de dag la bstod pa mthong nas rang gi rig sngags kyi dpal gyi lha mo chen mo la bstod pa/ na mo badz+ra bA dzi s+ya/ trai lo kya dza la ni bi drA ba rtsi/ sadzang rma chi/ sa mchi/ sa mi baHsa tha log pa shA
181b2(rgyud): ri dzadz+nye mu dzi/ hr-id ye a badz+ra ni/ mi li mi li/ mo li tsa lA ya/ sarba lo kota sA da ni/ a nun han swA hA/ de nas dpal gyi lha mo gzhon smin drug gi bus bstod nas yid rab tu dga' zhing 'jo
181b3(rgyud): gyi dkyil 'khor gyi nang du song ngo // de nas dpal gyi lha mo chen mo 'khor gyi dkyil 'khor gyi nang du song badrug mas mthong nas rang gi rig sngags kyis bstod gan mo badz+ra bA tri sa na maHsa
181b4(rgyud): t+ya pA tri nan/ sa t+ya bA tsa ne na sa t+ya/ ba ti ni sa t+ye ba de sa t+yaM/ ba ti te dzaHba ti/ mA la ni/ ha ri thi brta ni/ dza lo te da tsa li/ sarba lo ka ba she/ ka ri/ At+ma nAn mu ni sa/ ka bi te/ yo ga mad ra/ hi
181b5(rgyud): ti li na mostu te swA hA// drug mas bstod pa/ bka' bzlog mas mtho nga nas mngon par bstod pa/ na mo badz+ra pA Ni s+ya/ s+yAd de/ nga yi te/ a tri tre/ so me brah+ma/ bi da ni/ ri shi ri ni
181b6(rgyud): k+Shata tre/ ya sang rjes byan/ te ba taka te ya ni swA hA/ de nas dpal gyi lha mo chen mo la drug ma dang / dka' bzlog gnyis kyis bstod nas drug ma dang / dka' bzlog ma gnyis la yang bltas te
181b7(rgyud): lalan rdo rje'i 'khor gyi dkyil 'khor gyi nang du song ngo // de nas dpal gyi lha mo chen mo lha rnams kyis bstod/ lag na rdo rje 'khor gyi dkyil 'khor gyi mang du zhugs nas rig pa mtshan
181b8(rgyud): cho ga chen po rgyas pa pi ba ning 'phel bar bya ba dang / rig pa mchog gi cho ga rgyas pa chen po rgyan pa dang / rig pa mchog gi cho ga chen po rgyas bsgrub pa dang / rig pa mchog cho ga rgyas ba
182a1(rgyud): // po'i dpal bskyed pa dang / rig pa mchog gi cho ga rgyas pa chen po'i rig sngags kyi las thadu ba pa'i phyir/ rig sngags kyi rgyal po chen po'i mchog lag na rdo rjesar+b+ba su mi ra
182a2(rgyud): ma grub pa rnams grub par byed pa grub pa rnams chud mi za bar byed pa/ 'dod pa thad rab tu sbyin pa/ rtag tu dadal mngon par 'phel bar byed pa/ dkyil 'khor thad kyi nang du gtogs gang
182a3(rgyud): 'khor zang la 'jug par byed pa/ dkyil 'khor thams cad skyob pa'i rig sngags bshad/ de bzhin gshegs pa thaMthad la phyag 'tshol nas/ rig sngags kyi rgyal po chen po lag mardo rje
182a4(rgyud): spyi bo la bkur tre/ rig sngags 'di bshad// na mo bud+d+ha s+ya/ na mo d+ham s+ya/ na maHse g+ha s+ya/ na mo badz+ra bA tri sa/ na mo yak+Sha NA~MH/ na mo mahA shri le/ tsi la tsau li/ um mA da/ pra man+to/ dza
182a5(rgyud): shri ye/ tsa le tsa le/ shri ye/ a kir Ni/ u ba tiSh+Tha/ u ba rtin+da.i ma bu ru She/ na ma u ba tiSh+Tha/ ma ya ra me/ gri he gr-i/ te/ da ba ti badz+ra sA mAn sAhA/ rig sngags kyi
182a6(rgyud): rgyal po chen po dpal gyi lha mo chen mos rig sngags bshad ma thag tu lha rnams kyis de thos nas/ snying 'drar te lag na rdo rje'i zhal du lta zhing 'khod// de nas rig sngan kyi rgyal po chen po la/ 
182a7(rgyud): ni rdo rjes lha de dag la 'di skad ces smras// lha rnams khyed kyis rig sngags kyi rgyal po chen po dpal gyi lha mo chen mos rig sngags bshad pa gang yin pa nyon cig/ rig pa mchog gi
182a8(rgyud): ga rgyas pa chen po'i phyir 'phel bar bya ba dang / rig po mchog gi cho ga rgyas pa chen po rgyan pa dang / rig pa mchog gi cho ga rgyas pa chen po sgrub pa dang / rig pa mchog gi cho ga rgyas pa
182b1(rgyud): bo'i sgrub pa dpal mngon par bskyed pa dang / rig pa mchog gi cho ga rgyas pa chen po'i rig sngags kyi las thang ba ba'i phyir/ ma grub pa rnams grub par bang pa/ grub pa rnams chud mi za bar byed
182b2(rgyud): pa 'dod pa thams cad rab tu sbyin pa/ rtag tu dpal 'phel bar byed pa/ dkyil 'khor tha~Md gsal bar byed pa/ dkyil 'khor zad kyi nang du gtogs pa/ dkyil 'khor thadu 'jug par bya
182b3(rgyud): dkyil 'khor tha~Mng sgrub pa'i rig sngags bshad pa de/ bzod ldan dag khyed kyis rgyags pa med pa'i sems kyis/ sems nyon cig ngas rdo rje 'bar zhing rab tu 'bar la kun tu rab tu 'dra
182b4(rgyud): bas spyi bo gshegs sar/ de nas lha rnams snying 'dar te lag na rdo rje'i zhal du lta zhing rig sngags kyi rgyal po lag na rdo rje la dkyil 'khor gyi nang du gtogs pa'i rigs snga
182b5(rgyud): kyis kyang mngon par bstod/ rig sngags kyi rgyal po chen po da bal gyi lho mos rig sngaDa bshang ba gang yin pa de dag gis lag na rdo rje la bstod nas tshig 'di skabs
182b6(rgyud): smra so// rig sngags kyi rgyal po chen po dpal gyi lha mo kun tu lta ba chen po'i rig sngags kyi dkyil 'khor gyi nang du gtogs pa'i las rnams bshadadu gsol kha shadu gsol/ de nas ri
182b7(rgyud): sngags kyi rgyal po chen po lag na rdo rjes lha de dag la 'di skad ces smras// lha rnams ngas bshad kyis khyed nyon cig rig sngags 'chang thad kyi dpal mngon par 'byung bar bang ba
182b8(rgyud): ba ba'i dkyil 'khor dpal thaMd bskyed par byed / pha rol tu phyin pa thod kyi tshogasu gyur pa'i dkyil 'khor gyi rgyal po dngas bshad par bya ste/ gang mthong nas rig sngan 'chang tha~Md kyi da
183a1(rgyud): // thams cad kyi mngon par 'gyur ba dang / lha thams cad bskyang bar 'gyur ba dang / log 'dren thad zhi bar 'gyur ba dang / rgyal srid thad brten par 'gyur ba dang / dgra thul bar 'gyur
183a2(rgyud): ba dang / rig sngags 'chang gi dpal rnams 'phel bar 'gyur ba'i dkyil 'khor gyi rgyal po de ngas bshad// sa gzhi mnyam par brtag pas la/ shes rab can gyis dkyil 'khor bri
183a3(rgyud): khru ni bzhi 'am khru ni bcu drug pa// gyo mo dang ni gsag ma mang // dur khrod yang na shing gcig drung // yang na chu klung 'dus pa'i mdo/ sa gzhi de dag brtag pas la// de nas mkhas par dukyil
183a4(rgyud): 'khor bri// sa de lta bu mthong nas bsrung ba byas / gso sbyong dang ldan pas du gu la'i ras dkar po'i gos la/ lag na pa gapor thogaso nas phye ma rang kyi dus mtshas
183a5(rgyud): su dpal gyi lha mo'i rig sngags kyis lha rnams spyan drang bar bya 'o// de nas nam pad kyi dus sam/ yang na nang par dkyil 'khor bri bar bya/ ste/ ci ste gser gyi be mas brin ni lha'i dpal thob tra
183a6(rgyud): 'gyuraro// dngul gyis ni dag las rgyal bar 'gyuraro// zangs kyis ni zhi bar 'gyuraro// yang na tsan don gyi pha mas bris na ni dpal thob par 'gyu ro// tsan dan dmar po'i pha mas ni dgra las rgyal bar 'gyuraro// bu
183a7(rgyud): shel tsas ni grong khyer zhi bar 'gyur// yang na 'bras pa dkar pos bris na ni dpal thob par 'gyuraro// nas rngan pa'i phyes bris na ni dgra las rgyal bar 'gyuraro// yang na me'i bsreg pa byas pa'i thal ba
183a8(rgyud): bris na ni zhi bar 'gyur// ci sta so phag gi phye ma 'am/ sol pa 'am/ dur khrod kyi thal ba yang rung ste/ tshon rtsi 'di gsum gyis dkyil 'khor bris na ni yul 'khor la gnod por 'gyuraro// rig sdug
183b1(rgyud): 'chang bdag nyid dag par bya ste/ rgyu skar dang mthun pa'i dusu bsnyung ba bas la/ nyim bzang ba'am/ yang na yar gyi ngo tshas lnga la dkyil 'khor khru bcu drug pa 'am/ yang nakhru bcu bzhi 'bri'o// ci ste thon
183b2(rgyud): mar shar phyog su thig btab na ni rig sngags 'chang rnams kyi dpol 'phel bar 'gyuraro// ci ste lho phyog su btab na ni grong khyer la gnod par 'gyur/ tsaM ste nub phyog su btab ni ni rig sngags 'chang
183b3(rgyud): rnams phan tshun mi mthun par 'gyuraro// ci sta bang phyog su btab na ni dag thad las rgyal bar 'gyuraro// ci ste thog mar tshon dkar po bkye na ni rgyal po rgyal bar 'gyur zhing rig sngags 'chang rnams kyi la
183b4(rgyud): 'grub par 'gyuraro// ci ste tshon dmar po bkye ni ni grong khyer zhi bar 'gyuraro// ci ste nag po bkyen ni grong khyer la mi dge bar 'gyur ro// de nas rig sngags 'chang gis rig sngags kyi rgyal po bzlas brjod pad
183b5(rgyud): bzhin du dkyil 'khor bri bar ba ste/ bang phyogasu ni grangs kyi ri ban / lho phyog su ni ri 'bigs bde bzha'o// de nas khor yug gi ris bskor bar bya'o// dbus ni sangs rgyas bcom ldan
183b6(rgyud): 'das bri'o// g.yon logasu ni lag na rdo rje bri'o// bac+doMs kyi gas logasu ni dpal lha mo che no mo bri'o// lag na rdo rje'i drung du ni pho nyam/ drug bri'o// bong phyogs rdosu ni khab 'jug dang lnga
183b7(rgyud): chen po dang tshangs pa rnams de dag dang 'thun pa'i 'khor dang bdud rtsi bzhago// nub phyogasu drug ma dang / bka' bzlog ma dang / gzhon nu 'khor dang bcas pa bzhigo// lho phog su ni tshogs drug cu rtsa bzhi
183b8(rgyud): bo rnams pa nago slor rang yang tshogs bzhag par bya ste/ shar phyogs kyi sgor gtu mo bye dang / bas can gnyis bzhag/ lho phyogs kyi sgod ni bdud rtsi thab sbyor dang / rmugs byed gnyis bzha'o// nub po
184a1(rgyud): // kyi sgo ni rdzo ldan dang / mtshan sbyin gnyis pan go// nga phyogs kyi sgod ni lcags can dang / so can gnyis panago// na du ni bac+doMs tshig ldan ma dri za'i 'khor gyis bskor ba bzhago/ 
184a2(rgyud): kar sha ba ni brgya rtsa tsha ba'am/ yang na ban brgyas rdo rje byas te bzhog la de'i steng du spyan gyis bzlas brjod pas pa'i bum pa mi gnag cing rtsa ba med la mgrin bcings dang bcas pa bzhag
184a3(rgyud): par bya ste/ bum pa de'i nang du sa bon thaMd dang / rin po che thams cad gzhug cing 'o ma yod pa'i shing gi yal ga bzhago// grwa bzhir yang bum pa bzhi bzhag par bya ste/ mgrin bcings dang ldan pa

184a5(rgyud): des bla ma la bsnyen bkur bya'o// bla ma das kyang rig sngags 'chang bsnyung bar byas pa/ byang chub kyi sems yongasu bzung ba/ gso sbyong gi yan lag dang ldan pa/ gos gtsang
184a6(rgyud): ma bgos pa/ dar dkar gyis gdong g.yogs pa/ dkyil 'khor du gzhug par bya'o// de la nub phyogs kyi sgor bcug na ni dpal mngon par 'phel bar 'gyuraro// lho phyogasu ni rtag tu rgyal
184a7(rgyud): bar 'gyuraro// shar phyog su ni thab mo 'byung bar 'gyuraro// bang phyogasu ni bla ma'i sgo yin te 'jug par mi bya'o// de nas bla mas rig sngags 'chang dgu la'i ras dkar pos gdong g.yogs la/ deH/ 
184a8(rgyud): gyi lha mo'i rig sngogs kyis mgo bor bsang gtor bas te gzhu'o/ de nas 'gron bu brgyad brgya lha la dong bar bya'o// 'gron bu de yang lo mas bkris na ni rig sngags 'grub par 'gyur// ras da/ 
184b1(rgyud): bos dkris te bor na ni zhag 'dun gyis dpal 'ong bar 'gyur// rig sngags 'chang de dag la lha rnams kyang bstan par bya'o// de nas phyir byung ste byang phyogasu song la dbus kyi bum pa'i chu khyodar ba'i
184b2(rgyud): nang du sbyi// rig sngags 'cha' rnams kyis kyang lag pa g.yon pas mnos te btung bar bya'o// rig sngags rnams la yang sen tha~Mng bdag gis yong su bzu po nas smros shig ces bsgo ba bya'o/ 
184b3(rgyud): de'i 'og tu de dag gi don gyi phyir bdag gi pha rol tu phyin pa drug po rnams yongasu rdzogs par bya'o zhes slar gzhugo/ de'i 'og tu de dag gi don gyi phyir rig sngags kyi tshogs rnams bdag la gru

184b5(rgyud): gyur cig dang bar gyur cig ces brjod par 'gyur// dung gi sgra dang rnga sgra yang thos par 'gyur// ci ste bud med gos dkar po bgo zhing snad gang ba thogs pa mthong na ni lag na rdo rjes ji skad bshad
184b6(rgyud): bzhin du rig sngags 'chang de la dpal 'ong bar 'gyur// cisna thub pa gang ba mthong na ni rgyal srid ma/ yul gru'am/ grong gi bdag po thob par 'gyur// de nas rig sngags 'chang gi dpal thob pa

184b8(rgyud): thams cad mngon par 'byung bar byed pa'i dkyil 'khor thad mthong na ni de yang rgyal bar 'gyur te/ ngagra rnams brtul nas sa'i steng 'khol bar 'gyuraro// mi phal pa gang la la dpal 'dod
185a1(rgyud): // pas dpal thams cad mngon par 'byung bar byed pa'i dkyil 'khor chen po mthong na yang skal ba can gyi khad par du 'gyur zhing / rgyal srid dam/ yul gru'i bdag po'am/ grong gi

185a3(rgyud): mngon par 'byung bar byed pa'i dkyil 'khor chen mo mthong la mthong nas zhag nyi shu rtsa gcig gi bar da nges par gnas par bya ste/ rig sngags gang 'dod pa bzlas brjod pas na zhag nyi shu

186a1(rgyud): bar byed pa'i dkyil 'khor 'chang de la ni rtag tu lha rnams srung bar byed cing zhi ba dang bde lagasu 'gyuraro// rig sngags 'chang ngam/ rig sngags 'chang gi bu 'am/ rig sngags 'chang
