290b4(rgyud): ba'i phyag rgya ste/ rig sngags thams cad bcing ba dang grol bar byeng ba yino// de ltar de lta bu'i tshul gyis phyag rgya grangs med pa 'byung / rkang pa g.yas pa brkyang ba'i tshul du bzhag nas mdzub
290b5(rgyud): mo gcig drang por bsrang ste/ lta ba'i dmigasu gtang ba lag pa g.yas pa'i rdo rje mdun los su bzhag nas sta zur gyi phyog su bstan pa ni rgyal ba rtsa ba'i phyagargya'o// de nyid las
290b6(rgyud): dpung pa brkyang la khro bo'i lte ba bas ta bsdigs pa ni khro bo srog med kyi phyag rgya'o// de las mthe bong dang gzhibs pa ni khro ba rab tu gtum pa'i phyag rgya'o// de nyid las g.yon brkyang gi tshul du
290b7(rgyud): pa ni rdo rje dbyug sngon gyi phabargya'o// khro bo thams cad kyi spyi'i phyag rgya snga ma las mthe bong brkyang ba ni zhabs las byung gi phyag rgya'o// rdo rje nyid bstod de bstan pa ni rdo rje phonya ma'i tshogs thams
290b8(rgyud): cad kyi spyi'i phyag rgya'o//  nyid las snying khang rdo rje bas pa ni khro bo me gtum po'i phyag rgya'o// lag pa g.yon pa'i sar mo gsum bcu ma la mthe bo dzas kyi mdzub mo'i sen mo mnan te snying la
291a1(rgyud): bog su bzung la lag pa g.yas pa'i rdo rje bstod pa ni khro bo lha'i yan lag gi phyag rgya'o// de nyid las lag pa g.yon pa'i mdzub mo btang ste/ de bzhin du bzung ba'i gdong zhi bdub pa'i
291a2(rgyud): ping po 'i thams cad kyi spyi'i phyag rgya yi no// de bzhin du mdzud mo dang gung po brkyang 'ani rnam par rgyal ba'i phyag rgya'o// de nyid las mdzub mo cung zad bkug sde g.yon brkyang ba'i tshul du byas
291a3(rgyud): ni spyar drang ba'i phyag rgya'o// phung mo'i rtse mo mtha bas bka' snga mdzub mo brkyang ban gdon 'joms pa'i phyag rgya'o// rtsa ba'i phyag rgya de nyid las mdzub mo dang srin lag gnyis kyis phyirol nas pakris
291a4(rgyud): la g.yas brkyang ba'i tshul du byas pa ni mi bzad pa'i phyag rgya tshang de nyid las g.yon btung ba'i tshul du byas pa ni rnam par rgyal bar mi bzad pa'i phyab rgya'o// phya ba rgya de nyid mgo bor bzhag pa
291a5(rgyud): ni 'jigs pa'i phyag rgya'o// rkang pa g.yas brkyang gi tshul du byas la lag pa g.yon pa sta zur gyi phyogasu bzhag nas g.yas pa'i mthe bong gi ngos kyis mtha'u chung dang srin
291a6(rgyud): lag bsnol ba mnan te/ gung mo sbrang la mdzub mo cung zad bkug nas rdza ba'i phyogasu bzhag pa ni bcom ldan 'das ma rdo rje lcags kyu ma'i rtsa ba'i phag rgya'o// de nyid las mthe bong btang ba ni lcag
291a7(rgyud): kyu ma'i phyag rgya tha dad pa yino// g.yon brkyang gi tshul du byas la lag pa g.yon pas de bzhin du byas pa ni lcags kyu'i phyag rgya'o// rtsa ba'i phyag rgya nyid las rkang pa bsnams te skrang ba ni sa'i lha ma
291a8(rgyud): phyag rgya'o// rtsa ba'i phyag rgya las rkang pa gnyis bskums la mdzub mo brkyang ste bstan pa ni rdo rje lcags kyu ma'i gdon zhi bar bya ba'i phyag rgya'o// mdun log su mdzub mo gcig gi dbus bkug ste/ 
291b1(rgyud): bzhag la gung mo brkyang sde bstan pa ni rdo rje gdan gyi phag rgya'o// g.yon pa'i sor mo gnyis kyis de bzhin du byas pa ni lha'i phyag rgya'o// mdzub mo gcig pu ni 'jam dpal gri phyag rgya'o// gung mo ni rdo rje ma
291b2(rgyud): ma'i phyag rgya'o// g.yas brkyang gi tshul du gnas la lag pa g.yon pa'i san mo rnams spangs te/ khu tshur bcangs nas de bzhin du lag pa g.yas pa'i rdo rje brkyang sna lta ba'i dmigasu gtad pa ni rdo rje
291b3(rgyud): khu tshur gyi phyag rgya'o// mdzub mo steng du bzhag pa ni snying po'i phyag rgya'o// gang po yang de ltar byas pa ni nye ba'i snying po'i phyag rgya'o// gung mo dang mthe bong gnyis sbyar la sor mo gzhan rgyab tu bzhag pa ni
291b4(rgyud): rdo rje'i rloms ma'i yin pa phags pa'i srung ba yin// g.yas pa rkyang gi tshul gyis lal pa ba yon pa'i rdo rje g.yas pa'i dpung mo gong bzhag la lag pa g.yas pa'i rdo rje bstod nas dpung
291b5(rgyud): pa g.yon pardza thab su bzhag ste/ blta pa'i dam gsugatad pa ni rdo rje phag mo'i phyag rgya'o// g.yan brkyang gi tshul gyis lag pa g.yon pa bkan la mdzub mo dang mtheru chung gnyis
291b6(rgyud): bkug ste/ pad+ma'i rtsa ba lnga ru bas la g.yas pa yang de nyid dang 'dra bar bzhag pa ni lus dmar gyi phyag rgya'o// 'bang ba'i phyag rgya yang de nyid yin// snying po gang nas 'byung ba'i phyar rgya yang de nyid yino//  rje
291b7(rgyud): b+h+r-i gau r-i ti'i phyag rgya yang nga nyid yino// g.yas brkyang gi tshul gyi lag pa g.yon pa bkan te brkyang la mthe bong dang mtha'u chung so sor bskyed nas sor mo lhag ma rnams klu mgo'i gdangs ka ltar bzhag
291b8(rgyud): g.yas pa yang mtshan ring nga dang 'dra ba bas la/ gzhu 'gangs pa lnga dgru mo rna ba'i phyog su bzung bani klu chen po ru phag rgya'i khab 'jug gi 'dug stangs kyis mthe bo'i sen ma rkang pa g.yon pa'i
292a1(rgyud): / 'og tu sbyar te/ lag pa stangs dang bcas par sbyar ba'i mthil gyis bdag cing lag pa bsnol bas bzung la/ pho long gi thang su gyen du spang zhing lag pa bskor ta bkan pas nu ma'i bar du bdag cig
292a2(rgyud): bskor la lag pa gnyis kyi mthil logs kyi sor mo la bltas nas/ mig gyen khar bsgyur te bteg la glog sgyur ba'i phangab rgya yang bcings nas g.yon pa'i sor mo'i rdo rje'i chen po bstod pa byas na ngas
292a3(rgyud): lha dang / gnod sbyin dang / lha ma yin dang / klu dang / srin po rnams dang / log 'dun rnams dang / 'gram na gnas pa thad dang / tshangs pa dang / skem byed dang / dbang chen dang / drag po la sogs pa'i snying la glog 'gyu ba'i
292a4(rgyud): shugs 'di bab pas 'ong bar 'gyur lamathu stobs bcom nas rdo rje'i rje su 'thun pa dang dul zhing rdo rje la 'dud par 'gyur// de dag gi pho zhi bar byas na de'i tshe phag rgya de snying khar dkrol ba de dag da'i ma
292a5(rgyud): las 'thun par bde bar 'gyur ba'i phyir dang ning byams pa'i sam sa dang ldan par bzlas brjod pa'o// de nas bcom ldan 'das ma rdo rje lu gu rgyud kyi phyag rgya'i mtshan nyid 'byung ste lag
292a6(rgyud): ba g.yon pa phyir bstan g.yas pa nang du bstan de gcig tu sbyar nas/ lag pa'i sor mo rnams kyis g.yon pa'i mtha'u chung nas brtsams te rang nas bzung ste drikris la gru mo bsnams nas phyag rgya snying
292a7(rgyud): bzhag ste mtha bong gnyis kyis so so'i srin lag mnan la lag pa gnyis phyir bstan pa ni/ bcom ldan 'das ma rdo rje lu gu rgyud tha dad pa yino// thabs de nyid las lag pa gnyis bkan pa ni bcings pa'i
292a8(rgyud): phyag rgya'o// lag pa gnyis ka'i mdzub mo dang mthe bong gdu bu ltung pa mtshun smad pa 'din rdo rje lug rgyud tha dad pa yin// mthe bong gnyis bkyed pa ni rdo rje sgrog gi phyag rgya'o// g.yon pa bgan la g.yas pa/ 
292b1(rgyud): phung ste/ sor ma rnams gcig la gcig bsdams pa 'di yang rdo rje lu gu rgyud kyi phyag rgya yin// de las khu chung bcangs sta mtha bong gnyis brkyang ba ni rdo rje thog gi phyag rgya'o// sor mo rnams pa sta khu chur bcangs
292b2(rgyud): la mdzub mo gnyis kyis mnan nga sgra dang bcas par brdab pa ni dgrol ba'i phyag rgya'o// phyag 'tshal ba'i thal mo'i sor mo bsnams la mdzub mo gnyis so sor bkug ste/ gung mo gnyis ngos la bstan po na~M sang+yas
292b3(rgyud): kyi spyan gyi phag rgya'o// phan tshun bsnol te snyim pa bzad la mdzub mo gnyis kyi sen mo gcig gis gcig bkab pa ni spyan drang ba yino// de las bzlog pa ni slar btang ba yino// de bzhin du lag pa g.yas pa
292b4(rgyud): khu chur gyi rdo rje tho ba phrag pa log su bzhag ste/ sngangs kyis snying la bsdigs pa ni khro bo'i phyag rgya'o// yig 'bru bcu pa'i tshul du byas ba'i rdo rje dbyug ba'i yin// de nyid las bstod pa ni grom
292b5(rgyud): 'gro ba'i phyag rgya'o// mtha bong 'gyed pa ni gzhom pa'i phyag rgyar g.yas pa'i mtha bong dang mthe'u chung gnyis kyis g.yon hUM khu chur bzung la mdzub mo dang gung mo dang srin lag rnam
292b6(rgyud): brkyang ste/ mdang rtsa gsum pa'i dbyibs ltar byas pa ni gtsug nas byung gi phyag rgya'o// me lha spyan dang ba'i phag rgya yang de nyid yino// g.yon pa'i srin lag dang gung mo sbas pa ni gcig nas byung gi phag rgya
292b7(rgyud): tha dad pa yin// lag pa g.yon pa'i srin lag dang gung mo bkug pa ni mthe bos bzung la mdzub mo dang mthe'u chung gnyis btung ba ni rdo rje 'jigs pad chen po'i phyag rgya'o// de nyid mdzub mo'i rdzi ma
292b8(rgyud): thob rtsam log su bdud pa 'dzin rje rje 'jigs byed chen po'i phyag rgya tha dad pas/ rdo rje rtsa gcig pa min/ gzhan yang rnamakha' rdzing dang dbal gyi ba'u du babs de las mtharu chung dang sran la
293a1(rgyud): gnyis kyi thong to dkug pa ni mig gi phyag rgya zhes grogaso/ mthe'u chung dang srin lag dang bung mo rnams kyi thor ngo logs par bkug pa ni khro gnye bcan gyi phyag rgya'o// med med dang gung mo
293a2(rgyud): sr-id las dang gung mo rnams kyi thor to logs par bkug pa ni khro gnyad car gyi phyag rgya'o// mdzub mo dang gung mo dang srin lag dang mthe'u chung rnams sprang la/ mthe bong gnyis kyi thor to gung mo dang srin
293a3(rgyud): lag gi mtsham su bzhag pa ni rta mgrin gyi phyag rgya'o// de nyid las srin lag dang gung mo gnyis kyi tshigs nang du bkug ste/ mthe'u chung gnyis brkyang ba ni rus sbal gyi bag rgya gnyis pa yin// lag pa badz+ra
293a4(rgyud): bla 'og tu bstan te bsnol la sor mo rnams gcig la gcig bkris nas mthe bong dang mthe'u chung rnams sprad pa ni/ rus sbal dang rdo rjes 'og gi phyag rgyal// lag pa gnyis khu tshur bcangs
293a5(rgyud): la gung mo btang ste rdo rje ltar byas nas g.yon pa'i mdzub mo brkyang bani rdo rje dbyug pa'i phyag rgya'o// sgrol ma'i phyag rgya nyid las mdzub ma gnyis kyi thor to nas gang tsam gyis phye
293a6(rgyud): rdo rje yangs pa'i phyag rgya'o// nas gnyis tsam gyis pha ba ni bdud rtsi thab sbyong gyi'o// mdzub mo gnyis brkyang ba ni kun tu yangs pa'i phyag rgya'o// de nas mdzub mo gnyis brkyang ste sprad pa ni pad+ma yangs pa'i phyag rgya'o
293a7(rgyud): mdzub mo gnyis brkyang mar brjod pa ni rdo rjes 'og gi phyag rgya'o// de nyid las gung mo gnyis kyi thang tse'i tshigs dang po gdu bu ltar bkug la/ mdzub mo gnyis kyis rtse mo sprad pa ni rdo rje dgra sta'i phyag rgyal/ 
293a8(rgyud): gson pa'i mdzub mo brkyang ba ni ral gri dang / dgra sta'i phyag rgya'o// gung ma dang srin lag gnyis thong to bsnol te sbya la/ mdzub mo dang mthe'u chung brkyang ste gung ma dang mthe bong gnyis kyi rtse ma skyong ba rje
293b1(rgyud): sang ga'i khri'i phyag rgya'o// mdzub mo dang gung mo gcig la gcig bstan la/ mthe bong brkyang ste sbyang nas mthe'u chung yang brkyang ste/ sbyang ba ni rdo rje lcags mda'i pag rgya'o// lag pa gnyis bsnol la mtha
293b2(rgyud): bod gnyis sgreng ste sor gnyis tsam gyis pha ba ni rus sbal gyi phag rgya dang / phur bu dbyung ba'i phyag rgya'o// lag pa gnyis bsnol te sor mo thad sbyang bar bya ba ni rdo rje ra ba'i phag rgya'o// lag pa gnyis bkan la
293b3(rgyud): mtha'u chung mang du spyang te mdzub mo dang gung mo dang / srin lag rnams rgyab tu bsgrengs nas mdzub mo dang gung mo dang srin lag rnams kyis mnan ta mthe bong gnyis rus sbal gyi phyag rgya bzhin du byas pa ni
293b4(rgyud): rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa'i phyag rgya'o// srin lag nang du bku ga la mthe bong gnyis kyi tshigs drang por mnan mdzub mo gnyis kyi rtse mo gung mo gnyis kyi tshigs dang bar sbyar nas mthe'u chung ba
293b5(rgyud): dang por sbyar ba ni mtshon cha chen po'i phyag rgya'o// de nyid las mdzub mo gnyis kyi sen mo la brtan pa ni mtshon cha mchog gi phyag rgya'o// mtshon cha chen po'i phyag rgya de nyid las mdzub mo
293b6(rgyud): gnyis gung mo gnyis kyi tshigs dang po'i bsrubs kyi glong gzhang ba ni mtshon cha'i shugs kyi phyag rgya'o// de nyid las mdzub mo gnyis kyi thor to gung mo'i tshigs dang po nas cung zad bkug ste gung
293b7(rgyud): mo gnyis kyi tshigs dbu mar spyad pa ni mtshon cha'i snying po yi no// mtshon cha chen po de nyid las srin lag dang mthe bong ngos sgyur ba ni tshol ba'i mtshon cha'o// lag pa'i phyag rgya dang thab su byas pa ni
293b8(rgyud): dam tshig chen po'i phyag rgya yin te phyag 'tshal ba'i phyag rgya dang 'dra'o// mkha' lding gi dpal be'u'i phyag rgya ltar srin lag po ste mthe bong gnyis drang por gzhibs pa yang rdo rje dbyug sngon
294a1(rgyud): // pabargya'o// de nyid las mthe bong gnyis kyi tshigs dang po lags par bkug ste srin lag gnyis kyi drung du brjed pa ni rdo rjeng dbyug pa'i phag rgya'o// mda' ngo tsha'i dbebs lngang gang mo gnyis kyi dru
294a2(rgyud): du mthe bong gnyis gzhibs pa'i rtse mo bkug pa ni gtsug tor gyi phyag rgya'o// pad+ma'i gdan gyi drubyibs lta ru bas 'gung mo gnyis kyi thor to sprad pa ni spyan ras gzigs dbang phyug gi phyag rgya'o// mthe'u chung da
294a3(rgyud): srin lag bdu bu ltar bkug la de bzhin du sprang / gung me gnyis gzhibs pa mnan nas gabs pa'i tshogs dang ngor 'dzub mo gnyis gzhang ba ni 'dod pa'i rdo rje pa'i 'o// de nyid las mtha bong gnyis yin
294a4(rgyud): sprad pa de la srin lag gnyis sbyar ba ni lus las byung gi phab rgya'o// thal ba'i khu chur ni 'joms byang lnga'i phyag rgya'o// lag pa ga nyis bkan te sor mo'i pi rol du bsnol mar btung la mdzub mo
294a5(rgyud): bsrang ste thong to sbrang nas mthe bong brkyang nas mdung rtsi gsu ma pa'i dbyibs ltar bas pa ni lha mu'i phag rgya'o// mtha'u chung dang srin lag gi thor to mthe bos mnan la sor mo lhag ma rnams
294a6(rgyud): btang ste/ mdung rtsa gsum pa'i phyag rgya'o// lag pa gnyis bkan ta sor mo'i dbyibs ltar bas pa ni lus dpag med kyi phyag rgya'o// lag pa gnyis glang po che'i sna'i dbyibs ldar bas pa ni 'jigs pad kyi phag
294a7(rgyud): rgya'o// smin ma yang bkug pa ni khro ba dbang phyug gi yin te/ 'di dag ni rigs kyi rgyal po bco brgyad kyi phyag rgya yin// mdzub mo gnyis so so'i gung mo'i drung du bkug pa ni log 'dren rnams kyi phyag rgya'o// lag na
294a8(rgyud): khu tshur na mkha' lta/ khong stong sbyar nas de bzhin du/ mthe bong lhan cig bzhag pa ni// nyi ma yi ni yin par bshad// g.yon pa'i sor mo bzhi po rnams/ g.yas pa yis ni bcum par bya// de ltar khu tshur bca
294b1(rgyud): byas nas/ mthe bong gnyis ni bskyed de skyug g.yon pa mthong bar byas pa ni/ mig g.yon gyi ni phyag rgya yin/ lag pa g.yas pa'i mthe bong dang / mdzub mo yang ni de bzhin sbyad/ sor mo gsum po rnams kyang ni
294b2(rgyud): mthe bong ldan cig sbyang bya zhing / byi la'i sdeng mo'i dbyibs 'dra ba/ zhabs kyi snying po'i phyag rgya 'di/ 'jig rten gsum gyi mchod pa yin/ sor mo dag ni bzhi po rnams/ lag pa g.yon pas bcad padu ba/ 
294b3(rgyud): g.yon pa'i mthe bong bskyed nas ni// g.yas pa yang ni bstod par bya/ phrag pa gnyis kyi rgyab tu ni// rtag tu 'dug par bya ba yin// sor mo yi ni mdzub mo dang // gung mo tshigs kyi bar du ni/ mthe bong gnyis kyi tha
294b4(rgyud): ma'i tshigs// sbyar zhing lags par bzhag par bya// g.yon pa'i 'khrig ma'i phyog su ni/ g.yas pas mthe bong brtan pas pa// sang ga'i rna ba 'dra ba ste// phyag rgya dang ldan snying po yin/ phyag rgya gsum po 'di
294b5(rgyud): dag ni/ 'khrul 'khor rnams kyi snying por bshad/ 'dig/ gis ni sbyad byas shing // gsang sngags ldan par byas nan// 'khru la 'khor 'od 'bar gang yin dang / 'khrul 'khor rtse mo maM
294b6(rgyud): gang snang ba dang ni maM snang dang // che chung dang ni dkar nag rnams/ thad kyang ni 'jigs 'gyur te// 'di la spyad par mi bya'o// 'khrul 'khor phyag rgya gsum bshad pa// thor tshugs gsum pa yin par bshad
294b7(rgyud): de la gnyis ka'i sor mo kum/ 'og gi phyogasu brtan bzhing // mthe bong yang ni de bzhino// gung mo gyen du sgreng nas ni// gnyis ka lhan cig sbyar ba ga/ na mkha' phyag rgyar brtan pa ste/ lha chen gyi ni yin par shA
294b8(rgyud): bdag nyid dang ni ldan pa yin// g.yon po'i gung ma gang yin pa/ gnyis ka yon par du gzhug lag pa gnyis ka'i sor mo yi/ lhag pa yang ni dgyed par byed/ mthe bong gnyis kyang bkyed bya ste/ lnga
295a1(rgyud): / mo'i phag rgya yin par bshad// mdor na phag rgya 'di dag ni/ bas na las rnams grub pa ste// bgegs rnams zhi bar 'dod pa bzhin// rab tu bsgoms te spang b.ru ba// de las gzhan pa rgyu dkur gyi/ 
295a2(rgyud): don kun sgrub par byed pa yi// phag rgya spyi'i sgrub pa'i thabs// 'di dag kyang ni bshad pa ru ba/ spyan drang la sogs don rnams la/ srung ba la sogs las rnams las/ sgrub pa pos ni rims bzhin du/ phag
295a3(rgyud): rgya 'di dag spar bar ba/ phag rgya kun gyi cho ga yi// btang ba dang ni dgug pa la/ shin tu bzlas pa'i sgrub pa po// bgegs rnams dang ni log 'dren gyis// ring du yongasu spong bar dang / thog mar las ni thaMd la
295a4(rgyud): bgags kun zhi bar bya ba'i phyir/ bgegs rnams kun gyi dgrar gyur pa/ bdud rtsi thab sbyor bshad par bya// lag pa gnyis ka'i ma the bong gnyis kyis mthe'u chung gi sen mo mnan la sor mo ldan
295a5(rgyud): ma rnams kyi bar nas gang tsam gyis phye ste/ rdo rje'i mtshan nyi du byas la// de nyid las bsnol te dpung mgor bzhag nas mche ba mnan la drag tu lta zhing khur ba bus te rkang pa phral la/ 'phre
295a6(rgyud): zhing g.yas brkyang gi tshul gyis lus btud pa ni 'phags pa bdud rtsi thab sbyor gyi rtsa ba'i phyag rgya'o// 'di mngon sum bstan te/ log 'dran rnams dang gdon gzhan rnams chings shig ces byas na bcings
295a7(rgyud): bar 'gyuraro// lag pa g.yon pa'i rdo rje gang yin pa de ni las kyi rdo rje zhes pa'o// g.yas pa ni dam tshig gi rdo rje min// snyim pa bkan la mthe'u chung gnyis bsnol ba'i bar srin lag gnyis bzhag nas mdzu
295a8(rgyud): mo gnyis dbus dkug la gung mo gnyis gzhibs pa de'i tshigs dang por bstan te/ mthe bong gnyis glo la gcar nas snyim pa'i thab su byas pa ni khrus kyi thabs te/ khrus byed pa'i tshe de la lan bdun bzlas
295b1(rgyud): brjod bas nas phyag rgya'i chu mgo bar blugs na bgags rnams las grol zhing khrus pas nas kyang 'jug par mi 'gyuraro// de nyid las mthe bong gnyis bar du bcug la gzhan thams cad snga ma bzhin du
295b2(rgyud): byas pa ni/ srung ba'i phag rgya ste/ mgo ba dang lag pa gnyis dang snying ka dang lkog ma dang gnas ldang rim pa bzhin gtug par bya'o// de nyid las mdzub mo gnyis bkug mtha bong gnyis tshigs dang po yang ni
295b3(rgyud): du btung ba ni lha thams cad kyi spyi'i byas kyi phag rgya'o// srung ba'i phyag rgya las mdzub mo gnyis btang ste/ rdo rje'i tshul du byas pa ni srung ba chen po log 'dran thams cad 'joms par bang pa yin te/ 
295b4(rgyud): khar bzhag la nyi ma gcig bzlas brjod pas na/ log 'dran gyis zin pa las grol bar 'gyur te/ gdon thaMd la yang de bzhin du spyang bar bya'o// g.yon pa'i sor mo gnyis kyis mthe bong sbas
295b5(rgyud): gdu bu ljang 'dug pa'i nang du mthe'u chung dang mdzub mo ga nyis dbu bkug pa'i thong to bcug la lag pa g.yas pas+t+ra zur phyog su rdo rjer byas te las thams cad la dri dang me dza
295b6(rgyud): dang 'dug pa la sogs pa thams cad la sbyar na 'gags 'ong bar mi 'gyur// rdo rje de nyid g.yon pa'i gtum ma phyogasu gzung na gzi byin skye bar 'gyur// g.yon pa'i srin lag sbyang ba'i ngos la
295b7(rgyud): mthe'u chung dang gung mo bsnol ba bstan po mdzub mos mthe'u chung gi thor dza dam du gzung nas mdzub mo dang gung mo thor to mthe bos mnan pa ni bcom ldan 'das de nyid kyi mche ba'i phyag rgyas
295b8(rgyud): gdon thams cad dang bgegs chen po rnams la sbyang ba du bya la/ ser mo rnams pani tshun bsnol lam tha bong gnyis nang du bcug pa'i spang du mdzub mo tshigs gcig bkug sde gdu bu'i thabs
296a1(rgyud): // sprad ba ni mu bskul pa'i phyag rgya ste// tshul bska nas ci dga' ba khrus bya/ rdo rje'i phyag rgya la mdzub pa dal pad+mo de nyid spyan drang bam/ gnyis ga brkyang ba'i spang bdang ba man / 
296a2(rgyud): bdud rtsi thab sbyor gyi phyag rgya yin// lag pa g.yon pa'i rdo rje gang yin pa ni khro bo chen po'i phyag rgya ste/ bcings pa dang dkyil 'khor gyi skabasu bshad pa'i las gang dang gang yin pa de dang de la khrom
296a3(rgyud): chen po sbyang bar bya'o// spyan drang ba dang / slang btang ba la yang phyag rgya rnams ji lta ba bzhin du sngags dang sbyang bar bya'o// rigs kyi phyag rgya thams cad la yang de dag nyid kyis sbyang ba duba'o// sgrim pa las mthe'u chung
296a4(rgyud): dang srin lag phan tshun bsnol te mthe bong gnyis glol gzhar mdzu ba mo glod de dbus bkug la gung mo gzhibs pa'i tshigs dang po bzhag pa ni rigs gsub car gyi spyi'i mchod yon gyi phyag
296a5(rgyud): rgya'o// de bzhin du song mo phrugs gsum phan tshun bsnol la mdzu ba mo brkyang ba'i tho po sprad nas mthe bong gnyis kyis glong banag te/ snyim pa'i thabasu byas pa ni me tog gi phag rgya'o// snyim pa
296a6(rgyud): la mthe'u chung gzhibs te/ de'i rgyab tu srin lag gzhibs te gzhang / de'i rgyab tu gung mo gzhibs la mdzub mo gnyis logs shig tu brkyang ste/ gzhibs nas mtha bong gnyis glo la gzhang te snyom pa'i phab su bya
296a7(rgyud): ba ni bdug pa'i phyag rgya'o// snyim pa gzed mdzub mo gnyis cung zad bkug pa ni spyi'i lha bshos kyi phyag rgya stenang du me tog bzhag par bya'o// lag pa g.yas bskyabs byin gyi phyag rgyar byas la g.yon pa khrig man
296a8(rgyud): gdu bu ltar bzung ba ni dri phyag rgya'o// lag pa g.yas pa khu tshur bcangs la mthe bong dang gung mo gzhibs pa ni spyi'i mang me'i phyag rgya'o// mtha bong dang srin lag gnyis kyis sngags kyi nor bu bzung la mtha'u/ 
296b1(rgyud): chung dang gung mo brkyang ste/ mdzub mo'i dbus bkug nas gung mo'i rgyab kyi tshigs dang por bzhag pa 'di ni rig sngags kyi nor bu'i phag rgya'o// snyim pa'i nang du sngags kyi nor bu blangs la gsang sngags bzlas
296b2(rgyud): brjod pas na dag par byas par 'gyu ro// lag pa g.yas skyabs byin gyi tshul du byas te bstan la mdzub mo bkug nas mthe bong yang lag pa'i mthil du dkug pa ni me spyan drang ba'o// mdzub mo dang mthe zos
296b3(rgyud): tra ti bkug ste ldan gcig sbyang bon ma spang btang da'i 'o/ g.yas pa'i rdo rje gang yin pa de ni sems dpa' yin// lag pa gnyis gud ma gnyis dang sbed 'asbyang la gzhan bsnol nas zla bag tu bstan
296b4(rgyud): dra ba'i thab su bya ba ni rdo rje dra ba'ilo// mdzub mo dang mthe'u chung gzhibs la mthe bong gnyis bkyed nas 'og dang thang kang sa la bzhag ste/ gsang sngags bzlas brjod pas na las thams cad la sa gzhi
296b5(rgyud): bsal ba dang yongasu gzung babs par 'gyur te rigs kyi spyi'i snying po'i phyag rgya yin// lha rnams la bstan na yang lha rnams dag 'bar bas pa dang / bskul ba bas par 'gyuraro// khro bag
296b6(rgyud): laM ka~M l-i'i phyag rgya bcings pa la phyag 'tshal ba'i thal mo las sor mo rnams sbyar ba ni mchod pa'i phyag rgya'o// snol mar sbyar ba ni phyag 'tshal ba'i bag rgya'o// ma tog le sogs pa ma 'byor na yang phag tu
296b7(rgyud): bcings pos 'bar bu bas par 'gyur/ las thams cad la yang bskrad pa ni las kyi rdo rjes bya'o// sangs rgyas spyan gyi phyag rgya ni thams cad du rig sngags srung bar bya'o// sor mo phan tshun sbyar te khu tshur bca
296b8(rgyud): la gung mo gzhibs pa'i phyi rol du mdzub mo rdo rje lda bas nas mthe bong gnyis blo la gzhang ba ni dam tshig chen po'i phyag rgya'o// ngan du byas pi dag la yang srung ba chen po yin la nye'i khong du mtshams de
297a1(rgyud): // los bsgyur ba'i bzlas brjod pa su zin kyang sus kyang rig sngags kyi mthu nyams par byed mi nuso// khro bo 'chol ba'i sbas pa'i phag rgya la yang srung bar 'gyur te/ 'di dag ni sgrub pa
297a2(rgyud): rnams kyi spyi'i phyag rgya yin no// de las gzhan yang sbyin sreg gi gsang sngags las gang gi skabasu bstan pa lung las ji skad 'byung ba de dag la yang las kyi phyag rgya sbyang bar ba'o// rdo rje'i
297a3(rgyud): phyag rgya ni rdo rje'i rigs thams cad spyi'i yin no zhes bcom ldan 'das rdo rje 'dzin gyis bshad do// na mo rat+na tra yA ya/ na mo badz+ra d+ha ra sa/ namo bid+ya gnas skye/ 'di ni snying po yin te
297a4(rgyud): bzhin du/ rdo rje rigs chen de dang ni/ rig sngags rigs ni thams cad kyi/ rigs sngags blon ma bdun dag dang // rig sngags yan lag bdun dang bcas// 'dod pa'i rdo rje 'dzin
297a5(rgyud): gyis bshad// dang po 'dod pa'i rdo rje ma// rig sngags rdo rje ma tog bzhin// las mchog la ni gnyis pa yin// rdzu 'phrul dang mi stobs ldan pa// rdo rje sgrog zhas bya
297a6(rgyud): dang // 'og phag ser mo gtum mo dang // de bzhin rdo rje tshugs par dka'// rig sngags chen mo bdun de dag/ nyi ma bdun dang stobs mnyam zhing // sems can tshogs kun mchog
297a7(rgyud): rnams la// thal mo sbyar te phyag kyang bya// gzhan yang ya mtshan las 'das shing // dus kyi mtha' yi me 'dra ba// rdo rje khro bo khro bo che// de la yang dang yang du 'dud// de bzhin rdo rje
297a8(rgyud): thog thag ni// 'byung po rnams la thog thog bzhin// gzung dka' rig sngags las kun byed// lho phyogs sgon srung ba dang // rdo rje khu chur mchog sbyin dang // gtum po chen po
297b1(rgyud): stobs po che// bdag dang gzhan kun srung ba'i mchog / khang phyogs sgon srung ba dang // pho nya chen mo grub pa bcu// de bzhin de dag g.yon mo rnams// phol ma ni drug cu bani// rig sngags
297b2(rgyud): tshogs ni sna tshogs dang // rdo rje dbyug pa'i ma la// rdo rje rigs kyi slob dpon gyis// grub pa'i rdo rje cho ga yis// snying nas yang ni phyag byas nas// de las gzhan rnams bshad par bya/ 
297b3(rgyud): las kyi dkyil 'khor gtso bo ni// ji bzhin du ni bris nas kyang // gdon gyi las rnams bsgrub par bya// gang gi ming ni smos tsam gyis// ma bcos par yang gdon rnams 'jig/ dbang
297b4(rgyud): zo'i rgyal mtshan bstan pa yis// ma bcos lha min 'pham pa bzhin// 'byung ba kun las grol ba'i thabs// 2jig rten kun tu mchog gyur gang // thams cad zhi bdu bad
297b5(rgyud): pa yi// dam pa gang yin bshad par bya// gang zhig tshul bzhin dran pas shing // sgrims te mchod pa byas na ni// 2byung po kun gyis mi tshugs la// 'jigs med bde bar
297b6(rgyud): gnas par 'gyur// 'jig rten 'jog rten slob dpon 'dra// 'jig rten gyi ni snang byed mchog/ 'byung po'i tshogs ni thams cad kyis// rtag tu lnga chen bzhin du mchod// mchog gyur mchog
297b7(rgyud): gis mchod pa des// cho ga bzhin du rgyas pang ni// gdon gyi mtshan nyid bar du yang // legs par rab tu bshad par bya// zla phyed yud tsam nyin mo dang // rgyu skar dag ni bzang ba la// gcad
297b8(rgyud): zhing gos gtsang bgos pa dang // bsdams shing nges par gnas pa dang // gtsang mo'i grogs dang ldan pa dang // gtsang ma'i lam du zhugs pa yi// yar gyi ngani tshes gcig ma// tshes gnyis
298a1(rgyud): / de bzhin lnga yang rung // ches drug gam ni brgyad dam bcu gsum yang na nya dag gi/ nyin par yongasu bzung bar bya// kha ba dang ni bal pa// ba shwa de ba de bzhin te// yang na te'u gtul
298a2(rgyud): yang rung // zhag byed yongasu bzung bar bya// shA ta ma tra ba la dang // shar ma tha a bi tsi// dza ya se'u mo'i yud tsam la// dkyil 'khor dam pa ba ba yin// bsgrims te lag na rdo rje dang // rgyal
298a3(rgyud): dbang la ni dag bas nas// zhi zhing sngan chad las byas pa'i// sa phyogs mkhas pas 'gro bar ba// kun dga' tshong 'dus gtsug lag khang // grong dang grong khyer byeng shar mtshams// de ba ni/ 
298a4(rgyud): lho nub mtshams kyang rung // mnyam zhing mdangs dga' mdo ga sdug dang // tshad ldan tshwa sgo med pa dang // rdo dang gsag ma rus pa dang // skyon kun med pa des mthong nas// de 'dra'i
298a5(rgyud): sa de rnyed nas ni// rdo rje lcags kyu dran bya zhing // shar phyogs nas ni gom pa dor// ha cang mi drag rgod mi bya// rig sngags pa/ la dad pa yis// bdag nyid de nas bsrung bar bya// yan
298a6(rgyud): lag gsum po nas dang ni// yungs kar 'bras kyang bzhag par bya// de nas dkyil 'khor gnas der yang // dge ltas dag kyang blta bar bya// sngags kyis dag par byas pa'i chus// thams
298a7(rgyud): cad legs par gtong bar bya// ba lang lci bas legs par sbyar// ku sha dag kyang gding bar bya// khru ni bzhi 'am drug gam brgyad// sa yi phyogs char thig kyang gdab// thig skud gsar zhing
298a8(rgyud): brims pa dang // ngan pa dang mdzes pa dang / drin ma dang ni lhan drug/ gzabs pa dang ni legs pa dang // bung du dang ni byam la sog so// ma legs bdud pa rnams med na// dri dang me chog
298b1(rgyud): mchod pa yis// shes rab can gyis thig kyang gdab// bu dag tshig shes dben pa bde// chos la mi smod bde ba yin// 'tshe ba spangs pa 'jig rten bde// srog chags rnams la sdom pa dang // 
298b2(rgyud): 'dod chags bral ba 'jig rten bde// 'dod pa rnams las 'das pa dang // nga snyam nga rgyal zhi ba dang // dul ba 'dir ni mchog tu bde// bu bdag rgyun las bzlog pa yi// lam bgrod zab cing
298b3(rgyud): dka' ba// mun nag thibs pos bsgribs pa dang // 'dod la chags pas rtogs mi 'gyur// ngas ni dka' ba rtogs pas nas// skye bo rgyun bzhin 'khyam pa dang // 'dod pa dag gi mdud pa yis
298b4(rgyud): bcings pa'i bar du bshad pa ste// 'di ni lag na rdo rje yi// yid 'ong cha du brjod pa brgyad// ki la~M ki lis srung bas nas// nges pa kur+tha tu 'jigs pa med// bang phyogs yang na nub phyogasu/ 
298b5(rgyud): tshon rtsil sogs de dag bzhag/ shar ltas lag pa g.yon ba yis// dri dang me tog phreng bas mchod// mtshon cha bsngag/ sa shing phyogs bcings la// thig gisaM grA yang
298b6(rgyud): btsal bar bya// de ltar mnyam par bkod nas ni// khang pa gru bzhi bri bar ba// ji ltar thig ni gdab pa bzhin// thig dang 'thun par bsgrubs par ba// rig sngags rdo rje lcags kyu ma// ya
298b7(rgyud): mtshan de nyid dran par bya// nang gi khang pa mnyam pa dang // grwa bzhi lags par gnas par ba// grwa yi phyogs ni thams cad// da yi tshad dang 'thun pa ni// rdo rje khang gnas rdo rje yaM/ dbus
298b8(rgyud): dang thog ma dbyibs legs shing // rtse mtho shin tu rgya che ba// shad du brtan te bzhag par bya// rdo rje yau nr-i bang pogasu// rdo rje rig sngags gdab cing bya// dbus dang rtse mo lags pa yi// rgyal
299a1(rgyud): // mtshan rtse mo na du sbeng // nung byang grwar ni bzhag padu ba// rdo rje sgo ni nub du 'dod// 'di ni gsang ba'i sgor bshad de// 'byung ba thams cad 'jigs par byed// dkyil 'khor 'dod pas
299a2(rgyud): sgo de yi// bar+Na phyogs kyi ni nye 'khor dang // lho phyogasu ni gang bshad pa// bsnan te legs par bzhag par bya// gur gam dag ni yid 'ong ba// rgya stegs khu bos sbyar ba'am// lab rgan rtsis
299a3(rgyud): ni dmar bas bya// dang ni yid kun 'phrog byed pa// des ni ba dan bas nas kyang // shing rings dag la gdags par bya// sgo yi lho phyogs ngosu yang // de dag las gzhan gang 'dod pa'i// ku ran
299a4(rgyud): da yi phreng ba dag/ rdo rje rtse mor gdags par bya// yang na me tog dmar po yi// phreng ba sna tshogs bzang po gdags// rdo rje'i sgra ni don grub pa// 'gro dang mi 'gro 'jig rngan gsum/ 
299a5(rgyud): 'di dag 'joms nus gang yin pa// blo srung gnyis kyang bzhag/ ba zhing // de yang rig sngags bzhin du bya// grags pa gan na yang gang 'dod pa// rdo rje thog thog lho phogasu// me
299a6(rgyud): yungs kang stengs dag tu// dri bsrungs zhim pos cher bsgos shing // dri dang me tog rgyas pa'ang bzhag/ rdo rje khu tshur stobs po che// dpal ldan de bzhin byang phyog su// rdo rje khu chung phyag rgya yis/ 
299a7(rgyud): bzhag na glags ni rnyed mi 'gyur/ 'jig rten gsum rgyal gang gang las// rdo rje 'dzin pa yid kyis bkug/ rdo rje khu chung khu tshur gyis// bsnun na rnam par 'jig par 'gyur// rdo rje snying
299a8(rgyud): ba ra yang ba ded// gaman lags nas ni 'jug pa bya// don g.yas logs bskor ba yang // 'jig rten dag tu bshad par bya// 'khrod kun dang ni lhan cig tu// rdo rje sgrog kyang bzhag brgya/ 
299b1(rgyud): klu yi gtso bo ni rgyas bu// gzi can gnyis kyang grwa ru bzhag/ 'di gnyis klu kun bdag po ste// klu kun gyi ni gnas kyang yin// bram ze las byung dug can de// 'di gnyis sngags dang phag rgyar
299b2(rgyud): ldan// 'di gnyis kyi ni mdun logasu// mkha' lding rnam par 'dud pa'i bu// mkha' lding gi ni cho ga bzhin// rkang dang byis pa la sogs bskor// de nas 'byung po'i tshogs bdun dag
299b3(rgyud): cho ga bzhin du bzhag par ba// gnod sbyin kun dang ku ber// de yi be tsen bang legs bzhag/ de nas klu chen tshogs rnams dang // bya bsgrub po g.yog dang bcas// klu yi g.yog rnams
299b4(rgyud): mthu stobs ldan// de dag shang phyogs ngas su dgad // de nas phyi rol rig sngags tshogs// thams cad bzhag ste dbang phyu ga cha// chos kyi dab can grags ldan ma// lham
299b5(rgyud): dka' zlog zha 'bring ldan// lag na rdo rje lha chen dang / dka' zlog gnyis kyi bar dag tu// rig sngags rig sa dag bzhag par bya// dang ni lag na rdo rje yi// rdo
299b6(rgyud): rje 'bar bas rab tu gzir // de nas grwa logs lha mo ni// ka Tha yan log 'dran dang // sna yom sum cu rtsa gnyis po// de dag las ni gang 'dod dang / de yo 'og tu dri za ni// skal chen
299b7(rgyud): brtson 'grus che ba rnams// shar de dbang po lnga yi tshogs// de yi 'og tu lnga yi gza'// de nas khyab 'jug 'khor lor bcas// me dang drug ma bstan pa yi// ma dang mdung
299b8(rgyud): thung gra ru bzhag/ lho logs dang bai lho phyogs kyi// 'byung po'i ba ba sgrub pa bzhag/ de yi 'og tu gshin rje dang // gshin rje'idabyug pa grul bum rnams// grul bum
300a1(rgyud): / la sogs tshogs kun dang // ma mo rnams dang 'jig rten ma// bdan bral gla ba ni 'phags ma'i mdung// 'byung ba'i tshogs kyis bskor bar bya// nub pogs
300a2(rgyud): dang por skam byed ni// drag mo tshogs rnams mang por bcas// klu dang mkha' lding grags ma rnams// de yi 'og tu ga tor ma'i gnas// tshul li zhes pa rgya chen yang // der
300a3(rgyud): ni nges par bzhag par bya// de ltar de dag thams cad du// tshogs rnams thams cad bkod pa'i dbus// rdo rje dkyil 'khor nang dag tu// rdo rje dbyibs kyi stegs bu ni// shar nab
300a4(rgyud): phyogasu blta ba'i dbyibs// de yi dbyibs legs bzhag par bya// de yi nub pogs gnasu yang // rig sngags 'chang ni gus gnas shing // lag na rdo rje'i snying po ni// rab tu sgrims te badz+ra
300a5(rgyud): brjod bya// tsan dan pha ma la sogs sbas// nas dang yungs kar la sogs dang // yang na dri dag rar yis// lag na thog mang bris// bdag nyid g.yon phyogs ngos la 'dug/ 
300a6(rgyud): lha mo lho nub mtsham su bzhag/ g.yas pas dri dang phreng bas mtshad// bdag pa sna tshogs dag kyang sreg/ shin tu bkra shis tshigs bcad kun// chos kyi 'khor lo bskor ba 'am// yang na 'dus pa che/ 
300a7(rgyud): bo mdo// the tshom med par gdon par bya// de nas chos kyi rgyal po yi// chos kyi 'khor lo mkhas pas bris// dpal dang ldan pa lha yi lha// sangs rgyas sku gzugs 'od can bri// de nas rdo rje lha
300a8(rgyud): kyu yi// rig sngags gus pas mchod cing bzlas// lha mo stobs chen de nyi dang // rdo rje ri 'bri bar bya// snying po lag na rdo rje ni// mchod rtsa gsum gyi bdag nyid kyi// tshul bzhin bri zhing rigs rnams kyi
300b1(rgyud): ma mo bdun gyi bskor bar bya// po nyam bcu dpung gi mchog/ drug cu rtsa bzhis rjes 'brang dang // rig sngags tshogs ni thams cadang // rdo rje khro ba yan chad bri// yid bzhin nor bu'adra ba dang // bskal ldan
300b2(rgyud): mchog sbyin gzugs bzang 'dra// 'jig rten kun gyi thab su ni// dus kun du ni phyag ba ba// lha kun rig sngags chen mo ste// gnod sbyin 'byung po klu 'jigs byeng // gdon chen dag ni stong phrag rnams/ 
300b3(rgyud): gcig pus gsod pa bang ba ste/ de yi ming ni brjod pas shing // me tog bdug pas mcho bsam// gdon rnams bye ba stong phrag dag/ 'kham par 'gyur zhing g.yo bar 'gyur// de yi dngos grub
300b4(rgyud): gzugs bzang bzhin// dpal dang ldan par mngon sum pa/ nas// thams cad don ni sgrub pa pos// 'di la the tshom med par sgrub// sgrub pas rab dang 'bring la sogs// bshos
300b5(rgyud): dang bdug pa la sogs mchod// a ga ru spos du ru ka/ yu ngas kar gu gul shu dag dang // ning kun di dang shu la si// pa da 'dra ma dang sbrang rtsi mar// ma ha bi sha la dang bcas// 'dzi
300b6(rgyud): ni las kyang bya ba yin// thams cad kyang ni 'byung ba du ba// sgo ma yin pa gzhan dag tu// 'dir ni ci yang mi bya'o// zhe sdang gti mug rgyags dang mos// 'dod chags mi shes dbang gis kyang / 
300b7(rgyud): 'di la 'jug dang 'byung bas na// mi rnams myur du nod kyis 'dabs// gdon rnams myos shing rgyags pa yis// rdo rje dag la rdzi byad dom// rkang pas rdo rje ri mo brdzis// myur du dam tshig
300b8(rgyud): nyams 'gyur te// de dag rdo rje 'dzin pa yis / myur du rdo rje chen pos 'joms// de dag gi ni rigs rnams kyang // rdo rje rig sngags tshigs kyis bzhag/ slob dpam yang nadam tshig shas/ 
301a1(rgyud): gdon gang dag gis bcas byangs/ rdo rje lcags kyu'i bzlas brjod dang // sbyin sreg dag gis de mi rigs// skad cig gis ni bcom par 'gyur// gzhan yang rdo rje rigs chen las
301a2(rgyud): rig sngags 'dor gyur gang yin pa// de yang sngar ni sgrub pas la// myos la sogs pas gdon rnams bskrang // gang pir sgor yang 'grub pa'i phyir// rtag tu 'di ni nang dag tu// mchod pa'i tshogs
301a3(rgyud): ni brjod pa dang / badzag pa la sogs las mi bya// gzhan yang nad gtang mang po dang // yi dwags 'byung po sha za dag/ dkyil 'khor spong bar byed pa dag/ de dag 'dir
301a4(rgyud): ni gshibs pa yi// drag po'i las la 'jug par bya// gzhig par bya ba gang yang rung // thams cad ma phyogs nang du bya// kun lam ni 'bar 'du bya// bdug
301a5(rgyud): pa'i gnod ni phyi rol bzhag/ lnga bshos sna tshog sa mdzes pa dag/ ci 'dod kun ni thams cad du/ thams cad zad mi shes pa rabya// gdon gyi
301a6(rgyud): dkyil 'khor pha rol gyi// byang shar mtshams su gang 'dod pa'i// lha yaM phyag rgya'i tshogs kyang bri// pad+ma 'khor lo rgyal mtshan mdung / mdang thung dbyug pa
301a7(rgyud): be tson ri// zhags pa rtsa gsum kha gdeng dang // gdon drag rnams la gnas par bya// gang na rig sngags gdon drag pa// mthu drag gnas pa de dag ni// mthu
301a8(rgyud): nyid kyis ni bsgrub bya zhing // 'di la dpyad par mi bya'o// dkyil 'khor de yi phyogs kun tu// 'byung ba'i tshogs kun gnas kyang bya// gtor ma dang ni bdug pa rnams
301b1(rgyud): rab tu rgyas pas mchod par bya// de nas gdon ni dul ba yis// thams par gyur na mchod par bya// mi bzad la ni snar blugs dang // mig bkru ba dang btung ba dang // sbyin sreg so/ 
301b2(rgyud): pas gzhig par bya// gdon gyis drag tu btab pa la// dal nas bzung bas yongs mi bya// dal nas byas pa sman pa nyid// mi bzang gdon gyis btsam par 'gyur// de phir
301b3(rgyud): sman pa mi bzang pa// gtum zhing spyod par rig pa dang // brtan mchog dga' zhing spro ba dang // snying snoms rig sngags brtson pa yis// khros nas mthu ni snyoms bya zhing // badz+ra
301b4(rgyud): ba 'am yang na bsdigs pa dubya// dul ba'i gdon ni dang ba yis// de ma thag tu 'grub par 'gyur// dkyil 'tsho ra yi nang bcas par yang // gtor ma'i las ni bab
301b5(rgyud): dang // khur ba dang ni gzhibs pa dang // kha zas ci 'byor rim bzhin dbul// dam tshig ci rigs sbyin par bya// rig sngags 'byung po la sogs kyi// gtor ma ku ni ci snyed
301b6(rgyud): sbyin// gdon kun la ni mchod pa bya// bcom ldan nyid kyis bshad pa bzhin// bden par smra zhing dam tshig shes/ slob dpon phyir ni 'dir brtson pa'i// slob ma dam tshig 'dzin du gzhug
301b7(rgyud): thams cad kyi ni phyag rgya'i tshogs// skrag pa bya dang mchod bya ba// de dag thams cad g.yon pa yis// rnam pa thams cad bstan par bya// rdo rje gom par 'dod
301b8(rgyud): 'jig/ gcig tshong yongasu sbyang ba dang // g.yon pas brdab par bya ba dang // rgyags pa'i seng ge sgra bsgrags dang // mdzub mo bstan te hUM zhes bya// shin tu sgra yang
302a1(rgyud): rab tu bskyed// rdo rje rigs can skyes pa yi// slob dpon gyis ni bstan par bya// lha yi gdon ni bad kyi// rtags kyi phyag rgya tshogs bshad pa// rkyen du bab pa gang yin pa'o// 
302a2(rgyud): phyag rgya'i tshogs 'di yin// tshangs pa'i pad+ma lnga chen mdung // gshin rje'i dbyug chen dam pa yin/ khab 'jug 'khor lo sman po'i mi// na mkha' lding gi sna dang mdab// dbang po rdo rje'i me yi
302a3(rgyud): lce/ chu lha yi ni zhags pa bstan// rlung ni dar gyi shugs can te// ta na ta yi ba con sogs// 'byung po'i gdon rnams bad kyi// lag pa g.yon pas de dag bzung // 'jug byed kyi ni
302a4(rgyud): lo rdzing // lta ba dang ni di ri ri// dri za dag ni thad kyi// gling bu pi wang la sogs bstan// gar mkhan dag ni lhag par ya nga // gar dang rol mo'i cha byad bstan// gnod sbyin rnams
302a5(rgyud): kyis cher bdab pa// rang gtum gyi ni sgrub chen te// ku be ral mtshon mang dang // yang na phyag rgya'i tshogs kun yin// klu che na gdengs ka chas pa ste// lag pa g.yon pas mge
302a6(rgyud): bzhag/ dbugs ni rgyun rings rgyu ba dang // mig dmar dag dang bcas pa yin// klu rnams gdengs ka mang po dag/ gcig tu gzhibs nas cing gar bzhag/ bya ba sgrub pa thams cad na/ 
302a7(rgyud): sbrul yod pa yi gdengs ka'i dbyibs// tshangs pa srin po gnyis kyi ni// sngags kyi ril ba nor bu dang // oM brjod pa yi dbyug pa dang // mchod phyir thogs la sogs par bstan// sin
302a8(rgyud): bo rnams kyi so gtsigs dang // rdzu 'phrul dag kyang rab tu bstan// bza' ba dang ni bca' ba dang // mtshon cha dag kyang 'dra ba yin// sha za rnams ni 'tshe ba dang // he rer lta zhing sha la sred/ 
302b1(rgyud): 'jigs pa sna tshogs ston pa dang // kun tu yang ni lte bar byed// skem byed pa ni rang bzhin tshul// mdung bung la sogs dpung la brten// ma mo'i gdon ni thang ni// rang gi lha'i mtshon mchog bya
302b2(rgyud): pad+ma phyir dang ther tshugs dbyug/ sngags ni nor bu bskor bar bya// ril pa 'dzin pa 'phags pa rnams// tshangs pa'i phyag rgya bdun pa yin// mdung rtse gsum pa zla phyed dang // thor tshugs
302b3(rgyud): mig dang rgyal mtshan dang // khyu mchog skad 'byin ral gri rnams// dbang phyug chen po'i phyag rgya bdun// mdung bung dril bu ba dan dang // de bzhin ra dang bya gag dang // rma ba yi ni mjug me rnam
302b4(rgyud): gzhor nu'i phyag rgya bdun pa yin// 'khor lo dung dang be con dang // ral gi dang ni phub zlum dang // na mkha' lding dang phag rnams ni// / khyab 'jug phyag rgya bdun po yin// mche ba dang ni spro
302b5(rgyud): dang sa// de bzhir bum pa gtun shing dang // gshol dang rkang pa g.yon pa rnams// phag mo yi ni phyag rgya bdun/ nom gru dag gi gnyer ma gdong // rgyan skad la sa sa?
302b6(rgyud): stong pa dang // skam pa napa gru'i phyag rgya ste// rang bzhin nyid du bstan pa yin// zas mdangs za rnams kyi ni// lhung bzed ral gri lag g.yon bcom// lha min rnams kyi ma yis
302b7(rgyud): gzugs// spu dang bcas par bstan par bya// 'phags pa rnams ni 'khor dang bcas// kun la mdung rtsa gsum pa yin// dri ba byas na lhag par yang // gdon rnams mtshan zhing gas
302b8(rgyud): bar shes// log 'dran sna tshogs brjod pa gang // de dag tshul ltas bstan par bya// de dag la rang gi lag pa bskum pa dang // brkyang ba dang / rkang pa tha mal par brkyang ba dang / spar
303a1(rgyud): gtsug pa de dag las gsang sngags kyi las bstan te// dri ba dang / brdegs pa dang / dgrol ba'i tshul rnam pa gsum bya'o// las rgya che bar rig sngags kyi tshogs kyi
303a2(rgyud): bshad pa phyag rgya'i tshogs kyi dkyil 'khor gyi las grub pa 'di ni shin tu ngo mtshar che ste/ sdebasu bya ba'i mdo bstan pa dang sngags kyi tshogs rnams kyang bshad do// 'dres pa chen po'i mdo
303a3(rgyud): las shin tu bkra shis pa'i tshigasu bcad pa bstan pa dang / rdo rje'i rigs las rig sngags kyi tsho gos rdzu 'phrul dang ldan pa rnams kyang bshad do// lag na rdo rje'i dkyil 'khor thad kyi rgyal
303a4(rgyud): po lag na rdo rje dang / lha chen po dang / bka' bzlog nas bshad pa'i las kyi dkyil 'khod phyag rgya dang bcas par bshad pa rdzog so// / dkyil 'khor chen po 'di dag las/ 
303a5(rgyud): las kyi dkyil 'khor ci bstan dang // rig sngags kyi ni dkyil 'khor rnams// saur rgyas par bstan pa dang // gdon gyi las kyi phyag rgya dang // phyag rgya'i tshe byed pa dang // rig
303a6(rgyud): sngags sgrub pa'i sa rnams dang // khrus kyi dkyil 'khor dag tu yang // dri ngang me tog phreng ba dang // bdug pa dang ni mchod pa dang // gtor ma sna tshogs de ngag kun// dbul bas kun tu rnam
303a7(rgyud): kun gyis// dor kun rab tu sgrub pa'i phyir// spyan drang 'di ni nges par bya// 'byung po thams cing bder 'gyur ba// 'byung po kun dga' zhes bya bar// gtor ma rig sngags ldan bya zhing // 
303a8(rgyud): g.yon nas ni spyon par bya// rtag tu 'di dag thams cad kyang // phyogs kun bltas pas 'di skad brjod// dkon mchog gsum la phyag 'tsha lo// rdo rje 'dzin la phyag 'tsha lo// rig sngas
303b1(rgyud): chags la phyag 'tshal// phyag rgya tshogs la phyag 'tshal// rig sngags brgyad brgyar skyes pa yi// mdzon gyi srog gi chen gyur dang // rgyu ba rab tu bshad par bya// dkyil 'khor spyar
303b2(rgyud): mchod pa dang // dkyil 'khor ris gsum mchod pa la// gdon rnams kyi ni gdor las mchog/ gdon gyi gdon stobs rmugs bya dang // nges par rtag tu bzlas bya bshad// bye ba phrag stong
303b3(rgyud): gdon rnams ni// sa steng dag na rgyu ba yod// dus tshigs sna tshogs bab pa na// de dag rgyu ba sna tshogs pa// gdor mchog dam pa 'grub pa'i phyir// de dag bdag gis bshad par bya ste/ 
303b4(rgyud): gdon rnams ldan par byed pa dang // gtor ma len cing grub sbyin pa// de dag tshul dang gnas byas pa// dben pa dag tu rgyu bar byed // ri bo yid du 'ong rnams dang // rtse mo rnam
303b5(rgyud): dang khyim rnams dang // 'bra sdu me tog rgyas rnams dang // drang srong dag gis gnas rnams dang // dka' thub tshal dang gzhal mang khang // rig byed rjes rgyas/ me dog sna tshogs ma
303b6(rgyud): ldan dang // gnas dang kun dga' yid long dang // bya rnams skad chen 'byin pa dang // 'jig rten mar me byed kun dang // nyi ma'i gnas na dga' byed cing // nyi mo lhan cig 'gro bar byed// ri ma'i 'ad
303b7(rgyud): kha dog mnyam// gza' dang rgyu skar skar ma la// de dag rtag tu rgyu bar byed// zla ba nya ba'i 'od zer gyi// phung po rgyas pa dag la gnas// rim chir kur gyis rab rgyan cing // rtse nas lan lnga ldi dang / 
303b8(rgyud): phug rgya dag gis gang ba yin// lhun po ril de dag gnas// gangs ri ro bo rtse mo dang // gangs kyi sul ni song ba dang // sman rnams kun gyis ni rgyas pa yi// gsang rnams dang ni rig
304a1(rgyud): tshal dang // sman brgyas yongasu gang ba yin// spos dang ldan la de dag gnas// spos kyi dang ni zhim pa yi// phyogs rnams dang ni rgyu la byed dang // dpag bsam
304a2(rgyud): gis rgyan pa yi// bskyed mos tshal chen dga' byed dang // lha rnams gzhal med khang rnams// lha yi gzugs kyis gnas par byed// de dag sprin phung gseb ni gnas// sprin phung gi mi
304a3(rgyud): sgra dag 'dra// sprin phung dag dang 'grogs byed cing // sprin phung lhan cig dga' bar byed// rgya mtsho nang gi chu la gnas// chu yi shugs kyis rjes 'breng zhing // de dag rgya mtsho'i chu rlung dang / 
304a4(rgyud): lhan cig tu ni rgyu bar byad // mun nag gi ni klog chen dang / rgya mtsho yi ni rnams dang // rgya mtsho chen po 'khrugs pa la// / de dag rtag tu 'khrugs par byed// dbying zla'i dus pa
304a5(rgyud): bab pa na// shing rnams kun la gdon de dag/ khyu byug bung ba'i gzugasu gnas/ chu klung chen po'i 'gram dag/ na// gling ma rnams dang rdzong rnams dang // chu dmar dag
304a6(rgyud): gis rgyas pa yi// 'jing rnams na ni gnas par byed// chu rgyun yid du 'ong ba dang // chu rnams rab tu 'byung ba dang // khron pa rnam pa sna tshogs dang // ri bo dag dang chu rnams dang // sprul
304a7(rgyud): gyi tshogs kyis gang ba yi// nags khung chen po dag na yang // de dag sbrul du gzugs bsgyur nas// sprul dang lhan cig dga' bar byed// ljod shing chen po mi bzang dang // 'byung po pa/ 
304a8(rgyud): ni tshogs chen dang / khang stongs da ni yul stong dang // ba lang gnas ni gang ba dang / rgyal po dag gi dkor khang dang // pad+ma rnams dang gzhan dag kyang // glang chen gnas ni yid 'o da/ 
304b1(rgyud): rnams kyi ni bris ngag dang // gzhan yang grong khyer rnams dang gzhan// tshong dus dag na gnas par byed// chang 'thung gnas dang khyim dang gzhan// srang dang lam dang shing rta dang / 
304b2(rgyud): rgyu ba dag gi gnas rnams dang // bu mo la sogs lta ba'i rnams// bskyed mos tshal snying mi bzang dang // lha yi gnas ni zhigs pa dang // bu bca' ba yi gnas gzhang dang // 'chil
304b3(rgyud): thug pa'i khyim dag dang // dga' ston sa dang 'dus pa dang // 'dus ston sa dang bal mo'i sa// g.yul gyis ni bad do// gdon rnams rtag tu gnas par byed// drug cu rtsa bzhi'i gdon pa
304b4(rgyud): pa/ yid ltar mgyogs shing 'dod dgur 'gro/ 'dod dgur sbyar ba'i gzugs can de thang rang dgar rtsen par byed// lha tshogs ma mo'i gdon drug bcas// tshangs pa srung bar byed pa
304b5(rgyud): ste/ khar snang gza' ni nyi ma yang // gdon rnams kyi ni ga bor bshad // skam byed la sogs srin po'i bar// rdzodang ldan ma dang klu gnyis dang // srin po bcu dang lha mo dang
304b6(rgyud): nor bu 'gul ni bar ma yin// grul bum la sogs yi dgas dang // brjed byed bcas dang srung por bcas// mdangs 'phrog de bzhin smyo byed dang // thad gdor gyi tha mar bshad // de dag
304b7(rgyud): gi ni khyad par bzhin// dkyil 'khor mngon par mchod pas nas// mngon su dga' bar bya ba yi// bstod pas mchod pa dag kyang bya// dbang po rdo rje 'chang ba'i lha// lha yi rgyal po gdon gyi
304b8(rgyud): bdag/ shar phyogs gdor gyi tshogs bcas la// mchod par byas te phyag kyang 'tshal// mi ste bsreg bya ba zhes pa'i lha// 'byung ba'i rgyal po gdon gyi bdag/ phyogs mtshams gdon
305a1(rgyud): gyi tshogs bcas la// mchod pas byas te phyag kyang 'tshal// gshin rje dbyug pa 'chang ba'i lha// sa yi bdag po gdon gyi bdag/ brnab sems bdag nyid
305a2(rgyud): gdon bcas la// mchod pa byas te phyag kyang 'tshal// bden dang bral ba legs ldan lha// srin po'i bdag po gdon gyi bdag/ sna tshogs gdon gyi tshogs bcas la// mchod par
305a3(rgyud): byas te phyag kyang 'tshal// zhags pa thogs pa chu yi lha// bden pa srung ba gdon gyi bdag nub phyogs gden dang bcas pa la// mchod par byas te phyag kyang 'tshal// rlung ste srog
305a4(rgyud): kyang 'dzin pa'i lha// tshig srung gdon gyi bdag po ste// rlung gi tshogs kyi gdon bcas la// mchod par byas te phyag kyang 'tshal// gnod sbyin lag na be tson pog/ nor srung
305a5(rgyud): gdon gyi bdag po ste// byang phyogs gdon dang bcas pa la// mchod par byas te phyag kyang 'tshal// dbang dang ldan pa 'dren pa'i lha// bgegs kyi rgyal po gdon gyi nga
305a6(rgyud): dbang ldan phyogs kyi bden bcas la// mchod pa byas te phyag kyang 'tshal// 'og gi klu dang ma bi'i lha// rgyal po chen po glang po che// dam tshig shes pa'i gdon bcas la// mchad
305a7(rgyud): par byas te phyag kyang 'tshal// steng gi lha tshogs thaMd dang // zla ba nyi ma gza' chen dang // bza' skar sgyu skar bcas pa dang / skar mi'i 'khor lo'i dkyil 'khor dang // rig sngags
305a8(rgyud): tshogs dang gsang sngags dang // de bzhin phyag rgya'i tshogs kun dang // dam tshig shes dang slob dang ni dang // tshangs pa la sogs lha chen dang // rdo rje 'dzin pa tshe yi lnga// lag narda
305b1(rgyud): rje stobs po che// gtum po 'jig rten gsum gyi bdag/ 'jigs byed lag na rdo rje thogs// thams cad zhi bar byang ba ste// 'byung po'i tshogs ni kun gyis mchod// rnam pa kun gyis
305b2(rgyud): 'byung po kun/ dus kun du ni srung ba po// rig sngags bcas pa de dag dang // 'byung po'i tshogs ni thams cad la// bshos dang dri srogs sna tshogs rnams// des ni dga' zhing
305b3(rgyud): dbul bar bya// dam tshig shes pa rnams dang ni// 'byung po'i tshogs kyis bdag la bsrungs// de yi rgyas pa 'phel ba yang // bcom ldan 'das kyis mdzad par gsol// sna chog
305b4(rgyud): tshig gis smra bar bya// zhi ba'i tshig ni yang dang yang // bdag gi bla ma 'am yang na gzhan// dam tshig shes pa gzhan gyis byas// 'di ni 'byung po kun la par phyir bshad
305b5(rgyud): pa ste// 'byung po'i tshogs kun 'dus la rtag tu mchod pa rA bya// dkyil 'khor dag las gtor mi'i las ni rgyas pa 'ang // rgyu ba dag gis gnas dang rten gyur dpal
305b6(rgyud): bskyed phyir// 'dir ni thams cad du su phyogs rnams bde du// yongasu dag pa'i yid dang rnam pa thams cad kyis// khams cad zhi bar byed pa gsum du rab bshad pa// do rnams
305b7(rgyud): sgrub pa'i phyir ni bla mas bya ba yin// las kyi dkyil 'khor rdzog so// / kun rig sems can kun gyis mchod// rig sngags bdag po kun gyis rjeng // mtshungs pa med pa'i
305b8(rgyud): sangs rgyas ni// rnam gsum li mi'i 'od dang ldan// mtshan med mang po mnga' ba ste// 'jom gang 'od cher 'chang ba dang // rig sngags ston pa chen po ste// mchog cher 'chang zhing sgyu
306a1(rgyud): byed dang // dag pa'i chos ni nges gsungs pa// zhi ba'i grong khyer zhi ba'i lam// gang gis thub rnams shes pa dang / gzhan yang sngon gshegs gshegs byur dang / 
306a2(rgyud): mtshan gnas ldan dge 'dun rnams// mya ngan 'das pa'i grong 'jug pa// shin tu rgyas pa de kun la// yang dang yang du phyag 'tshal zhing // thub pa sangs rgyas gnyis pa ni// 'phabs
306a3(rgyud): ba shA ra dwa ti'i bu// lha dang lnga mi dri zer bcas// klu dang gnod sbyin tshogs kyis mchod// de bzhin dam pa grub pa ste// rig sngags 'chang kun dbang phyug che// dpa' bo gcig pu
306a4(rgyud): thul ba// lag na rdo rje phyag 'tshalo// de bzhin rdo rje lcags k+ShuM yum// rdo rje thog bzang mo dang // de ras lag na rdo rje 'i mthus ka la ko li gtum po dang // rdo rje sgrog ga
306a5(rgyud): ma bzhin// blo gros rdo rje phas mi thub// 'og dpag khro dril bu can// de bzhin rdo rje nag mo la// ci ste shes rab can dag gis// gzhan don grub par 'dod pa na/ 
306a6(rgyud): mchod cing phyag kyang byas nas ni// dkyil 'khor gzung bya legs par bshad// grub pa lag ma rdo rje yi// dngos grub thams cad sgrub byed cing // dngos grub thams cad rab rdzogs pa/ 
306a7(rgyud): ji skad du ni rab bstan pa'i// dkyil 'khor ci 'dra gang yin dang // de yi yon tan sna tshogs gang // tshogs kyang ji ltar bstan pa dang // dkyil 'khor gyi ni dam tshig dang // cho ga dab pa
306a8(rgyud): grub pa dang // phan dang mi phan don rnams dang // dam tshig shes pa'i yon tan dang // nyams pa'i gnas ni gang yin pa// de dang gzhan yang gang mthong ba// de dag thams cad la// 
306b1(rgyud): par bshad// lag na rdo rje'i sras gtum pa// rdo rje sde la phyag byas nas// zla byed yung tsam zhag gcig dang // rgyu skar dag ni bzang ba la// gtsang zhing gos gtsang bgos pa dang
306b2(rgyud): bsdams shing nges par gnas pa dang // grogs po gtsang mar ldan pa dang // gtsang ma'i las kyi rjes 'brang bas// yar gyi ngo yi tshes gcig gam// tshes gnyis de bzhin lnga yang rung // 
306b3(rgyud): tshes drug dang ni brkyang dang bcu// bcu gnyis yang na bcu gsum 'am// yang na nya yi zhin par mi// yongasu gzung bar bya ba ste// de dag brtsams kyis gzhan la min// dkyil 'khor
306b4(rgyud): gnas ni sbyangs byas la// zla ba nyi yi nub mo ni// dkyil 'khor chen po bri bar bya// bsgrims te la ba na rdo rje dang // rgyal dbang wa ni phyag byas nas// zhi zhing sngan chad las byas pa'i// 
306b5(rgyud): sar ni mkhas pas 'gro bar bya// tshong dus kun dga' ba tsug lag khang // grong ma yang na grong khyer gyi// byang ra mtshams ni gang mthong ba// de yi lho nub mtsham
306b6(rgyud): ga tu// zla ba ra ra brtul zhugs bya// mngangs dga' 'tshal lngar gtsang ma dang // tsha sgo rdo ba sreg rus po dang // mthong man skyon rnams rnam spangs pa// de 'dra'i sa de rnyed na ni// 
306b7(rgyud): lcags kyu dran byas la// shar phyogs nas ni gom par 'dor// ha cang mi drag dasong mi bya// de nas rig sngags gang 'dod pas// bdag nyid kyang ni bsrung bar bya// de nas dkyil
306b8(rgyud): 'khor gnas dang yang // dge pa'i ltas rnams blta bar bya// sngags kyis btab pa'i chu ngag gis// bde legs par gtor bar bya// ba lang lci bas legs par sbyar// kun
307a1(rgyud): ngag kyang gding bar bya// mnyam pa'i dbus kyi dkyil dag tu// dkyil 'khor byed pa 'dug nas ni// phyogs mtshams steng dang bang kar yang / kho ra khor yug blta bar
307a2(rgyud): bya// srung zhing yid ngag 'dri dag gis// khrus byas zhag gsum sbyang bar bya// spos nga ldan pa'i ri bo zhin du// spos kyi phyogs kun rgyas par bya// thig skung gser zhing rab gtsang da
307a3(rgyud): tshang dang ldan zhing mdzes pa dang // dri zhim reg na 'jam pa dang // sri zhing legs par gzabs pa dang // thung dang sbom sogs ma legs dang // mdud pa rnams ni med pa yis// thig ni
307a4(rgyud): shes rab can gyis gang ba// de yi ched kyang bshad par bya/ rdo rje 'dzin chen dga' ba yi// dang po'i gnas ni rdzogs gyur nas// de las gzhan pa'i dkyil 'khor tshe// grangs
307a5(rgyud): rnams kyang mi bshad par bya// lag ma rdo rje'i dkyil 'kho chen po'i rgyal po ste gnas dang po'o// // bu ba tshab shes dben pa ba // chos la mi spong bang ba yin// 
307a6(rgyud): 'tshe ba spangs pas 'jig rten bde// srog chags rnams la sdom pa dang // 'dod chags bral ba 'jig rten bde// 'dod chags rnams las 'das pa dang // nga snyam nga rgyal zhi ba dang
307a7(rgyud): dul ba 'ang mi mchog tu bde// bu ga rgyun las bzlog pa yi// lam bgrong zab cing blta dka' ba// pun rig thibs pos bsgribs pa dang / 'dod la chags pas rtogs mi 'gyur// 
307a8(rgyud): ngas mi dga' bas rtogs byas nas// skye bo rgyun bzhir 'khyam pa dang // 'dod pa dag gis mdung pa yis// bcings pa'i bar du bshad ba ste/ 'di ni lag na rdo rje yi// yid 'o
307b1(rgyud): chang du brjod pa brjod// rtsang mo can gyis bsrung byas nas// nges par kun tu 'jigs pa med// dkyil 'khor khru ni bcu drug tu// ci nas rab tu chang bar bya// srid du yang na ci nas kyi
307b2(rgyud): sum cu rtsa gnyis yod pa dang // gtsang mas gtsang mi'i gos bgos la// thig skud de ni bdag gis gzung // lha la dga' ba'i grogs po yis// kho ra khor yug drang bar bya// thig
307b3(rgyud): grangs de yi steng dag tu// thig ni snyoms par legs par bri// rig sngags rdo rje lcags kyu ma// rmad du 'byung ba de nyid brjod// thub chen gnas par gyur pa yi// khor yug brag

307b6(rgyud): 'jig rten nges par 'jom// ras rnams kyi no ma 'dres pa'i// sa lu bzang por byas na ni// de yi nor dang 'bru rnams dang // dbyig rnams rtag tu 'phel bar 'gyur// gang zhig da
307b7(rgyud): grub mchog 'dod pas// der ni gsum char gyis kyang bri// yang na de dag gcig pu yos/ shes rab can gyis bri bar bya// de nas ri yi rgyal po ni// rin chen kun nas grub pa ste// 
307b8(rgyud): nyi ma bzhin du rtag tu yang // rang gi 'od kyis rab 'ba'i zhing // bang rimi yong pa'i ri rab // 'og ma nyid du gzhag par bya// sngar bstan pa yi khor yug ni// gru bzhi chad du byu
308a1(rgyud): yin// de nyid khongasu rim pa gsum// khru re tsam du byi bar bya// gzhan yang mtho nango da dang // sor bzhi bcas par bri bar bya// gnyis pa dang na lhag ma rnama?/

310a2(rgyud): phyi rol rig sngags rigs// rig sngags kyi ni sna tshogs dge// bcu dgu par ni bzhag par bya// de nas kyang ni rig sngags rnams// mi nga smos 'di dag la sogs bri// dri ga
310a3(rgyud): babs kyis dri gshed dang // ro langs mar ni grags pa dang // dkar mo chen mo dkar mo dang // gzhan yang sa spangs gnas rnams bzhag/ rdo rje'i mnga' bdag dges pa yi/ 
310a4(rgyud): kyi rig sngags mchog 'chang ba// rab tu gsal zhing 'bar ba de// dbus der mkhas pas bzhag par bya// de nas rdo rje 'dzin chen rje// nyi shu par ni bzhag par bya/ gangan
310a5(rgyud): rdo rje 'dzin gnas te// ming ni rdo rje pho brang yin// nyi shug cig pa'i byang phyogasu// ku be ra ni tshogs bcas bri// ku be ra ni gar gnas pa// grong khyer lcang lo can zhes
310a6(rgyud): bya// klu yi bya ba bsgrub pa brgyad// grong khyer nyi shu gnyis par bzhag/ bya ba sgrub bcas kyu chen rnams// lnga po nyi shu gsum par bzhag/ dkyil 'khor nyi shu rtsa bzhir ni// 
310a7(rgyud): yi dkyil 'khor bzhag par bya// klu mgo yini gdengs ka can// klu chen gyis ni g.yasu bskor// dkyil 'khor de yi nang dag tu// klu chen kha dog sna tshogs pa// mtha'
310a8(rgyud): nar rgyas pad+ma dang // de bzhin nong bu laM sogs klu// kal bal dang mgyogs gnyis// de bzhin gzhan yang klu rnams kyis// ma dang rgyal tshab 'dzag po yang // dkyil ba/ 
310b1(rgyud): nang du bzhag par bya// shar sgo 'od ma'i rtse mo bzhag/ dga' skyed pa ni lho phyogs// nub phyogasu ni legs mthong bzhag/ byang phyogasu ni stobs kyis rgyu// de nas rlung lha'i phyogs dag
310b2(rgyud): tu 'byung ba'i tshogs ni bdun rnams dgod // de ni nyi shu lnga pa yi// dkyil 'khor du yang grags pa yin// dkyil 'khor nyi shu rtsa lnga pa// 'di dag kyang ni mkhas pas
310b3(rgyud): yis// ci rigs par ni bro bya zhing // rdzogs byed rnams kyang legs par bri// chu lnga'i phyogasu nyi ma bri// shar phyogasu ni zla ba bzhag/ ka ru na ni gling bzhar ni// phyogs mtshams
310b4(rgyud): ngag tu bzhag par bya// lhag mo dag ni byang phyogs// nges par yang ni dgod par bstan// 'di dag rnams ni mngar ba snga ma/ khor yug gi ni khong ras dbyung // de nas
310b5(rgyud): rdo rje shugs kyis ni// de rini stobs chen 'gro bar bya// bang rim la ri song nas kyang // dang po legs par dgod par bya// rdzong gi 'phags ma ngor sgrub pa// dur khrodangs
310b6(rgyud): na drag mo ni// bder bral phyogasu bzhag bya zhing // ma yang drung du bzhag par bya// phyogs kyi lha ni bye ba rnams// dbang ldar phyogasu dgod par bya// log 'dren drag po chen po yang // 
310b7(rgyud): dkyil 'khor du ni legs pa dgod// rlung lha'i phyogasu mkha' ldong bzhag/ de nas dang po skyong ba yi// rdzong gi 'phags ma gnyis pa yang // yongasu rdzogs par bzhag par bya// 
310b8(rgyud): bang rim dag ni gnyis pa la// rdo rje shugs kyis bsgom bya zhing // klu rigs nor bu bzhag par bya// mtha' yas bden bral phyogasu bzhag/ nga nas phyogs kyi lha nyid ni// gau shan
311a1(rgyud): rje'i phyogasu legs par bzhag/ de nas yi dgas tshogs rnams kyang // me yi phyogasu bzhag par bya// de nas cho ga shes pa yis// yi dgas kyi ni rigs rnams
311a2(rgyud): dgod// brjed byed kyi ni rigs rnams dang // nam gru dag gi rigs kyang gzhan// dbang ldan 'byung po rnams dang no// 'byung po'i chang khyu rnams kyang bzhag/ tshangs pa'i srin po zhes
311a3(rgyud): bya rnams// dkyil 'khor byang phyogs dgod par bya// phyi rol klu yi rigs rnams kyang // rlung lnga'i phyogasu legs par dasong // dkyil 'khor dab pa gnyis pa las// bang rim
311a4(rgyud): ni yongasu rdzogs// rdo rje rims kyis bsgoms nas ni// gsu ma pa yang ni bden bral phyags// sha za bzhag ste song na yang // rnal 'byor mkha' 'gro'i dkyil 'khor
311a5(rgyud): bzhag/ yi gas kyi ni khyim rnams kyang // gshin rje phyogasu legs par dgong // ma yi phyogasu dkyil 'kho ra du// stobs chen lha ma yin rnams bzhag/ 
311a6(rgyud): nas dang ldan 'jig rten spyong // 'jig rten chos las phyir phyogs pa// yul 'khor srung ni dpag med pa'i// dri zar lhan cig kun tu dgod// dbang phyug chen mor bcas pa yi// 
311a7(rgyud): dbang ldan phyogasu gnas par bya// de nas rig sngags rnams kyi bdag/ lag na rdo rje rnal 'byor che// grogs bcas rdo rje 'dzin pa yi// rdo rje pho brang dga' bar gzhag/ de nas sdos
311a8(rgyud): chen 'jig rten spyong // dpal ldan 'jig rten chos spangs pa// lag na rdo rje 'dzin pa yi// dbang ldan byang gi phyog su bzhag/ de bzhin lung lo ca dab tu/ nor sbyin tshogs dang / 
311b1(rgyud): bcas par bri// klu rnams ma ni su ru sa// rlung lha'i phyogasu gnas par bya// de dag bu dang bcas par ni// de yi drung du god par bshang // mkha' lding rnam par 'dud pa'i bu// mamra
311b2(rgyud): rtsal shin tu rdzogs pa'ang bzhag/ de nas 'byung po'i tshigs rnams dgod// chu lha yang ni nub phyogs bzhag/ gsum pa dag kyang 'das pa yi// bzhi pa dag gis bshad par bya/ 
311b3(rgyud): bang rim bzhi pa'i steng dag tu// rdo rje shugs kyis song nas ni// nyi ma rnams ni g.yog dang bcas// nu lha'i phyogasu gnas par bya// bden bral phyogasu srin rnams dpa
311b4(rgyud): nga yi pha rol grul bum bzhag/ de nas grul bum lhag sa can yang // lho phyogasu ni bzhag par bya// ma yau phyog su rlung lnga bzhag/ shar phyogs zla ba 'khor dang bcas
311b5(rgyud): bag zangs rigs kyang de bzhin te// de gnyis kyi ni bzhi ba dag pa// de nas bang rim ldan pa la// rdo rje shugs kyi 'gro bar bya// lnga srung phyir ni klu rnams kyang // 
311b6(rgyud): mu lha'i phyogasu dgod par bya// dbang ldan dang ni shar mtshamasu// lha yi mdzod kyang bzhag par bya// gzhan gyis mi thub rdo rje che// dbang ldan phyogasu bzhag par bya// de nas
311b7(rgyud): rje'i dru drug na/ gnas gtsang rigs kyi lha chen bzhag/ lha'i srung ma gnod sbyin cha// byang phyogs ngag tu gnas par bya// rdo rje shugs kyi drug pa la// song nas chu lha'i phyogs
311b8(rgyud): ngag tu/ klu rgyal rgya mtsho chen po'i bu// drag cig shugs dang ldan pa bzhag/ der ni g.yog dang bcas par bya/ gzhan dag gis ni sprul pa la// dbang byed la ni gang yin rnam
312a1(rgyud): bden bral phyog su gnas par bya// tshangs ris kyi mtshogs rnams kyang // ma yi phyog su dgong par bya/ tshangs pa'i mdun ma 'dzin pa yi// lha rnams
312a2(rgyud): phyogs bzhag par bya// shin tu mthong lnga dbang ldan du// sring rtse de yi pha rol dgod// de bzhin dka' bzlog byang phyogs bzhag/ drug pa dag kyang 'das pa yin// bang rim dag ni bdun
312a3(rgyud): ba la// rdo rje shugs kyis rdo rje 'chang // song nas klu yi gtso bo mi// rgya mtsho chen po rmad du byung bzhag/ byang phyogs bya ba zin ras ni// grags shing bsod nams che ba yi// 'phrul
312a4(rgyud): dga' ba ya lha chen rnams// gshing rje'i phyogasu gnas par bya// de nas rdo rje shar phyogs kyi// gnas kyi gtso ga ra bzhag par bya// sum cu gsum pa'ang shar bya/ 
312a5(rgyud): su// bzhag cing bdun pa yongasu dgang // lha rnams snga chags rgyas pa yi// r-i yi dbang po dab pa yi// bang rim ngag ni yongasu rdzogs// ngo ma 'og tu bya ba ba
312a6(rgyud): ri rab steng du bad mkhyen// rigs sngags snying po 'chang ba bopo// sangs rgyas 'jig rten rtogs mdzad pa// thar pa'i grong khyer dbang phyug gzhan// gang gi 'od zer de dag gis// 
312a7(rgyud): phyogs rnams thams cad rgyas mdzad dang // gang gi sku la mtshan kun gyi/ mdzod rnams thams cad 'byung ba dang / mtshan dang gzhin dang brtson 'grus dang // gzhan yang na
312a8(rgyud): bor ldan pa dang / mchog rnams mchog sbyi byed pa la/ gang gis mchog gi mchog sbyid dang // thugs rje ma dang ldan pa'i mgon// nyi ma 'chang ka'i 'ong ngong 'drag/ 'od zar 'i ma
312b1(rgyud): bye ba yis// gang gis mun pa bsal ba dang // chos dang mtshan nyid rigs pa yi// yid bzhin nor bu'i thugs mnga' gang // gang gis bskal pa grangs med par// san rnams ni rab tu
312b2(rgyud): bsrungs// rin chen in+d+ra nI la ltar/ gang gi gtsug tong mdzes pa dang // nor bu yi ni rgyal po bzhin// zla mdog can gyis mdzod srung sA// gang gi bdud rtsi gtong ba'i zha ka pad+ma rA
312b3(rgyud): ba'i mdog 'dra dang / dus mtshams gser gyis bsgyur ba yi// gser gyi ri ltar sku mdog mdzes// 'khor lo chen po rtsibs stong pas// phyag dang zhibs ni legs spras pa// 
312b4(rgyud): skyil mo krung ni mdzes pa yis// thub pa chen po lags par bzhugs// chos kyi chu klung chen po'i mchog/ de yi zhal nas kun tu 'bab// rmang du byung bar 'bab pa ste/ 
312b5(rgyud): bdag gis kha ni stong phrag rnams// stong skad kyis ni brjod pa 'am// khong du chud bar nus mi 'gyur ro// da ni rgyas par 'gengs pa dang // ye shes pa mtha'
312b6(rgyud): na med// shin tu rmang byung gsang bar bshad// tshig ldan gyi ni lha mo // 'jig rten mgon po sangs rgyas kyi// gsung la rab tu gnas pa yin// 'jig rten gsum ma bdag mtsha
312b7(rgyud): spyir// 'jig rten gsum gyis phyag byas pa// 'di ni gnas dang 'gro ba yi// 'jig rten thams cad 'dzin pa yan// che ba'i cha mchog stobs chen te/ dga' zhing kun gyi tshig la
312b8(rgyud): gnas// gzhan gcig sangs rgyas 'dra ba med// gung na yang ni gnas ma yin// de yi bsngags pa sangs rgyas sam// lha rnams nyid kyis brjod par nus// mchog sbyin
313a1(rgyud): phya sa/  nga gsas//  sum can cad mams dza b+hU gang dang/ @
313a2(rgyud): sngam mchags pa ba mi rgyurnams kyi gtang // ma mtshan las kyi dkyil 'khor na//  ga gas pa ni brtson 'ang smra// dadang 'brel bar btsam med/ sa
313a3(rgyud): rnams ldan pa // song rnams rim 'i ngag gis rgyas// lag rdo rjen bsod nams kyis// las kyis rgya mtsho dag las 'byung // chu byang rgya mtshor 'bab par// sna bam
313a4(rgyud): ras 'bab par 'gyur// de bzhin chos kyi chu klung 'ang / ring dag gis bsten byas nas kyang // lag na rdo rje'i mgo bo dang // rnga gnyis dang ni gsum dubab// zer mo 'phros pas
313a5(rgyud): lha mo dang // dbang phyug tshogs bcas phog par 'gyu 8// de phyir chos kyi chu klung 'di// sangs rgyas las ni 'byung byas la// lag na rdo rje'i mgo bor yang // rab tu
313a6(rgyud): dbab cing bdug par bya// bsod nams ldan pa'i chu klung rgya chen de nyid las// skye bo mtha' dag gcig tu sems btud nyan par byed// de nyid la ni lha rnams pang mngon par dag
313a7(rgyud): de nyid la ni rig sngags grub pa'i tshogs kun brten// gnas rnams gsum pa 'di no lha yi gnas yin te// rdo rje 'dzin pa nga yi dgongs pa bzhin du rdzogs// de nas dam
313a8(rgyud): tshig mkhyen pas dekyil 'khor rgyal po yau/ gsang ba gang dang gang gsungs dga' rgyas bdag gis bshad// lag rang rje'i dkyil 'khor char po dkyil 'khor bar kyi rgyalan
313b1(rgyud): las gnas gsum pa rdzogaso// // ri rab kyi ni byeng phyogasu// chos kyi klung chen 'dzin pa yi// rdo rje 'dzin chen rab gtum pa// stobs chen lag na rdo rje bzhag/ de yi rkang pa g.yon
313b2(rgyud): pa yis// dbang phyug chen po mtshan par bya// g.yas pa yin rkang ba yis// lha mo dka' bzlog mnan par bya// ri yi dbang po khor yug dang // khang rim ngag gi bar ngag tu// gling chen
313b3(rgyud): rnam pa bzhi po dang // gnas rnams ji bzhan bzhag par bya// de nas chu klung bdun yang bzhag/ lho phyog su ni dbyibs legs pa'i// 'dzam+bu gling ni bzhag par bya// chu klung dang ni shing
313b4(rgyud): dang yul/ sna tshogs kyis ni shin tu rgyas// de yi mngon mtshan chen po no// 'dzam bu'i shing mchog skyes pa do// 'phang sa du dpag tshad brgya yong // 'og logasu ni bzhag par bya/ 
313b5(rgyud): de nas chu klung bdun yang bzhag/ nags tshal ya nga ni bdun dag dang // yid du 'ong ba'i ri bdun dang // yul bdun dag kyang bzhag par bya// dang po'i byang nas brtsam
313b6(rgyud): bya zhing // lde phyogs log su bung du drung / shar nas nub tu drang bya zhing // kho ra khor yug bsgrubs nas ni// rgyal ba'i gsung rab ying 'ong ba// chos kyi 'khor lo rjes sgrub
313b7(rgyud): ba// 'phags pa sha rang ti'i bu// snying rje'i bdag nyid pad+ma mchog/ dge slong dge slong ma rnams dang // rgyal po dag gis bsten pa bzhag// 'dzam du gling gi lho phyagasu/ 
313b8(rgyud): 'khri shing dag kyang bri bar bya// nub phyogasu ni ba lang spyod// chu bo brgyas ni gang ba dang // yul dang skye bo stong dag dang // ban lang khyu ni stong gis rgyas// de bzhin shar gyi lus
314a1(rgyud): 'phags kyang // shar phyogasu ni bzhag par bya// yul rnamasu ni bzhag par bya// yul rnams dang ni ri ngag gis// kun tu rab tu rgyas par gnas// de nas gnas
314a2(rgyud): brtan chos skyob// bcu gnyis ngag dang lhan cig tug can zin zhes grags pa ste// sangs rgyas sras ni mngon sum gnas// gnod sbyin lha min lto 'phye rnams// nyin mtshan du
314a3(rgyud): ni der song nas// dri dang phreng ba dpe mang bas// mchod pa byed ci phyag kyang 'tshal// de nas byang gi sgra mi snyar/ lhun po yi ni byang phyogs bzhag/ gtsang zhing grub zhi lham pa ste/ chu rlung dgag
314a4(rgyud): rab tu rgyan// gang dag gi ni tshe yi tshad tshig stong tshang bar brjod pa dang // sangs rgyas rnams kyis gsungs pa yi// san ya mtshan dan gnas// rgya mtsho'i sa ni bskor ba yi// ri yi dam pa ri rab la/ 
314a5(rgyud): kyi lha ni bzhi po rnams// kun nas nges par bzhag par bya// karba sha ba ni brgyad dag gi/ dkyil 'khor dang por rdo rje dri/ de yi gnas rnams de dag tu// gser gyi gdu bu dag
314a6(rgyud): kyang bya// sgo rnams re rer don grub pa// rgyu dang mi rgyu 'jig rten gsum// thub par nus pa gang yin pa'i// sgo bsrungs gnyis kyang bzhag par bya// de yang sngags dang ldan bya zhing // kun
314a7(rgyud): tu gzhal yas rgyas par bya// rdo rje thog thog lho phyogs bro// rdo rje khu tshur byang phyogs bzhag/ de nas ngar ni lnga bshes rnams// rnam pa sna tshogs bkra ba dang // bla med rab mdzes rgyas pa
314a8(rgyud): bya// dring ngame tog phreng bas mchod// zhi de'i bu lu sna tshogs pa/ sbrang rtsis byugs shing gzabs pa dang / lags byas a shwa ka bar te// de bzhin pa rag nas khung dbul// ji tsam du
314b1(rgyud): ni rgyas pa phul//  tsam duni 'grub par bshad// 'bras kyi 'thug nul ka/ thug pa sbyar thug mi ta// 'bras can mong ma sna tshogs pa/ kha dog sna tshogs sor ldar ldan/ ngal sa
314b2(rgyud): pa gang 'dod pa// lo ma sna tshogs spyod med pa// yang na kham por sar pa 'am// pad+mo lo ma dag la bzhag/ nas dang gro dang mon sran gre'u// sa lu dang ni til 'bru rnams// snong
314b3(rgyud): sar ngag gi nang du bzhag/ yang na gzhan du bzhin bzhag/ dwags dang kha rag gang ba dang // btung ba bsil zhing zhim pa dag/ snod sar ngag gi nang dag tu// bzhag nas rab tu dbul
314b4(rgyud): badra bya// de na sa lu'i 'cha mi 'gyur// dga' ba'i sems kyis za 'dod la// kha zas dag kyang sbyin par bya// de nas dga' bar bya ba'i phyir// ta li'i lo ma bsal yab dbul// dri zhim pa
314b5(rgyud): yoM dri kun gyis// dkyil 'khor la mi mchod par bya/ spos kyi phye ma sna tshogs pa// mchog rnams kyis kyang de bzhin mchod// dza ya mu sa nal sogs/ dri'im thang smra
314b6(rgyud): bas mchod// a ga ru dang du ru ka/ shing gi thang tshu gsang sbyar rnams// bdug pa'i rgyur ni bsngags pa yin// dngos grub sgo drung 'dag par bya// yang na nang du song nas ni// de ni byang pog
314b7(rgyud): kha blta zhing // lag na rdo rje tshul bzhin bong // shin tu bgro shis tshigs bcad dang // de bzhin bde legs rdzogs pa gdon// de ras der ni rig sngags ma// rdo rje lcags kyu rtse mo can// 
314b8(rgyud): rdo rje'i rigs las byung ba yi/ rig sngags bstan pa gang yin pa// ngas ni bdag nyid bsrung bar bya// de nas thog mar spyad drang ba/ ri rab de yi rtse mor ni// 'dugu ras sgra chen 'dor bdun
315a1(rgyud): chos kyi chu klung spyan drang ba// dam pa 'di ni brjod par bya// bkra shis tshigs bcad brjod pa dang // chos kyi 'khor lo bskor ba dang // 'dus pa chen po'i mdo ngag dang / 
315a2(rgyud): 'phags pa'i bden pa bzhi dag dang // rten cing 'bral bar 'byung ba de// ma nyams pa chom med pa dang // 'phags pa sha rangadwa ti'i bu'i// seng ge'i sgra ni dpe med gdon// de nas rdo rje rigs
315a3(rgyud): kyi yum// rig sngags rdo rje lcags kyu bzlas// de nas kyang ni rtse mo can// de ras rdo rje rigs skyes kyi// rig sngags dag ni gang 'dod dang // snying po 'gro lding gdum po dang // nga yi steng dang
315a4(rgyud): 'dod pa yi// rdo rje ma dang 'og pag can// lu gu rgyud dang gtu ma mo dang / gser gtum rdo rje thog thog ma// de bzhin rdo rje khu tshur ma// rdo rje thub dka' bo lam// chen mo bsu dang drug cu
315a5(rgyud): bzhi// dang po blo gros rdo rje ma// gnyis pa rdo rje dril bu ma// gsu ma pa rdo rje nag mo dang // bzhi pa gzhan gyis mi bab pa// lnga pa rdo rje rol pa dang // drug pa yang ni rgod bag can// cu
315a6(rgyud): ba rdo rje shugs yod te/ brgyad pa rdo rje nyi ma yin// dgu pa rdo rje dathug pa ste// da ni sna tshogs gzugs zhes grags// bcu pa rdo rje bden pa ste/ ci dga' bar ni bzlas brjod pa// rdo rje dbyug pa blta ba
315a7(rgyud): bya/ rdo rje khro bo 'joms byed dang // phung ba blta ba chu klung dang // rdo rje ka t+ya na ya dang // bdug pas 'jil dang srung ma dang // yon tan chen po de la sogs// nges pa nyid du bzlos brjod bya// ngas
315a8(rgyud): nadakyil 'khor 'grub par 'gyur// nges par gnos pas rig sngags ni// mchog 'gyur rdo rje lcags kyu ma/ bajug pa kun gyis rgyas pa yis// dkyil 'khor du ni brgyad brgyar bzlas// 
315b1(rgyud): des ni las su sgrub pa yi// rig sngags des ni grub par 'gyur// rig sngags gang la dga' ba des// dkyil 'khor du ni bzlas brjod bya// lag ra rdo rjes bshad pa yis// rig sngag
315b2(rgyud): mang po de nyid ni// mchog 'dod dngos grub 'dod pa yis// ci nas skyo bar mi 'gyur spyad// de nas rdzogs par spyad drangs shing // gsang sngags rgyas par byas nas ni// de nas dkyil
315b3(rgyud): 'khor 'dod pa kun// bzung ba yang ni bshad par bya// sangs rgyas chos dang dge 'dun dang // dkon mchog gsum la gtso bor 'dzin// dad cing mnyam par gzhag pa yi// mi ni dam chis
315b4(rgyud): 'dzin du bzhugs// des na de las mkhas pa yau// bslab pa bzhi lnga ni spyod par bya// ming 'di zhes ni bya ba bdag/ phyin chang nam 'tsho'i bar dag tu// srog gcod log par g.ya
315b5(rgyud): pa dang // rku dang brdzun du smra ba dang // 'bru dang sbyar ba'i chang 'thung ba// rtag tu bdag gis spangs zhes smos// bsla ba bzhi'i mchog dang ldan pa de// blo gros rdo rjes
315b6(rgyud): bsrung bar bya// 'bogs par 'gyur bar bye ba'i phyir// byin gyis brlabs kyi cha ga 'ang bya// de nas rir ni bum pa bdud// chu ni rab tu blugs ras kyang // blo gros rdo rjes sngags pa ngas/ 
315b7(rgyud): bdud rtsi zhes ni brjod pa yin// rdo rje 'dzin pa'i phyag rgya ni// dril bur bcas pas/ drar byed brjod// lag pa gnyis ka bla 'og sbyar// mabe'u chung mthe bong sbrel bya zhing // bdud
315b8(rgyud): chu ni blugs par bya// gos gtsang bgos shing rab bsdams pa/ skra ba shig pa la ngu 'bod che// mi bzang rnams ni bsgo bar bya// 'di ning 'bod chen po ste// 'o khrug shing sdug
316a1(rgyud): bsngal chen po'i gnas// 'di yis khyod ni dam tshig las nyams na myur du gdungs par 'gyur// khyod ni dam tshig shes gyur na// rkyen du 'bab par ma lus
316a2(rgyud): sbyin// des na khyod la mkhas pa 'di// 'khrugs pa'i sdug bsngal byed mi 'gyur// dam tshig spangs pa gang yin dang // dkyil 'khor du ni ma zhugs pa// de la dam tshig gzhan
316a3(rgyud): mang ba// bstan bcos kyi ni gzhung lugs yin// dmyal ba yod pa 'di la ltos// rang rnams thams cad tshogs pa dang / 'byung ba la sogs rnams kyis rgyas/ khyod ni nga'i
316a4(rgyud): ltung bar byed// gdodan ma za'i sdig pa'i las// 'di la bya dpar bya ba med// rtag tu khyod kyis dam tshig bsrungs/ rtag tu dkyil 'khor mchod pa gyis/ 'i nga
316a5(rgyud): baM sha za sogs// sdig byed de ngag 'jug mi 'gyur//  ba par la ni gus par bya// da ni rdo rje 'dzin nyid yin// da ni khyod tshe 'bras bur bcas// khyod kyis 'a
316a6(rgyud): ba 'bras bu yod// da ni dam tshig lnga rnams dang / khyod ni mtshungs pa nyid du 'gyur// rdo rje 'dzin pa'i rgyal mtshan 'di// ji ltar rtag tu mdzes pa bzhin// de ltar khod ni yon tan
316a7(rgyud): gyis// dam tshig nges par gnas par 'gyur// de nas rdo rje de blangs la// lag pa g.yon pas dril bu bzung // lag pa g.yas pas de yi g.yas// gzung nas kyang ni spro ba bya/ 
316a8(rgyud): 'di skad rtag tu grub pa 'ang // sdug bsngal dag las sgrol ba ste// rdo rje 'dzin chen nyid dang ni// lhan cig du ni 'jug par 'gyur// banas grur ni zhugs nas kyang // khor yug la
316b1(rgyud): ni brgal bar bya// lag pa btang nas de la ni// dkyil 'khor thang bstan par bya// 'khrul pa me tog gis// mdun bzhugs bde gshegs mar chad dang // dkyil 'khor gang dang gang
316b2(rgyud): mthong ba// de dang de la bde bar mchod// de nas thams cad mthong nas kyang // yod gyi bum par dbul bar bya// blo can gyis ni mtshan yang gzung / dam pa gzhan yang bdag gis
316b3(rgyud): rdo rje snang thabs 'gro ba dang // gang mo bcas par bsgyur ba dang // g.yon pas kyang ni gdab par bya// seng ge'i sgra sgrogs 'gying ba dang // mdzub mos hUM yang bsgrags byas te/ ba
316b4(rgyud): shin tu byeng pa'i mchog/ de nas gzhan yang mi she sa pa// / cho ga bzhin du gnod par bya// slob dpon gus par lag sa bya zhing // dam tshig kyang mo nges par bstar// til
316b5(rgyud): zar la sogs mor sran gre'u// bdag nyid kyis ni laM gas par 'aza'// lhag par bla mar gus byas dang //  la dga' bar byas nas ni// rdo rje 'dzin pa che
316b6(rgyud): dang // rig sngags rnams la sdug par 'gyur// de nas rig sngags tshogs rnams la// de yis rig sngags gang 'dod pa// de ni bsgrims te bklag bya zhing // dngos grub
316b7(rgyud): bas rtag tu mchod// de ltar slob dpon rgya chen tshogs rnams dang / lnga dang lha ma yin mchog gzugs du ma yan// mthong zhing thos la 'brang bar 'gyur ba dang // rtag tu legs
316b8(rgyud): mchod rjesu bstan pa yin// rdo rje'i rigs dpal dang ldan pa las/ mnyes pa dka' zhing me dnga'i ma las lhag pa kho ni nyid kyi mi dang dam pa'i yon tan dang ldan pa mchog
317a1(rgyud): tu gyur pa gang dang gang yin pa de dag ni dkyil 'khor dang dam tshig rab tu rtogs pas// rtag tu mthong zhing thos pa 'am// sgrub pa'i tshul dang ldan par byas na
317a2(rgyud): dngos grub 'grub pa 'am// ban pa yang thob par 'gyur ro// rdo rje chen po thogs bzhad du rtag tu bdug pa dang // me tog dang / dri dang / lnga ba shes rgyas par dbul zhing spyan bsre/ 
317a3(rgyud): bya'o// de ltar gnas bzhi pa tshul 'dzin cing nyi ma'i gza brjid dang ldan pa'i dkyil 'khor dam pa 'di ni dpal skyed cing mchog tu myur ba'i cho ga yin pas na dkyil 'khor bde
317a4(rgyud): kyi rgyal po nyid yi no// lag na rdo rje'i dkyil 'khor gyi rgyal po chen po lag na rdo rje dbang phyug chen po gnyis kyis dam tshig bshad pa las gnas bzhi pa rdzas
317a5(rgyud): de nas rdo rje lcags kyu ma// rdo rje yi ni rigs kyi yum// sgrub ba yi ni don rnams kun// sgrub pa byed pa gang yin ba sha da// na mo rat+na tra yA ya// na ma shAt+tha badz+ra pA Na ya/ mahA
317a6(rgyud): yakA se nA pa ta ye// na maste badz+ra d+ha ra badz+ra pA Ni badz+ra yaHna maHsu badz+ra ya na mo badz+ra dU tI ye/ na mo badz+ra shA nI ye/ na mo badz+ra hrid yA ya/ na mo badz+ra ku shI ye/ ma mo badz+ra da shu shA ya/

317a8(rgyud): A kaD+D+h+ya/ gau r-i gi ri/ khi ri khi ri/ b+hi ro d+hi ri/ ke me ki li/ badz+ra ku lam se sma ra/ gi ri gi ri/ ti ri ti ri/ b+hi ra b+ha ri/ A gats+tsha A gats+tsha/ An ya me hi rat+na su brta d+ha na b+h+ya
317b1(rgyud): dz+nyAn/ a \u0f7fba ya ma/ khadu chu ze / oMn+d+ra nA kaD+D+h+ya/ yan+ta da ma/ gr-ih+Na dz+ra Sham/ ta tata/ ti la ka lo chu cur/ tsat+naHt+t+wa/ ka ra Ni ba ba s+thig+h+nAn pa cim ka lo// lug sarbA/

318a2(rgyud): ma ma pi ri bi ri/ ku ru ku ru/ ki ri ki ri/ tu ru tu ru/ ta ra ta ra/ badz+rAM ku shI le swA hA/ ka nA ku shi ye swA hA/ ba shI ku shI ye swA hA/ bi dza yA ku shi yai swA hA/ ka mA ku shI ye swAH
